K03psp_2-3u:1: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahārājānas te sarve 'nekair devaputrasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva pariṣadi saṃnipatitā
K03psp_2-3u:2: evaṃ śakro devānām indro yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapārṣadyā
K03psp_2-3u:3: yāvan mahābrahmāṇo ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau parīttābhā yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikāś
K03psp_2-3u:4: ca devaputrā anekaiḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:5: tatraiva pariṣadi saṃnipatitā. yaś ca teṣāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ. kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:6: yaś ca trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:7: sa tathāgataprakṛtiprabhāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm
K03psp_2-3u:8: api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam api nopaiti,
K03psp_2-3u:9: na kṣamate tathāgataprabhāyāḥ purataḥ sā devānāṃ prabhā. tathāgataprabhaivāgrākhyate
K03psp_2-3u:10: jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītā anuttarā niruttarā uttarottarā cākhyāyate. tadyathāpi
K03psp_2-3u:11: nāma jambūnadasya suvarṇasya purataḥ kṛṣṇalauhaṃ na bhrājate na tapati na virocate,
K03psp_2-3u:12: evam eva tathāgatasya prakṛtiprabhāyāḥ purataḥ sā devānāṃ karmavipākajaprabhā na
K03psp_2-3u:13: bhrājate na tapati na virocate. tathāgataprabhaiva teṣām agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate
K03psp_2-3u:17: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:18: ete bhadanta subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye cāturmahārājakāyikā devās
K03psp_2-3u:19: trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikā
K03psp_2-3u:20: devaputrās te sarve saṃnipatitā āyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaśravaṇāya
K03psp_2-3u:21: prajñāpāramitopadeśaṃ śrotukāmāḥ. kathaṃ ca bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K03psp_2-3u:25: evam ukte, āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:26: tena hi kauśika upadekṣyāmi buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:27: yaiś ca devaputrair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpāditaṃ tair anuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:28: samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitavyam. ye punar avakrāntaniyāmās te 'pratibalā anuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:29: samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayituṃ. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:32: api tu khalu punas teṣām apy anumode te ced anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayeyuḥ. iti vyāptiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:36: tatra kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya katamā prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:37: iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ rūpam anityato
K03psp_2-3u:38: manasikaroti duḥkhato 'nātmataḥ śāntato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghataḥ parataḥ pralopadharmataś
K03psp_2-3u:39: calataḥ prabhaṅgurato bhayata upasargata upadravato manasikaroti tac cānupalambhayogena,
K03psp_2-3u:40: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam. evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:41: evaṃ pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātum anityato manasikaroti duḥkhato (PSP_2-3:3)
K03psp_2-3u:42: 'nātmataḥ śāntato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghataḥ parataḥ pralopadharmataś calataḥ
K03psp_2-3u:43: prabhaṅgurato bhayata upasargata upadravato manasikaroti tac cānupalambhayogena sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktena
K03psp_2-3u:44: cittotpādena. evam avidyāpratyayān saṃskārān anityato manasikaroti duḥkhato 'nātmataḥ
K03psp_2-3u:45: śāntato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghataḥ parataḥ pralopadharmataś calataḥ prabhaṅgurato
K03psp_2-3u:46: bhayata upasargata upadravataḥ saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:47: nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayā vedanā vedanāpratyayā
K03psp_2-3u:48: tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam upādānapratyayo bhavo bhavapratyayā jātir jātipratyayā
K03psp_2-3u:50: duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati tac cānityato duḥkhato 'nātmataḥ śāntato rogato
K03psp_2-3u:51: gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghataḥ parataḥ pralopadharmataś calataḥ prabhaṅgurato bhayata upasargata
K03psp_2-3u:52: upadravato manasikaroti tac cānupalambhayogena sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittotpādena.
K03psp_2-3u:53: avidyānirodhāt saṃskāranirodha iti manasikaroti nirātmataḥ śāntato viviktataḥ śūnyato
K03psp_2-3u:56: sparśanirodhād vedanānirodho vedanānirodhāt tṛṣṇānirodhas tṛṣṇānirodhād upādānanirodha
K03psp_2-3u:58: nirudhyante. evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati tac ca nirātmataḥ
K03psp_2-3u:61: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena catvāri
K03psp_2-3u:62: smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati tac cānupalambhayogena. evaṃ catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catura
K03psp_2-3u:63: ṛddhipādān pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ catvāry
K03psp_2-3u:64: apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīr daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri
K03psp_2-3u:66: buddhadharmān bhāvayati sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac cānupalambhayogena.
K03psp_2-3u:67: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittotpādena
K03psp_2-3u:68: dānapāramitāṃ carati tac cānupalambhayogena. evaṃ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:71: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃdharmeṇa
K03psp_2-3u:72: dharmān yojayati. evaṃdharmeṇa dharmān abhiṣyandayan pariṣyandayan paripūrayan parisphāran
K03psp_2-3u:73: pratyavekṣate nirātmakā hy ete sarvadharmā ātmātmīyavigatāḥ. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:74: tathā hi yad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlacittaṃ tad bodhicittenāsamavahitaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:75: yat pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad bodhicittakuśalamūlacittābhyām asamavahitaṃ yad bodhicittaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:77: yat kauśika bodhicittaṃ tat pariṇāmanācitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. yat pariṇāmanācittaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:78: tad bodhicitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. iyaṃ kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_2-3u:79: prajñāpāramitā yad evaṃ sarvadharmāṃś ca pratyavekṣate na ca kaṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate nopalabhate.
K03psp_2-3u:80: evam ukte śakro devānām indraḥ sthaviraṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:83: kathaṃ vā pariṇāmanācitte bodhicittaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?
K03psp_2-3u:84: kathaṃ bodhicitte pariṇāmanācittaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?
K03psp_2-3u:86: yat kauśika pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad acittaṃ yad bodhicittaṃ tad acittaṃ na hy acittatācittatāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:87: pariṇāmayati. iti hi yad acittaṃ tad acintyaṃ yad acintyaṃ tad acittam acittatācittatāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:88: pariṇāmayati. iyaṃ kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_2-3u:90: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:92: subhūte sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ subhūte yas tvaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadiśasi,
K03psp_2-3u:96: tathā hi bhagavan pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:97: samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike taiḥ śrāvakaiḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv avavadito 'nuśiṣṭaḥ saṃdarśitaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:98: samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito yato bhagavān bodhisattvabhūtaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:99: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ. evam eva bhagavann
K03psp_2-3u:100: asmābhir api bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv avavaditavyā anuśāsitavyāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:102: pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā asmābhir api bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avavaditā anuśiṣṭāḥ saṃdarśitāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:103: samuttejjitāḥ saṃpraharṣitāḥ samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
K03psp_2-3u:104: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:105: tena hi kauśika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K03psp_2-3u:106: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ yathā pratipattavyaṃ rūpaṃ kauśika rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ vedanā
K03psp_2-3u:107: saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ kauśika vijñānena śūnyaṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:108: iti hi kauśika yā ca rūpaśūnyatā,
K03psp_2-3u:111: advayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K03psp_2-3u:112: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyam. evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano manasā śūnyaṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:116: advayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K03psp_2-3u:117: punar aparaṃ kauśika pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātunā śūnyaḥ. evam abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātunā śūnyaḥ bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:118: iti hi pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatā cābdhātuśūnyatā ca tejodhātuśūnyatā ca vāyudhātusūnyatā cākāśadhātuśūnyatā ca vijñānadhātuśūnyatā (PSP_2-3:6)
K03psp_2-3u:119: ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
K03psp_2-3u:121: avidyāvidyayā śūnyā. evaṃ saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇopādānaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:122: bhavo jātir jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇena sūnyam. avidyānirodho 'vidyānirodhena śūnyaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:123: evaṃ saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇopādānaṃ bhavo jātir
K03psp_2-3u:124: jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhena śūnyaḥ bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:125: iti hy avidyāśūnyatā cāvidyānirodhaśūnyatā yāvaj jarāmaraṇaśūnyatā ca jarāmaraṇanirodhaśūnyatā
K03psp_2-3u:126: ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena
K03psp_2-3u:128: punar aparaṃ kauśika dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:131: iti hi dānapāramitāśūnyatā ca śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K03psp_2-3u:132: punar aparaṃ kauśika adhyātmaśūnyatādhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā. evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā
K03psp_2-3u:134: iti hy adhyātmaśūnyatā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K03psp_2-3u:135: punar aparaṃ kauśika smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgābhijñāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattidaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido
K03psp_2-3u:136: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā bodhisattvo
K03psp_2-3u:138: iti hi smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatā ca yāvad āveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K03psp_2-3u:139: punar aparaṃ kauśika samādhiḥ samādhinā śūnyaḥ. dhāraṇīmukhāni (PSP_2-3:7)
K03psp_2-3u:141: iti hi samādhiśūnyatā ca dhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K03psp_2-3u:142: punar aparaṃ kauśika śrāvakayānaṃ śrāvakayānena śūnyaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānena
K03psp_2-3u:143: śūnyaṃ mahāyānaṃ mahāyānena śūnyaṃ śrāvakaḥ śrāvakatvena śūnyaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ pratyekabuddhatvena
K03psp_2-3u:144: śūnyaḥ bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ buddho buddhatvena śūnyaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:145: iti hi śrāvakayānaśūnyatā ca yāvan mahāyānaśūnyatā ca śrāvakaśūnyatā ca yāvad buddhaśūnyatā
K03psp_2-3u:146: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:148: atha khalu sakro devānām indraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:149: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ?
K03psp_2-3u:151: iha kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena rūpe na sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:152: na saṃskāreṣu vijñāne na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. cakṣuṣi na sthātavyaṃ rūpe na
K03psp_2-3u:153: sthātavyaṃ cakṣurvijñāne na sthātavyaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe na sthātavyaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:155: evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanasi na sthātavyaṃ dharmeṣu na sthātavyaṃ manovijñāne
K03psp_2-3u:156: na sthātavyaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśe na sthātavyaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ na sthātavyam
K03psp_2-3u:157: upalambhayogena. pṛthivīdhātau na sthātavyaṃ abdhātau na sthātavyaṃ tejodhātau na
K03psp_2-3u:158: sthātavyaṃ vāyudhātau na sthātavyam ākāśadhātau na sthātavyaṃ vijñānadhātau na sthātavyam
K03psp_2-3u:160: na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. srotaāpattiphale na sthātavyam evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphale
K03psp_2-3u:161: 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattvaphale pratyekabuddhatvaphale yāvad buddhatve na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. iti mūrdhagatam
K03psp_2-3u:163: evam anityam iti sukham iti duḥkham ity ātmety anātmeti śāntam ity aśāntam iti viviktam ity aviviktam iti na sthātavyaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:164: rūpaṃ śūnyam ity aśūnyam iti nimittam ity animittam iti praṇihitam ity apraṇihitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ (PSP_2-3:8)
K03psp_2-3u:165: nityam iti na sthātavyam evam anityam iti sukham iti duḥkham ity ātmety anātmeti
K03psp_2-3u:166: śāntam ity aśāntam iti viviktam ity aviviktam iti na sthātavyam. vijñānaṃ śūnyam
K03psp_2-3u:167: ity aśūnyam iti nimittam ity animittam iti praṇihitam ity apraṇihitam iti na sthātavyam
K03psp_2-3u:169: bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu satyābhijñāsu samādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu
K03psp_2-3u:171: sarveṣu teṣu nityam iti na sthātavyam evam anityam iti sukham iti duḥkham ity ātmeti
K03psp_2-3u:172: anātmeti śāntam ity aśāntam iti viviktam ity aviviktam iti na sthātavyaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:173: śūnyam iti aśūnyam iti nimittam ity animittam iti praṇihitam ity apraṇihitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
K03psp_2-3u:174: punar aparaṃ kauśika srotaāpattiphalam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam evaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:175: sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:176: buddhatvam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyaṃ. srotaāpanno dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam,
K03psp_2-3u:179: arhan pratyekabuddhas tathāgato dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. iti kṣāntigatam
K03psp_2-3u:180: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamāyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam.
K03psp_2-3u:181: evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ bhūmau tṛtīyāyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:182: bhūmau saptamyāṃ bhūmāv aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam
K03psp_2-3u:183: upalambhayogena. prathamacittotpāde sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam.
K03psp_2-3u:184: evaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:186: paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmayiṣyāmīti
K03psp_2-3u:187: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramyāvinivartanīyabhūmau sthāsyāmīti,
K03psp_2-3u:188: evam api bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. pañcābhijñāḥ paripūrayiṣyāmīti
K03psp_2-3u:189: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. pañcasu bodhisattvābhijñāsu
K03psp_2-3u:191: buddhāṃś ca bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya pūjanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya
K03psp_2-3u:192: ca śrutvā ca tathatvāya pratipatsye pareṣāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena
K03psp_2-3u:193: mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. yādṛśāni ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:194: buddhakṣetrāṇi tādṛśāni niṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam
K03psp_2-3u:195: upalambhayogena. sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena
K03psp_2-3u:196: mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣv gatvā
K03psp_2-3u:197: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkariṣyāmīti gurukariṣyāmīti mānayiṣyāmīti
K03psp_2-3u:200: evam api na sthātavyam aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K03psp_2-3u:201: pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyaṃ. pañca cakṣūṃṣi utpādayiṣyāmīti
K03psp_2-3u:202: na sthātavyaṃ māṃsacakṣur divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur utpādayiṣyāmīti
K03psp_2-3u:203: na sthātavyaṃ sarvasamādhīn niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyaṃ. yena yena punaḥ samādhinākāṅkṣiṣyāmi
K03psp_2-3u:204: vikrīḍituṃ tena tena samādhinā vikrīḍiṣyāmīti na sthātavyaṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni niṣpādayiṣyāmīti
K03psp_2-3u:205: na sthātavyam. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattir niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. daśatathāgatabalāni
K03psp_2-3u:206: niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyaṃ. catvāri vaiśāradyāni niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyaṃ.
K03psp_2-3u:207: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
K03psp_2-3u:208: pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. mahāmaitrīṃ
K03psp_2-3u:209: mahākaruṇāṃ niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. dvātriṃśac ca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye
K03psp_2-3u:210: niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. aśītyanuvyañjanāni niṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena
K03psp_2-3u:211: mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. śraddhānusārī dharmānusāry aṣṭamakaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:212: srotaāpannaḥ saptakṛtvo bhavaparama iti na sthātavyam. kulaṃkula iti ekavīcika iti
K03psp_2-3u:213: na sthātavyam. samaśīrṣaḥ pudgala iti na sthātavyam. āyuḥkṣaye kleśakṣaye ca na sthātavyam.
K03psp_2-3u:214: srotaāpanno 'vinipātadharma iti na sthātavyaṃ. sakṛdāgāmī sakṛd imaṃ lokam āgamya
K03psp_2-3u:215: duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyāntaṃ kariṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. anāgāmy anāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkriyāyai
K03psp_2-3u:216: pratipanna iti na sthātavyam. anāgāmī tatraiva parinirvāyīti na sthātavyam. arhann
K03psp_2-3u:217: arhatphalaṃ sākṣātkriyāyai pratipanna iti na sthātavyam. arhann (PSP_2-3:10)
K03psp_2-3u:218: ihaivānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāyīti na sthātavyam. pratyekabuddha iti na
K03psp_2-3u:219: sthātavyam. bodhisattvo 'tikramya śrāvakābhūmiṃ ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ ca bodhisattvabhūmau
K03psp_2-3u:220: ca sthāsyāmīti na sthātavyam. mārgajñatājñāne na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. sarvākāreṇa
K03psp_2-3u:222: 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam.
K03psp_2-3u:224: evam api na sthātavyam. caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣv indriyeṣu sthitvā tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ
K03psp_2-3u:225: samāpatsye yathārūpeṇa samādhinā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān sthāsyāmīti na sthātavyam
K03psp_2-3u:226: upalambhayogena. aparimitaṃ ma āyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
K03psp_2-3u:228: na sthātavyaṃ. yāvantaḥ pūrveṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātava evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottareṇa
K03psp_2-3u:229: gaṅgānadivālukopamā lokadhātavas tāvat mamaikaikaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyatīti na
K03psp_2-3u:230: sthātavyam. vajramayo me trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyam.
K03psp_2-3u:232: yas taṃ gandhaṃ ghrāyeta tasya sarvakāyasya na rāgo bādheta,
K03psp_2-3u:235: na kasyacic chrāvakacittaṃ vā pratyekabuddhacittaṃ vā syāt,
K03psp_2-3u:236: sarve ca te sattvā niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_2-3u:237: ye ca te sattvās taṃ gandhaṃ ghrāsyanti teṣāṃ na kaścid vyādhir bhaved iti evam api na sthātavyaṃ. tatra ca buddhakṣetre na rūpaśabdo,
K03psp_2-3u:241: na vijñānaśabdo bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyam. na dānapāramitāyāḥ śabdo bhaviṣyatīti,
K03psp_2-3u:242: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śabdo bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyam. na smṛtyupasthānaśabdo bhaviṣyatīti,
K03psp_2-3u:244: evaṃ na yāvat srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhatpratyekabuddhabodhisattvabuddhaśabdo bhaviṣyatīti na sthātavyaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:247: sarvadharmā nopalabdhāḥ. evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām upalambhayogena na sthātavyam.
K03psp_2-3u:249: kathaṃ punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam? iti.
K03psp_2-3u:250: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:252: tvam āyuṣmañ śāriputra kva tathāgataḥ sthita iti
K03psp_2-3u:254: na kvacid āyuṣman subhūte tathāgataḥ sthitaḥ. apratiṣṭhitamānasaḥ sa khalu punas
K03psp_2-3u:255: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa na rūpe sthito na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu
K03psp_2-3u:256: na vijñāne sthito na saṃskṛte dhātau sthito nāsaṃskṛte dhātau sthitaḥ. evaṃ na vyastasamasteṣu
K03psp_2-3u:257: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na pāramitāsu na bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:258: nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu nābhijñāsu na satyeṣu sthito na sarvaśūnyatāsu na
K03psp_2-3u:260: na balavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu sthito na sarvajñatāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:261: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:262: evaṃ hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ. yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na rūpe sthito nāsthitaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:263: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthito nāsthitaḥ. evaṃ hy āyuṣmañ
K03psp_2-3u:264: śariputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ. sthāsyāmīty asthānayogena.
K03psp_2-3u:266: atha khalu tatra pariṣadi keṣāṃcid devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
K03psp_2-3u:267: yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣarutāni yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni prajñāyante
K03psp_2-3u:268: tāni jalpyamānāni. idaṃ punar na vijñāyate yad āryasthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:270: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥiparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān āmantrayāmāsa:
K03psp_2-3u:275: tathā hi devaputrā ekākṣaram apy atra na pravyāhriyate,
K03psp_2-3u:279: anakṣarā hi prajñāpāramitā tasmān nāsti jñātā na śrotā na deśayitā anakṣarā tathāgatānām
K03psp_2-3u:280: arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ. tadyathāpi nāma devaputrās tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
K03psp_2-3u:281: buddhanirmitaṃ nirmimīyāc catasraś ca pariṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ so 'bhinirmāya
K03psp_2-3u:284: devaputrā api nu tatra kiṃcid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vājñātaṃ vā.
K03psp_2-3u:288: evam eva devaputrāḥ. sarvadharmā nirmitopamās tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic
K03psp_2-3u:289: chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātam. tadyathāpi nāma devaputrāḥ puruṣaḥ suptaḥ. svapnāntaragatas
K03psp_2-3u:290: tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyed dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
K03psp_2-3u:291: devaputrā api nu tatra kiṃcid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vājñātaṃ vā.
K03psp_2-3u:295: evaṃ devaputrāḥ svapnopamāḥ. sarve dharmās tatra na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid deśitaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:296: na kenacid ājñātam. tadyathāpi nāma devaputrā dvau puruṣau parvatakandare sthitvā
K03psp_2-3u:297: buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ dharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ saṃghasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātām.
K03psp_2-3u:298: tato dvayor api tayoḥ pratiśrutkāsvaro niścaret. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
K03psp_2-3u:299: devaputrā api nu tayā pratiśrutkayā dvitīyaḥ. pratiśrutkāśabdo vijñāpito bhavet.
K03psp_2-3u:303: evam eva devaputraḥ. sarvadharmāḥ pratiśrutkopamās tatra na kiṃcid deśyate na śrūyate
K03psp_2-3u:304: na vijñāyate. tadyathāpi nāma devaputrā dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe
K03psp_2-3u:305: tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ nirmimīyāc catasraś ca pariṣadaḥ so 'bhinirmāya
K03psp_2-3u:306: nirmitānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
K03psp_2-3u:307: devaputrā api nu tatra kenacid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā vijñātaṃ vā bhavet.
K03psp_2-3u:311: evam eva devaputrā māyopamāḥ sarvadharmā na tatra kaścid (PSP_2-3:13)
K03psp_2-3u:312: deśayitā na śrotā na vijñātā. iti paropadeśavaiyarthyam
K03psp_2-3u:313: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
K03psp_2-3u:317: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:318: na hi devaputrā rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā,
K03psp_2-3u:319: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ gambhīraṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:320: na rūpasya svabhāvo gambhiro na sūkṣmaḥ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ na
K03psp_2-3u:321: vijñānasya svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ. na cakṣuṣaḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:322: na śrotasya na ghrāṇasya na jihvāyā na kāyasya na manasaḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:323: na pṛthivīdhātoḥ. svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:324: nābdhātor na tejodhātor na vāyudhātor nākāśadhātor na vijñānadhātoḥ. svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ. na dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:325: na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ nādhyātmaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:326: na bahirdhāśūnyatāyā nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvo
K03psp_2-3u:327: gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ. na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ. evaṃ samyakprahāṇānām
K03psp_2-3u:328: ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya satyānām abhijñānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:329: caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:330: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛnāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādāśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:331: svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ na sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhānāṃ svabhāvo gambhiro na sūkṣmaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:332: yāvan na sarvākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:333: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
K03psp_2-3u:334: na khalu punar asyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ rūpaṃ prajñaptaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ prajñaptaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:335: yāvan na dhātavo nāyatanāni na pratityasamutpādaḥ prajñapto na pāramitā prajñaptā na bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ prajñaptāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:337: na sarvaśūnyatā na sarvasamādhayaḥ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni (PSP_2-3:14)
K03psp_2-3u:338: na daśatathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prajñaptāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:339: nāpīha dharmadeśanāyāṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñaptaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:340: nārhattvaṃ na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ na bodhisattvatvaṃ prajñaptaṃ na bodhiḥ prajñaptā
K03psp_2-3u:342: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān āmantrayāmāsa:
K03psp_2-3u:345: sā na kenacid deśitā na kenacic chrutā na kenacid vijñātā. tena hi devaputrā ye srotaāpattiphale sthātukāmāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:346: ye srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
K03psp_2-3u:349: ye pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prāptukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya. evaṃ hi devaputrā bodhisattvena
K03psp_2-3u:350: mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam apravyāhārāśravaṇatām upādāya.
K03psp_2-3u:352: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
K03psp_2-3u:354: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:355: māyopamā mama devaputrā dharmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyā nirmitopamā mama dharmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ. te naiva kiṃcic chroṣyanti na paryavāpsyanti na sākṣātkariṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:356: atha khalu te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtisthaviram evam āhuḥ:
K03psp_2-3u:357: kiṃ punar bhadanta subhūte māyopamās te sattvā māyopamās te dharmaśravaṇikā nirmitopamās te sattvā nirmitopamās te dharmaśravaṇikāḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:360: māyopamās te sattvā māyopamās te dharmaśravaṇikā,
K03psp_2-3u:361: nirmitopamās te sattvā nirmitopamās te dharmaśravaṇikāḥ. rūpam api devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:362: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam api devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ. cakṣur api
K03psp_2-3u:363: devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ. evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'pi devaputrāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:364: svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ. rūpam api devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ (PSP_2-3:15)
K03psp_2-3u:365: māyopamaṃ. evaṃ śabdagandharasasparśadharmā api devaputrāḥ. svapnopamā māyopamāś.
K03psp_2-3u:366: cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā svapnopamā māyopamāḥ. evaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:367: śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manovijñānaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā svapnopamā
K03psp_2-3u:368: māyopamā. dānapāramitāpi svapnopamā māyopamā. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramītā vīryapārmitā
K03psp_2-3u:369: dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāpi svapnopamā māyopamā. evam adhyātmaśūmyatā bahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā
K03psp_2-3u:370: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā. smṛtyupasthānāny api svapnopamāni.
K03psp_2-3u:372: abhijñā satyāni daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā
K03psp_2-3u:373: api buddhadharmāḥ svapnopamā māyopamāḥ. srotaāpattiphalam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ.
K03psp_2-3u:374: srotaāpanno 'pi svapnopamo māyopamaḥ. evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam api sakṛdāgāmy apy anāgāmiphalam
K03psp_2-3u:375: apy anāgāmy apy arhatphalam apy arhann api svapnopamo māyopamaḥ pratyekabodhir api
K03psp_2-3u:377: pratyekabuddho 'pi svapnopamo māyopamaḥ. bodhisattvatvam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:378: bodhisattvo 'pi svapnopamo māyopamo. anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir api svapnopamā māyopamā,
K03psp_2-3u:380: atha khalu te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:381: buddhatvam api sthavira subhūte svapnopamaṃ māyopamam iti vadasi. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:384: nirvāṇam apy ahaṃ devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamam iti vadāmi,
K03psp_2-3u:385: saced ahaṃ devaputrā nirvāṇād api kaṃcid dharmaviśiṣṭataraṃ jāniyāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:386: tam apy ahaṃ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ vadeyaṃ. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:387: tathā hi devaputrāḥ svapnaś ca māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K03psp_2-3u:389: atha khalv āyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmāṃś ca mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākauṣṭhila
K03psp_2-3u:390: āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākātyāyana āyuṣmāṃś ca pūrṇo maitrāyaṇiputra āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākāśyapo
K03psp_2-3u:391: 'nekāni ca devakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇy āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviram evam āhuḥ:
K03psp_2-3u:392: ke 'syā bhadanta subhūte evaṃ gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evam atarkāyā evam atarkāvacarāyā evaṃ sūkṣmāyā (PSP_2-3:16)
K03psp_2-3u:393: evaṃ nipuṇāyā evaṃ durdṛśāyā evaṃ duranubodhāyā evaṃ śāntāyā evaṃ praṇītāyā evam alamāryāyā evaṃ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyā deśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā
K03psp_2-3u:394: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān mahāśrāvakāṃs tāṃś ca devaputrān etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:395: avinivartanīyā āyuṣmanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ gambhīrāyā
K03psp_2-3u:396: evam atarkāyā evam atarkāvacarāyā evaṃ sūkṣmāyā evaṃ nipuṇāyā evaṃ durdṛśāyā evaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:397: duranubodhāyā evaṃ śāntāyā evaṃ praṇītāyā evam alamāryāyā evaṃ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyā
K03psp_2-3u:398: deśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti. dṛṣṭasatyā vā pudgalā arhanto vā kṣīṇāsravāḥ paripūrṇasaṃkalpāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:400: vā. te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ gambhīrāyā evam atarkāyā
K03psp_2-3u:401: evam atarkāvacarāyā evaṃ sūkṣmāyā evaṃ nipuṇāyā evaṃ durdṛśāyā evaṃ duranubodhāyā
K03psp_2-3u:402: evaṃ śāntāyā evaṃ praṇītāyā evam alamāryāyā evaṃ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyā deśyamānāyāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:404: tena khalu punar na rūpaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:406: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:407: na śūnyatāṃ vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na rūpam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:408: nānimittaṃ rūpam iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:409: nānimittaṃ vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na rūpam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:411: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:412: nāpraṇihitaṃ vijñānam iti vikalpayiṣyanti. evaṃ nānutpāda iti,
K03psp_2-3u:415: na viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti. evaṃ vyastasamastāni skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāṅgāni sarvapāramitām,
K03psp_2-3u:416: evam adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām
K03psp_2-3u:417: evaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāny ṛddhipādānīndriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgamārgam
K03psp_2-3u:420: evaṃ na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ na sarvākārajñatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:421: na śūnyatāṃ sarvākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti. na sarvākārajñatām ānimitteti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:422: nānimittaṃ sarvākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti. na sarvākārajñatām apraṇihiteti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:423: nāpraṇihitaṃ sarvākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti. na sarvākārajñatām anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:424: nānutpādaṃ sarvākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti. na sarvākārajñatām anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:425: nānirodhaṃ sarvākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti. na sarvākārajñatāṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:426: na śāntaṃ sarvākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti. na sarvākārajñatāṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:427: na viviktaṃ sarvākārajñateti vikalpayiṣyanti. na saṃskṛtadhātuṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:428: na śūnyatāṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na saṃskṛtadhātum ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:429: nānimittaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na saṃskṛtadhātuu apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:430: nāpraṇihitaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na saṃskṛtadhātum anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:431: nānutpādaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na saṃskṛtadhātum anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:432: nānirodhaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na saṃskṛtadhātuṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:433: na śāntaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. na saṃskṛtadhātuṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:434: na viviktaṃ saṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. nāsaṃskṛtadhātuṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:435: na śūnyatām asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. nāsaṃskṛtadhātum ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:436: nānimittam asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. nāsaṃskṛtadhātum apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:437: nāpraṇihitam asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. nāsaṃskṛtadhātum anutpāda iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:438: nānutpādam asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. nāsaṃskṛtadhātum anirodha iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:439: nānirodham asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. nāsaṃskṛtadhātuṃ śāntam iti vikalpayiṣyanti, na śāntam (PSP_2-3:18)
K03psp_2-3u:440: asaṃskṛtadhātur iti vikalpayiṣyanti. nāsaṃskṛtadhātuṃ viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:442: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:443: nāsyā devaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ gambhīrāyā yāvad alamāryāyāḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyāḥ kaścit pratyeṣako bhaviṣyati tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:444: tathā hy atra na kaścid dharmo deśyate na sūcyate na paridīpyate,
K03psp_2-3u:445: yathaivātra na kaścid dharmo deśyate na sūcyate na paridīpyate tathaivātra na kaścit pratyeṣako bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:446: atha khalv āyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:447: nanv āyuṣman subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante yad uta śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhayānaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:448: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ saṃparigraha upadiśyate prathamacittotpādam upādāya
K03psp_2-3u:449: yāvad daśamaś cittotpāda iti bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate yad uta dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:450: kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāny
K03psp_2-3u:451: ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāṇi bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaś catvāry apramāṇāṃ catvāri
K03psp_2-3u:452: dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'bhijñāḥ satyāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni
K03psp_2-3u:455: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ saṃparigraha upadiṣyate evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:456: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nopapāduko bhaviṣyati. evam abhijñābhir aparihāṇadharmā buddhakṣetrād
K03psp_2-3u:457: buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyanti yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣiṣyanti buddhān bhagavataḥ
K03psp_2-3u:458: satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāny asya kuśalamūlāni samṛddhiṃ yāsyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:459: yaṃ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike dharmaṃ śroṣyanti sarvo 'sya dharmo na jātv
K03psp_2-3u:460: antarā vicchetsyati yāvan nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddheti sadā samāhitaś
K03psp_2-3u:463: anācchedyapratibhānaḥ samāhitapratibhāno yuktapratibhānaḥ śliṣṭapratibhāno 'rthavatpratibhānaḥ sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānaś ca bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:465: evam etad āyuṣmañ śāriputra evam etat. tathaiva tadyathā vadasi vistareṇeha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāny upadiṣṭāni yad uta śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:466: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ saṃparigrahā upadiṣṭā yāvad bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānā bhaviṣyanti. tac cānupalambhayogena
K03psp_2-3u:469: evaṃ śrotrasya ghrāṇasya jihvāyāḥ kāyasya manaso 'nupalambhayogena. cakṣurviñānasya cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā anupalambhayogena,
K03psp_2-3u:471: anupalambhayogena. evaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena. pṛthivīdhātor anupalambhayogena,
K03psp_2-3u:472: evam abdhātos tejodhātor vāyudhātor ākāśadhātor vijñānadhātor anupalambhayogena. dānapāramitāyā anupalambhayogena,
K03psp_2-3u:473: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ. kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā
K03psp_2-3u:476: evaṃ samyakprahāṇānām ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya
K03psp_2-3u:478: anupalambhayogena. daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām
K03psp_2-3u:480: atha khalv āyuṣmāñ chāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:481: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ triṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante anupalambhayogena?
K03psp_2-3u:482: kena kāraṇena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃparigraha upadiśyate yāvat sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:484: adhyātmaśūnyatām upādāyāyuṣmañ śāriputra triṇi yānāni vistareṇopodiśyante anupalambhayogena. bahirdhāśūnyatām upādāyādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām
K03psp_2-3u:485: upādāya yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante anupalambhayogena,
K03psp_2-3u:486: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃparigraha upadiśyate
K03psp_2-3u:487: yāvat sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhāno bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhaviṣyati anupalambhayogena.
K03psp_2-3u:488: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat:
K03psp_2-3u:489: asyā dharmadṛṣṭeḥ subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyamāṇāyā yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās teṣāṃ caitad abhavat:
K03psp_2-3u:490: asyā dharmadṛṣṭeḥ subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyamāṇāyā yan nu vayaṃ puṣpāṇy abhinirmāya
K03psp_2-3u:491: taiḥ puṣpair buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtiṃ ca sthaviram
K03psp_2-3u:493: atha khalu śakro devānām indras te trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikān devān upādāya yāvad akaniṣṭhā devā divyāni māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇy abhinirmāya,
K03psp_2-3u:494: taiḥ puṣpair buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtiṃ ca sthaviram imāṃ ca prajñāpāramitām abhyavakiranti sma,
K03psp_2-3u:496: samanantarāvakīrṇāni ca tāni puṣpāṇi śakreṇa devānām indreṇa,
K03psp_2-3u:498: atha khalu sarvasmiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau puṣpasaṃstaraḥ saṃstṛto 'bhūt. upariṣṭāc cāntarīkṣe puṣpakūṭāgāraṃ saṃsthitam abhūt ramaṇīyaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:500: na punar imāni puṣpāṇi mayā sarvadevabhavaṇeṣu dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi pracaranti yānīmāni puṣpāṇi devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni nirmitānīmāni puṣpāṇi na
K03psp_2-3u:501: yānīmāni devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni manomayāny etāni puṣpāṇi naitāni puṣpāṇi vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātānīmāni devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni.
K03psp_2-3u:502: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ sthaviraṃ subhūtiṃ etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:503: anirjātānīmāni bhadanta subhūte puṣpāṇi naitāni puṣpāṇi manonirjātāni nāpi (PSP_2-3:21)
K03psp_2-3u:507: anirjātānīmāni puṣpāṇi naitāni manonirjātāni nāpi vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātānīti. yāni kauśikānirjātāni na tāni puṣpāṇi śakro devānām indra āha:
K03psp_2-3u:508: kiṃ punar bhadanta subhūte imāny eva puṣpāny anirjātāni,
K03psp_2-3u:509: atha rūpam apy anirjātaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ vijñānam apy anirjātaṃ?
K03psp_2-3u:511: na kauśika imāny eva puṣpāṇy anirjātāni,
K03psp_2-3u:512: rūpam api kauśikānirjātaṃ yac cānirjātaṃ na tad rūpam. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:513: kauśikānirjātaṃ yac cānirjātaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ. cakṣuḥ kauśikānirjātaṃ yac cānirjātaṃ na tac cakṣuḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:514: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ kauśikānirjātaṃ yac cānirjātaṃ na tan manaḥ. pṛthivīdhātuḥ kauśikānirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa pṛthivīdhātur,
K03psp_2-3u:515: evam abdhātus tejodhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhatuḥ kauśikānirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa vijñānadhātuḥ. dānapāramitā kauśika anirjātā yā cānirjātā na sā dānapāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:516: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā kauśika
K03psp_2-3u:517: anirjātā yā cānirjātā na sā prajñāpāramitā. adhyātmaśūnyatā kauśika anirjātā yā cānirjātā
K03psp_2-3u:518: na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā kauśika anirjātā yā cānirjātā na
K03psp_2-3u:520: smṛtyupasthānāni kauśika anirjātāni yāni cānirjātāni na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
K03psp_2-3u:521: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāny ṛddhipādāḥ indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭaṅgo mārgaḥ kauśika,
K03psp_2-3u:522: anirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa mārgaḥ. evam abhijñāḥ satyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
K03psp_2-3u:524: kauśika anirjātā ye cānirjātā na te buddhadharmāḥ. srotaāpattiphalaṃ kauśika anirjātaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:526: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ kauśikānirjātaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:527: yac cānirjātaṃ na tat sarvajñatvaṃ. srotaāpannaḥ kauśika anirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa srotaāpannaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:530: arhan pratyekabuddhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kauśikānirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ. ity adhigamādhāragotram
K03psp_2-3u:531: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:532: gambhīraprajño batāyam āryasubhūtiḥ. sthaviro yatprajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati.
K03psp_2-3u:533: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:535: gambhīraprajño batāyam āryasubhūtiḥ sthaviro yatprajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati.
K03psp_2-3u:536: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:537: kathaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati?
K03psp_2-3u:539: rūpaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yac ca prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā,
K03psp_2-3u:540: tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthaviro na virodhayaty upadiśasti ca. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yac ca prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā,
K03psp_2-3u:541: tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthaviro na virodhaty upadiśati ca. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:542: yā dharmatā sā na virudhyate yā na virudhyate tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na virodhayati,
K03psp_2-3u:544: evaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:545: evam adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ. evaṃ smṛtyupasthāneṣu samyakprahāṇeṣv
K03psp_2-3u:547: abhijñāsu satyeṣu daśatathāgatabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu,
K03psp_2-3u:548: evaṃ srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabuddhatve sarvajñatve srotaāpanna iti kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā,
K03psp_2-3u:549: tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthaviro na virodhayaty upadiśati ca. evaṃ sakṛdāgāmī,
K03psp_2-3u:551: arhan pratyekabuddhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yac ca prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā,
K03psp_2-3u:552: tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthaviro na virodhayaty upadiśati ca. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:553: yā kauśika dharmatā sā na virudhyate,
K03psp_2-3u:554: yā na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati,
K03psp_2-3u:555: evaṃ hi kauśika subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati.
K03psp_2-3u:557: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. yathā bhagavatā prajñaptimātrāḥ sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā
K03psp_2-3u:558: evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñaptimātrān sarvadharmān viditvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:559: śikṣitavyam evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ punaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe śikṣate
K03psp_2-3u:560: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne śikṣate. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:561: thathā hi rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:562: na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na
K03psp_2-3u:564: tathā hi sa dānapāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:565: na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:567: tathā hi sa prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. adhyātmaśūnyatāyām api na śikṣate yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyām api na śikṣate. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:568: tathā hi so 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām api na
K03psp_2-3u:569: samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. smṛtyupasthāneṣv api na śikṣate. evaṃ samyakprahāneṣv
K03psp_2-3u:570: ṛddhipādeṣv indriyeṣu baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣv āryāṣṭāṅgeṣu mārgeṣv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣv
K03psp_2-3u:571: abhijñāsu satyeṣu baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv
K03psp_2-3u:572: api na śikṣate. na srotaāpattiphale na sakṛdāgāmiphale nānāgāmiphale nārhattve na
K03psp_2-3u:573: pratyekabuddhatve śikṣate sarvajñatve 'pi na śikṣate. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:574: tathā hi sa sarvajñatvaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
K03psp_2-3u:575: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:576: kena kāraṇena bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ samanupaśyati na vedanāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:577: na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati. evaṃ vyastasamastān skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitābodhipakṣyān
K03psp_2-3u:578: dharmān na samanupaśyati. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr na samanupaśyati. satyāny
K03psp_2-3u:579: abhijñādaśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
K03psp_2-3u:580: na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate yāvat sarvajñatvaṃ api na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate?
K03psp_2-3u:582: tathā hi kauśika rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:583: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ. evaṃ vyastasamastāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni (PSP_2-3:24)
K03psp_2-3u:584: pratītyasamutpādāḥ pāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
K03psp_2-3u:585: dharmā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ satyāny abhijñā daśabalāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido
K03psp_2-3u:586: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yāvat sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:587: na hi kauśika rūpaśūnyatā rūpaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati yāvan na sarvajñatāśūnyatā sarvajñatāśūnyatāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:588: samanupaśyati. yaḥ kauśika iha śūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate sa rūpaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa.
K03psp_2-3u:589: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāreṣu vijñānaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa. evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu
K03psp_2-3u:591: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu satyeṣv abhijñāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu
K03psp_2-3u:592: daśatathāgatabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yāvat sarvajñatāśūnyatāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:593: śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa. yaḥ kauśika rūpaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa yāvat sarvajñatāśūnyatāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:594: śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa sa dānapāramitāyām api śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa. evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:595: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām api śikṣate
K03psp_2-3u:596: advaidhīkāreṇa. adhyātmaśūnyatāyām api śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyām
K03psp_2-3u:597: api śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa. smṛtyupasthāneṣu samyakprahāṇeṣv ṛddhipādeṣv indriyeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:598: baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣv āryāṣṭāṅge mārge śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣv
K03psp_2-3u:599: abhijñāsu satyeṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:600: śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa. sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa.
K03psp_2-3u:601: asaṃkhyeyeṣv aparimāṇeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa. srotaāpattiphale
K03psp_2-3u:605: na rūpasya hānaye śikṣate na vṛddhaye śikṣate. na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasya
K03psp_2-3u:606: hānaye śikṣate na vṛddhaye śikṣate. evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:607: na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate. pratītyasamutpādasya na (PSP_2-3:25)
K03psp_2-3u:608: hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate. dānapāramitāyā na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate. evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:609: kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā na hānaye na
K03psp_2-3u:610: vṛddhaye śikṣate. smṛtyupasthānānāṃ na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate. evaṃ samyakprahāṇānām
K03psp_2-3u:611: ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ mārgasya na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate.
K03psp_2-3u:612: apramāṇānāṃ dhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate. adhyātmaśūyatāyā
K03psp_2-3u:613: bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā na hānaye
K03psp_2-3u:614: na vṛddhaye śikṣate. satyānām abhijñānāṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:615: buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvat sarvajñatāyā na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate. yo rūpasya na hānaye
K03psp_2-3u:616: na vṛddhaye śikṣate yāvat sarvajñatāyā na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate sa na rūpasya
K03psp_2-3u:617: parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya śikṣate. na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:618: na vijñānasya parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya śikṣate. evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:619: pratītyasamutpādānāṃ na parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya śikṣate. evaṃ pāramitānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:621: abhijñānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ na parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya
K03psp_2-3u:622: śikṣate. daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:623: buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvat sarvajñatāyā na parigrahāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate.
K03psp_2-3u:626: kiṃ kāraṇam āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpasya parigrahāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate,
K03psp_2-3u:627: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya na parigrahāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate yāvat sarvajñatāyā na parigrahāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate?
K03psp_2-3u:629: tathā hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra rūpasya parigraho nāsti. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:630: na rūpaṃ rūpaṃ parigṛhṇāti. na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārās tathā hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra vijñānasya parigraho nāsti. tat kasya hetos? tathā hi na (PSP_2-3:26)
K03psp_2-3u:631: vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ parigṛhṇāti. evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:632: pāramitānāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ satyānām abhijñānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:635: tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmā nāveṇikabuddhadharmān parigṛhṇanti. tathā hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra sarvajñatāyāḥ parigraho nāsti. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:636: tathā hi sarvajñatā na sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti. adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām
K03psp_2-3u:637: upādāya. etaṃ hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāparigrahāya
K03psp_2-3u:640: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
K03psp_2-3u:642: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati sarvadharmāṇām aparigrahayogena. iti tatraiva
K03psp_2-3u:644: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇām aparigrahāya nāntardhānāya śikṣitvā kathaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati?
K03psp_2-3u:646: tathā hy āyuṣmañ śariputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasyotpādaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:647: paśyati na nirodhaṃ nodgrahaṃ notsargaṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na vyavadānaṃ nācayaṃ nāpacayaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:648: na hāniṃ na vṛddhiṃ. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:649: tathā hy āyuṣmañ śariputra rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāvena na vidyate,
K03psp_2-3u:650: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāyuṣmañ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K03psp_2-3u:651: notpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ nodgrahaṃ notsargaṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na vyavadānaṃ nācayaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:652: nāpacayaṃ na hāniṃ na vṛddhim. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:653: athā hy āyuṣmañ śariputra vijñānaṃ vijñānasvabhāvena na vidyate. evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:657: pratisaṃvidām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvat sarvajñatāyā notpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:658: nodgrahaṃ notsargaṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na vyavadānaṃ nācayaṃ nāpacayaṃ na hāniṃ na vṛddhiṃ. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:659: tathā hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra sarvajñatā sarvajñatāsvabhāvena na saṃvidyate,
K03psp_2-3u:660: evaṃ hy āyuṣmañ śariputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇām anutpādāyānirodhāyānudgrahāyānutsargāyāsaṃkleśāyāvyavadānāya
K03psp_2-3u:661: nācayāya nāpacayāya na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:664: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:668: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:674: na mamaiṣa kauśikānubhāvaḥ na mamaitad adhiṣṭhānam.
K03psp_2-3u:677: tathāgatasyaiṣa kauśikānubhāvas tathāgatasyaitad adhiṣṭhānaṃ na cānyatra niradhiṣṭhānadharmatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate,
K03psp_2-3u:681: katham āryasubhūte niradhiṣṭhāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu evaṃ vadasi?
K03psp_2-3u:694: na ca tathāgate rūpadharmatā na vedanātathatāyāṃ na saṃjñātathatayāṃ na saṃskāratathatāyāṃ na vijñānatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate, na ca
K03psp_2-3u:704: na ca tathāgate sarvajñatādharmatā. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:705: yaḥ kauśika tathāgato na rūpatathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyukto vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānatathatāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:706: saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. yaḥ kauśika tathāgato na rūpadharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyukto
K03psp_2-3u:708: na cānyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. na cānyatra rūpadharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto
K03psp_2-3u:709: na visaṃyuktaḥ. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā na cānyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyukto
K03psp_2-3u:710: na cānyatra vijñānadharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. vistareṇa yāvad yas tathāgato
K03psp_2-3u:711: na sa sarvajñatātathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:713: na cānyatra sarvajñatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ na cānyatra sarvajñatādharmatāyāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:714: saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ yo hi kauśika sarvadharmeṣu na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ tasyaiṣo
K03psp_2-3u:715: 'nubhāvas tasyaitad adhiṣṭhānam anadhiṣṭhānayogena. yat punaḥ kauśika evaṃ vadasi:
K03psp_2-3u:717: na rūpato gaveṣitavyā nānyatra rūpato gaveṣitavyā,
K03psp_2-3u:718: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārebhyo na vijñānato gaveṣitavyā nānyatra vijñānād gaveṣitavyā. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:719: tathā hi kauśika yā ca prajñāpāramitā yac ca rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca
K03psp_2-3u:720: saṃskārā yac ca vijñānaṃ yā ca gaveṣaṇā sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā
K03psp_2-3u:722: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā na dhātuto geveṣitavyā
K03psp_2-3u:723: nāyatanebhyo na pratītyasamutpādebhyo na pāramitābhyo na bodhipakṣyebhyo dharmebhyo
K03psp_2-3u:725: satyebhyo nābhijñābhyo na samādhibhyo na dhāraṇīmukhebhyo na balebhyo na vaiśāradyebhyo
K03psp_2-3u:726: na pratisaṃvidbhyo nāṣṭādaśabhya āveṇikebhyo buddhadharmebhyo yāvan na sarvākārajñatāyā
K03psp_2-3u:727: gaveṣitavyā nānyatra sarvākārajñatāyā gaveṣitavyā. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:728: tathā hi kauśika yā ca prajñāpāramitā yā ca sarvākārajñatā yā ca gaveṣaṇā sarva ete
K03psp_2-3u:729: dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:730: tathā hi kauśika na rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpāt prajñāpāramitā na vedanā
K03psp_2-3u:731: na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nāpy anyatra vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:734: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvida āveṇikabuddhadharmā yāvan na sarvākārajñatā prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:735: nānyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā. evaṃ na rūpatathatā prajñāpāramitā nāpy
K03psp_2-3u:736: anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā na vedanātathatā na saṃjñātathatā na saṃskāratathatā
K03psp_2-3u:737: na vijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā na cānyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā. na
K03psp_2-3u:738: rūpadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā na vedanādharmatā
K03psp_2-3u:739: na saṃjñādharmatā na saṃskāradharmatā na vijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra
K03psp_2-3u:741: yāvan na sarvajñatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvajñatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:742: na sarvajñatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvajñatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:743: tathā hi kauśika sarva ete dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante. evam eva sarvadharmeṣv asaṃvidyamāneṣv anupalabhyamāneṣu na rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpāt prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:744: na rūpatathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā. na rūpadharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra rūpadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā. na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
K03psp_2-3u:745: na vijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā nānyatra vijñānāt prajñāpāramitā. na vijñānatathatā prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:746: nānyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā. na vijñānadharmatā prajñāpāramitā (PSP_2-3:30)
K03psp_2-3u:747: nānyatra vijñānadharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā. evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:750: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā na sarvākārajñatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:751: prajñāpāramitā. na sarvākārajñatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvākārajñatātathatāyāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:752: prajñāpāramitā. na sarvākārajñatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvākārajñatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāparamitā.
K03psp_2-3u:753: iti sānuśaṃsaṃ darśanamārgam adhikṛtya duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:754: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:755: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:758: anantapāramiteyaṃ bhadanta subhūte yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:760: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmibhir anāgāmibhir arhadbhiḥ pratyekabuddhaiḥ pratyekabodhiḥ prāptā.
K03psp_2-3u:765: mahāpāramiteyam apramāṇapāramiteyam aparimāṇapāramiteyaṃ anantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:767: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmibhir anāgāmibhir arhadbhiḥ pratyekabuddhaiḥ pratyekabodhiḥ prāptā.
K03psp_2-3u:770: rūpamahattayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:771: tathā hi kauśika rūpasya na pūrvanta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
K03psp_2-3u:772: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānamahattayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:774: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:775: pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ pāramitānāṃ satyānām abhijñānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:777: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām
K03psp_2-3u:778: āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāmahattayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:780: tathā hi kauśika sarvākārajñatāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na
K03psp_2-3u:781: madhyam upalabhyate. anena kauśika paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām.
K03psp_2-3u:783: rūpāpramāṇatayā kauśikāpramāṇapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:784: tathā hi kauśika rūpasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate,
K03psp_2-3u:786: evam eva kauśika rūpasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate. ākāśāpramāṇatayā ca rūpāpramāṇatā,
K03psp_2-3u:787: rūpāpramāṇatayā ca prajñāpāramitāpramāṇatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānāpramāṇatayā kauśika,
K03psp_2-3u:788: apramāṇapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:789: tathā hi kauśika vijñānasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate,
K03psp_2-3u:792: evam eva kauśika vijñānasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate. ākāśāpramāṇatayā ca vjñānāpramāṇatā,
K03psp_2-3u:793: vijñānāpramāṇatayā ca prajñāpāramitāpramāṇatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. evaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:797: apramāṇapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:798: tathā hi kauśika sarvākārajñatāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate,
K03psp_2-3u:801: evam eva kauśika sarvākarajñatāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate. ākāśāpramāṇatayā ca sarvākārajñatāpramāṇatā,
K03psp_2-3u:802: sarvākārajñatāpramāṇatayā ca prajñāpāramitāpramāṇatā. anena kauśika paryāyeṇāpramāṇapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām.
K03psp_2-3u:805: aparimāṇapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:806: tathā hi kauśika rūpasya parimāṇaṃ nopalabhyate,
K03psp_2-3u:808: evam eva kauśika rūpasya parimāṇaṃ nopalabhyate. ākāśāparimāṇatayā ca rūpāparimāṇatā,
K03psp_2-3u:809: rūpāparimāṇatayā ca prajñāramitāparimāṇatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā vaktavyā. iti duḥkhe 'nvayajñānam
K03psp_2-3u:810: rūpānantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:811: tathā hi rūpasya nānto na madhyam upalabhyate. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānānantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:812: tathā hi kauśika vijñānasya nānto na madhyam upalabhyate. evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:816: anantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānaṃ. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:817: tathā hi kauśika sarvākārajñatāyā nānto na madhyam upalabhyate. anena kauśika paryāyeṇa
K03psp_2-3u:818: anantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ rūpānantatām upādāya yāvat sarvākārajñatānantatām
K03psp_2-3u:820: punar aparaṃ kauśikārambaṇānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_2-3u:822: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte ārambaṇānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā?
K03psp_2-3u:824: sarvākārajñatārambaṇānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā. iti samudayapratiṣedhaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:825: punar aparaṃ kauśikārambaṇānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_2-3u:830: dharmadhātvārambaṇānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā. iti prabhavapratiṣedhaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:831: punar aparaṃ kauśika tathatārambaṇānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_2-3u:833: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte tathatārambaṇānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā?
K03psp_2-3u:836: evaṃ tathatārambaṇānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā. iti pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:837: punar aparaṃ kauśika sattvānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_2-3u:839: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte sattvānantatayānantapāramitāyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā?
K03psp_2-3u:842: kauśika katamasyaitad dharmasyādhivacanaṃ yad uta sattvaḥ sattva iti.
K03psp_2-3u:844: nedaṃ bhadanta subhūte dharmādhivacanam āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:846: anārambaṇam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta sattvaḥ sattva iti.
K03psp_2-3u:848: tat kiṃ manyase kauśika kācid iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā?
K03psp_2-3u:852: yatra kauśika na sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā na kācit tatra sattvānantatā. sacet kauśika
K03psp_2-3u:853: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān tiṣṭhan sattvaḥ sattva
K03psp_2-3u:854: iti vācaṃ bhāṣeta. tat kiṃ manyase kauśika,
K03psp_2-3u:855: api nu tatra kaścit sattva utpanno vā niruddho vā?
K03psp_2-3u:861: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa sattvānantatayā prajñāpāramitānantatā veditavyā. iti tatraiva sattvadhātūddeśikatāṃ paridīpayatīti samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:862: atha khalu sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ sanārīnararṣigaṇās trir udānam udānayāmāsuḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:865: aho dharmasya dharmatā yeyaṃ subhūtinā sthavireṇa deśyate yad uta tathāgatānubhāvena
K03psp_2-3u:866: tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena sūcyate prabhāvyate prakāśyate tathāgatān eva tān bhagavan bodhisattvān
K03psp_2-3u:868: na ca nāma kaścid dharma upalabhyate rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā yāvat sarvākārajñatā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:869: kutaḥ punas trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ prajñāyate śrāvakayānasya vā pratyekabuddhayānasya vā mahāyānasya vā.
K03psp_2-3u:870: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tān devaputrān āmantrayāmāsa:
K03psp_2-3u:872: yathā vācaṃ bhāṣadhve na ca nāma kaścid dharma upalabhyate rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā
K03psp_2-3u:873: vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā yāvat sarvākārajñatā vā trayāṇāṃ ca yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:874: prajñāyate śrāvakayānasya vā pratyekabuddhayānasya vā mahāyānasya vā. tathāgataḥ
K03psp_2-3u:875: sa devaputrā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhārayitavyo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahito
K03psp_2-3u:877: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni śrāvakayānaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānaṃ vā mahāyānaṃ vā. na cānyatra dānapāramitāyās tathāgata upalabhyate,
K03psp_2-3u:878: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā na cānyatra
K03psp_2-3u:879: prajñāpāramitāyās tathāgata upalabhyate. na cānyatrādhyātmaśūnyatāyā na cānyatra
K03psp_2-3u:881: yāvan na cānyatrābhāvasvābhāvaśūnyatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate. na cānyatra smṛtyupasthānebhyas
K03psp_2-3u:884: tathāgata upalabhyate. na cānyatra sarvākārajñatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate. bodhisattvā
K03psp_2-3u:885: mahāsattvāś ca devaputrāḥ sarveṣv eva dharmeṣu śikṣante dānapāramitāyām ādiṃ kṛtvā
K03psp_2-3u:887: devaputrāḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgata eveti vaktavyo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahitaś
K03psp_2-3u:888: carati. yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike
K03psp_2-3u:889: dīpavatyāṃ rājadhānyām antarāyaṇamadhyagato dānapāramitayāvirahito bhaveyam. evaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:891: bhaveyam. evam adhyātmaśūnyatayāvirahito bhaveyam. evaṃ bahirdhāśānyatayādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā
K03psp_2-3u:892: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayāvirahito bhaveyam. evaṃ smṛtyupasthānair avirahito bhaveyam.
K03psp_2-3u:894: dhyānaiś caturbir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhiś cāveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:895: mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā cānyaiś cāpramāṇair buddhadharmair avirahito bhaveyaṃ tac
K03psp_2-3u:896: cānupalambhayogena. tadāhaṃ devaputrās tena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto;
K03psp_2-3u:897: bhaviṣyasi tvam anāgate 'dhvany asminn eva sahālokadhātav asaṃkhyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunir
K03psp_2-3u:898: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
K03psp_2-3u:899: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāṃ ca buddho bhagavān.
K03psp_2-3u:901: atha khalu te devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:902: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvākārajñatāyā
K03psp_2-3u:903: anuparigrāhikā rūpasyāparigrahānutsargayogena. vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāparigrahānutsargayogena.
K03psp_2-3u:909: atha khalu bhagavāṃś catasraḥ pariṣado bhikṣubhibhṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā bodhisattvān
K03psp_2-3u:910: mahāsattvāṃś caturo mahārājāṃś cāturmahārājakāyikāṃś ca devaputrān yāvad akaniṣṭhāṃś
K03psp_2-3u:912: ca sarvān sākṣiṇaḥ sthāpayitvā śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:913: ye kecit kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā vā kulaputrā
K03psp_2-3u:914: vā kuladuhitaro vā devaputrā devakanyā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:915: vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:917: ye ca sarvākārajñatācittenāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti teṣāṃ mārā vā mārakāyikā vā avatāraṃ na lapsyante. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:918: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca rūpaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. evaṃ vedanā saṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:919: na hi śūnyatā śūnyatāyām avatāraṃ labhate,
K03psp_2-3u:925: svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. yāvat sarvākārajñatāśūnyataiva taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś
K03psp_2-3u:926: ca svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:927: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyām avatāraṃ labhate,
K03psp_2-3u:929: nāpraṇihitam apraṇihite 'vatāraṃ labhate. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:930: tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
K03psp_2-3u:935: na khalu punaḥ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vāvatāraṃ
K03psp_2-3u:936: lapsyate. tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca sarvasattvānām antike maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣā
K03psp_2-3u:938: na ca te kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:939: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ caradbhiḥ sarvasattvāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:940: samyakparicaryayā upasthitāḥ. yair vā kauśika cāturmahārājakāyikair devaputrair iha
K03psp_2-3u:941: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau trayastriṃśair vā yāmair vā tuṣitair vā nirmāṇaratibhir
K03psp_2-3u:942: vā paranirmitavaśavartibhir vā brahmakāyikair vā brahmapurohitair vā brahmapārṣadyair
K03psp_2-3u:943: vā yāvad akaniṣṭhair vā devaputrair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:944: na cāyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrutā nodgrahītā na dhāritā na vācitā na paryavāptā,
K03psp_2-3u:945: tair devaputrair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā sarvajñatācittenāvirahitaiḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:947: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:948: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti avirahitāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:950: na khalu punaḥ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā śūnyāgāragatānāṃ vā abhyavakāśagatānāṃ vā utpathagatānāṃ vā bhayaṃ vā stambhitatvaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:951: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś cādhyātmaśūnyatā subhāvitā anupalambhayogena,
K03psp_2-3u:953: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā subhāvitā anupalambhayogena yāvad abhāvasvabhāvasunyatā subhāvitā anūpalambhayogena.
K03psp_2-3u:954: atha khalu tāvad eva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās
K03psp_2-3u:955: trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paramrmitavaśavartino yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikā
K03psp_2-3u:957: vayaṃ bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
K03psp_2-3u:958: saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
K03psp_2-3u:959: likhiṣyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti avirahitāś ca bhaviṣyanti sarvajñatācittena. (PSP_2-3:38)
K03psp_2-3u:961: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya nirayā ucchidyante,
K03psp_2-3u:962: tiryagyoniyamalokā asurāḥ kāyā manuṣyadāridryā upadravā upasargāḥ. sarve 'py ucchidyante.
K03psp_2-3u:963: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathanāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
K03psp_2-3u:964: bhavati. caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ dānapāramitāyāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:966: loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
K03psp_2-3u:967: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati. caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:968: caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:969: saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:970: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛnāṃ pratisaṃvidām
K03psp_2-3u:971: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati. anekeṣāṃ samādhīnām
K03psp_2-3u:972: anekeṣāṃ dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ sarvajñatāyā bodhisattvamārgasya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:973: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni loke prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:977: cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrāḥ prajñāyante. evaṃ trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:978: paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇo yāvad
K03psp_2-3u:980: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñāyate,
K03psp_2-3u:981: srotaāpannaḥ. prajñāyate. evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalam anāgāmī arhattvam arhal loke prajñāyate,
K03psp_2-3u:983: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sattvaparipākaḥ prajñāyate,
K03psp_2-3u:990: saṃgharatnaṃ prajñāyate. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa boodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvayakṣagaruḍakiṃnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyeṇa
K03psp_2-3u:992: evam ukte bhagavāñ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:994: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya nirayatiryagyoniyamaloke gataya ucchidyante,
K03psp_2-3u:995: devadāridryaṃ manuṣyadāridryam upadravā upasargāḥ sarve 'py ucchidyante. bodhisattvaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:996: mahāsattvam āgamya daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. daśānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:998: dharmāṇāṃ satyānām abhijñānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1000: sarvākārajñatāyā bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni
K03psp_2-3u:1001: brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni bodhisattvaṃ mahāsāttvam āgamya loke prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:1003: cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrāḥ prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:1005: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalam anāgāmī arhattvam arhaś ca loke prajñāyate,
K03psp_2-3u:1011: buddharatnasya dharmaratnasya saṃgharatnasya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya loke
K03psp_2-3u:1012: prādurbhāvo bhavati tasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa
K03psp_2-3u:1013: lokena satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu
K03psp_2-3u:1015: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sa kauśika satkartavyāṃ gurukartavyāṃ mānayitavyāṃ pūjayitavyāṃ manyeta yo bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkartavyaṃ gurukartavyaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1017: lokena satkartavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā. yaś ca kauśika imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratipūrṇaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:1018: tadyathāpi nāma ikṣuvanaṃ vā naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā sālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed,
K03psp_2-3u:1019: yaś ca prathamacittotpādikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam avirahitaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1020: satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pujayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati tat
K03psp_2-3u:1022: tathā hi na kauśika śrāvakapratyekabuddhān āgamya bodhisattvās tathāgatāś cārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:1023: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ punar āgamya śrāvakapratyekabuddhās tathāgatāś cārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:1024: tasmāt tarhi kauśika sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkartavyo
K03psp_2-3u:1025: gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā.
K03psp_2-3u:1027: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1028: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad amī bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇantaḥ paryavāpnuvanto dhārayanto vācayanto yoniśaś ca manasikurvantaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1030: sattvāṃś ca paripācayanti buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayanti,
K03psp_2-3u:1031: buddhakṣetrāc ca buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsanāya,
K03psp_2-3u:1032: yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣeyus tān buddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayituṃ taiḥ pūjayeyus.
K03psp_2-3u:1033: tac caiṣāṃ tathaiva ṛdhyate. yaṃ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike sthitvā dharmaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1034: śṛṇvanti sa caiṣāṃ dharmas tāvad eva na pramuṣyate yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_2-3u:1035: abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. iti kulasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti jananīsaṃpadaṃ ca parivārasaṃpadaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1036: ca lakṣaṇasaṃpadaṃ ca prabhāsaṃpadaṃ ca cakṣuḥsaṃpadaṃ ca svarasaṃpadaṃ ca samādhisaṃpadaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1038: ātmānaṃ buddhavigrahaṃ nirmāya lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti,
K03psp_2-3u:1039: yatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatām utpādo nāsti te tatra gatvā dānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
K03psp_2-3u:1040: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā
K03psp_2-3u:1041: varṇaṃ bhāṣante. adhyātmaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante. evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
K03psp_2-3u:1042: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante. dhyānānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. apramāṇānām
K03psp_2-3u:1043: ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. smṛtyupasthānānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. evaṃ samyakprahāṇānām
K03psp_2-3u:1044: ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
K03psp_2-3u:1045: caturṇām āryasatyānām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1046: yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. upāyakuśalena ca dharmaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1048: śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena buddhayānena. iti nirodhe dharmajñānam
K03psp_2-3u:1049: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1050: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad anayā gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitāyā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1051: parigṛhīta bhavanti. yad uta dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:1052: dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā sarve bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
K03psp_2-3u:1054: pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ yāvad vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātava āyatanāni
K03psp_2-3u:1055: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca parigṛhītāni bhavanti. srotaāpattiphalaṃ parigṛhītaṃ bhavati.
K03psp_2-3u:1056: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ sarvākārajñatā parigṛhitā bhavati.
K03psp_2-3u:1057: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1058: prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigṛhitā bhavanti. evaṃ sarve bodhipakṣyā
K03psp_2-3u:1060: satyābhijñāḥ sarve kuśalāḥ karmapathā daśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
K03psp_2-3u:1063: punar aparaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitayā udgṛhītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā
K03psp_2-3u:1064: likhitayā yoniśo manasikṛtayā yān guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pratilabhate
K03psp_2-3u:1065: dṛṣṭa eva dharme tān śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te. evaṃ bhagavann
K03psp_2-3u:1066: iti śakro devānām indro bhagavataḥt pratyaśroṣīt bhagavān etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1067: yaḥ kaścit kauśikānyatīrthikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā
K03psp_2-3u:1068: abhimāniko vā pudgalo bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam itaḥ prajñāpāramitāto vivecayitukāmo bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1072: teṣāṃ vivecayitukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānām utpannotpannā vigrahā vivādā virodhāḥ kṣipraṃ punar evāntardhāsyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:1073: teṣāṃ vivecayitukāmānāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:1074: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dīrgharātraṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā,
K03psp_2-3u:1075: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1076: caratā. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ vigrahān vivādān virodhān āpadyante te
K03psp_2-3u:1077: 'dhyātmikabāhyā dharmāḥ sarve sarvadā parityaktā. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1078: sattvadauḥśīlyam āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya
K03psp_2-3u:1079: tān sattvān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ krodhavyāpādavihiṃsām
K03psp_2-3u:1080: āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān
K03psp_2-3u:1081: kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayati. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ kausīdyam āpadyante tān
K03psp_2-3u:1082: bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān vīryapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1083: pratiṣṭhāpayati. yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ vikṣiptacittam āpadyante tān bodhisattvo
K03psp_2-3u:1084: mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayati.
K03psp_2-3u:1085: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ dauṣprajñām āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva
K03psp_2-3u:1086: ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān mahāprajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
K03psp_2-3u:1087: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ kauśika sattvā dīrgharātraṃ saṃsāre saṃsaranti yad utānunayapratighaparyavasthāne
