K03psp_2-3u:1089: upāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ vinīya tān sattvāṃś caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati. caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_2-3u:1090: caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ samyakprahāneṣv ṛddhipādeṣv indriyeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:1091: baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣv āryāṣṭāṅgeṣu mārgeṣu śūnyatāyāṃ vānimitte 'praṇihite samādhidhāraṇīmukheṣu
K03psp_2-3u:1092: ca pratiṣṭhāpayati. caturṣv āryasatyeṣv abhijñāsu daśabalavaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv
K03psp_2-3u:1093: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati. srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale
K03psp_2-3u:1095: samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati. ime te kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1096: carato dṛṣṭā dhārmikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti. saṃparāye cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_2-3u:1097: abhisaṃbudhyate. dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvān yathāpraṇidhāne pratiṣṭhāpya nirupadhiśeṣe
K03psp_2-3u:1098: nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayiṣyanti. ime kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sāmparāyikā
K03psp_2-3u:1100: punar aparaṃ kauśika yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ prajñāpāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:1101: na tatra pṛthivīpradeśe mārā vā mārakāyikā vā devatā anyatīrthikā vā parivrājakā
K03psp_2-3u:1102: vā ābhimānikā vā pudgalāḥ śakṣyanti cittavikṣepaṃ kartuṃ asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1103: vigrahāya vivādāya virodhāya. uttare ca teṣāṃ guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti yad utāsyāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1104: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇenānupūrveṇa tribhir yānair niryāya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:1105: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika maghi nām' auṣadhī tatra āśīviṣeṇa jantunā bubhukṣitenāhārārthinā
K03psp_2-3u:1106: āhāragaveṣiṇā kaścid eva prāṇakajāto dṛṣṭo bhavet,
K03psp_2-3u:1107: sa taṃ prāṇakajātaṃ punaḥ khāditukāmaḥ prāṇakajātam anudhāvet.
K03psp_2-3u:1108: atha khalu sa prāṇajātaḥ yena sā maghi nām' auṣadhi tenopasaṃkrāmed atha sa āśīviṣas tasyā auṣadhyā gandhena pratyudāvartate. tat (PSP_2-3:44)
K03psp_2-3u:1110: tathā hi tasyā auṣadhyā bhaiṣajyaguṇaḥ yat tasyāśīviṣasya tad viṣam abhibhavati.
K03psp_2-3u:1111: evaṃ balavatī hi sā kauśika auṣadhī evam eva kauśika yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K03psp_2-3u:1112: vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś
K03psp_2-3u:1113: ca manasikariṣyati. tatra kauśika ye utpannotpannā vigrahā vivādā virodhā bhaviṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:1114: te prajñāpāramitāyās tejasā prajñāpāramitāyā balena kṣipram evāntardhāsyanty upaśamiṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:1115: yato yata evotpatsyante tatra tatraivāntardhāsyanti na vivardhiṣyanty upaśamiṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:1118: tathā hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇam upaśamayitrī na vivardhikā,
K03psp_2-3u:1120: yad uta rāgasya doṣasya mohasyāvidyāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya nāmarūpaṣaḍāyatanasparśavedanātṛṣṇopādānabhavajātijarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyānām
K03psp_2-3u:1122: ātmadṛṣṭeḥ sattvadṛṣṭer jīvadṛṣṭeḥ poṣadṛṣṭeḥ puruṣadṛṣṭeḥ pudgaladṛṣṭer manujadṛṣṭer
K03psp_2-3u:1123: mānavadṛṣṭeḥ kārakadṛṣṭer vedakadṛṣṭer jānakadṛṣṭeḥ paśyakadṛṣṭer ucchedadṛṣṭeḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭer
K03psp_2-3u:1124: astidṛṣṭer nāstidṛṣṭer yāvat sarvadṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlyavyāpādasya kauśīdyasya
K03psp_2-3u:1131: sarvākārajñatāgrāhasya nirvāṇagrāhasyopaśamayitrī na vivardhikā. iti mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1132: atha khalu ya iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahārājāno (PSP_2-3:45)
K03psp_2-3u:1133: lokapālāḥ śakrā devendrā ye ca brahmāṇo brahmā ca sahāpatir yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrās
K03psp_2-3u:1134: te satatasamitaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti
K03psp_2-3u:1135: yatra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:1136: paryavāpsyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. ye 'pi te daśasu
K03psp_2-3u:1137: dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi tasya kulaputrasya
K03psp_2-3u:1138: vā kuladuhitur vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:1139: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:1142: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambhayogena. adhyātmaśūnyatayā vivardhiṣyate na
K03psp_2-3u:1145: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhir vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati.
K03psp_2-3u:1146: satyābhijñābhir daśabalair vaiśāradyaiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair
K03psp_2-3u:1147: vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambhayogena. sarvasamādhibhiḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhair
K03psp_2-3u:1149: yāvat sarvākārajñatayā vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyati anupalambhayogena. iti mārge dharmajñānam
K03psp_2-3u:1150: sa ādeyavacanaś ca mitavacanaś ca bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1158: ye 'pi cānye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1162: cānye 'dattādānāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1166: ye 'pi cānye kāmamithyācārāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1170: ye 'pi cānye mṛṣāvādāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1174: ye 'pi cānye piśunavacanāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1178: ye 'pi cānye paruṣavacanāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1182: ye 'pi cānye saṃbhinnapralāpāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1186: ye 'pi cānye 'bhidhyāyāḥ prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1190: ye 'pi cānye vyāpādāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1194: ye 'pi cānye mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratā bhaviṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī (PSP_2-3:47)
K03psp_2-3u:1198: dānapāramitāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate. ye 'pi cānye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1202: ye 'pi cānye śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1206: ye 'pi cānye kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1210: ye 'pi cānye vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1214: ye 'pi cānye dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1218: ye 'pi cānye prajñāpārmitāyāṃ caranti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1221: adhyātmaśūnyātāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate. ye 'pi cānye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1222: ātmanā ca bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bhaviṣyati, parāṃś ca (PSP_2-3:48)
K03psp_2-3u:1225: ye 'pi cānye bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1229: ye 'pi cānye 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1230: ātmanā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1233: ye 'pi cānye 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1237: ye 'pi cānye sarvasamādhisamāpattīḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1241: ye 'pi cānye dhāraṇīpratilabdhā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1245: ye 'pi cānye prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya viharanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1246: ātmanā ca dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate yāvat tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā ca caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate,
K03psp_2-3u:1249: ye 'pi cānye caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya viharanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1254: samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1258: ye 'pi cānye karuṇāmuditopekṣāḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1262: ye 'pi cānye ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1263: ātmanā ca vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā cākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyate. ātmanā ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ upasaṃpadya vihariṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1266: ye 'pi cānye naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1270: ye 'pi cānye smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1271: evam ātmanā ca catvāri samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayiṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1276: ye 'pi cānye mārgaṃ bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1280: ye 'pi cānye catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1284: ye 'pi cānye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān samādhīn bhāvayanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1288: ye 'pi cānye 'ṣṭavimokṣān samāpadyante teṣāṃ api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1292: ye 'pi cānye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1293: ātmanā ca daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samāpatsyate,
K03psp_2-3u:1294: parāṃś ca daśatathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu samādāpayiṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:1295: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
K03psp_2-3u:1296: ye 'pi cānye daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samāpadyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1299: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
K03psp_2-3u:1300: ye 'pi cānye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1304: ye 'pi cānye 'saṃmoṣadharmatāyāṃ pratiṣṭāpitā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1306: parāṃś ca sarvākārajñatāyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati sarvākārajñatāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
K03psp_2-3u:1307: ye 'pi cānye sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ. iti mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1308: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yad dānaṃ dadāti
K03psp_2-3u:1309: tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena.
K03psp_2-3u:1310: yac chīlaṃ rakṣati tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty (PSP_2-3:51)
K03psp_2-3u:1311: anupalambhayogena. yāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati tāṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1312: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena. yad vīryam ārabhate tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1313: kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena. yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
K03psp_2-3u:1314: tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena.
K03psp_2-3u:1315: yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati tāṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K03psp_2-3u:1316: pariṇāmayaty anupalambhayogena. evaṃ carataḥ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur
K03psp_2-3u:1317: vā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu smṛtir evam utpadyate:
K03psp_2-3u:1321: na ca me buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1322: na ca sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye. tasyaivaṃ bhavati:
K03psp_2-3u:1332: yayā rūpasaṃpadā bodhisattvacārikāṃ me carataḥ. sattvāḥ saha darśanena niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_2-3u:1335: kutaḥ punaḥ sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye. tasyaivaṃ bhavati:
K03psp_2-3u:1338: na vīryam ārapsye kathaṃ buddhadharmān paripūrayiṣyāmi,
K03psp_2-3u:1345: kutaḥ punaḥ sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye. tasyaivaṃ bhavati:
K03psp_2-3u:1347: prajñopāyakauśalyena śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya sattvān paripācya
K03psp_2-3u:1348: buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sarvajñatām abhisaṃboddhuṃ nāhaṃ śikṣiṣyāmi sa evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate,
K03psp_2-3u:1352: evaṃ dauḥśīlyavaśena śīlapāramitāṃ vyāpādavaśena kṣāntipāramitāṃ kauśīdyavaśena vīryapāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1353: vikṣepavaśena dhyānapāramitāṃ dauṣprajñāvaśena prajñāpāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ.
K03psp_2-3u:1354: aparipūrayan dānapāramitām evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ cāparipūrayan
K03psp_2-3u:1355: na niryāsyāmi sarvākārajñatāyām. evaṃ hi kauśika sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadharmikān
K03psp_2-3u:1356: sāṃparāyikāṃś ca guṇānuśaṃsān pratilabhate ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati vācayiṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:1357: paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1360: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1361: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paridamanāya pariṇamanāya ca pratyupasthitā.
K03psp_2-3u:1363: kathaṃ punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paridamanāya pariṇamanāya ca pratyupasthitā?
K03psp_2-3u:1364: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1365: iha bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyo dānāṃ dadāti. tasyaivaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1367: sa etena dānenānupāyakauśalyenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_2-3u:1371: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikīṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayata evaṃ bhavaty:
K03psp_2-3u:1374: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikaṃ vīryam ārambhamāṇasyaivaṃ bhavati:
K03psp_2-3u:1377: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasyaivaṃ bhavaty:
K03psp_2-3u:1380: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya (PSP_2-3:53)
K03psp_2-3u:1384: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikyāṃ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyāṃ sthitasyaivaṃ bhavaty:
K03psp_2-3u:1406: sa tenāhaṃkāramamakārābhiniveśenonnatiṃ gacchati. evaṃ hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K03psp_2-3u:1407: laukikeṣu dharmeṣu carann unnatiṃ gacchati. ahaṃkāramamakārābhiniveśena. tasya khalu
K03psp_2-3u:1408: punaḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanāya pariṇāmanāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.
K03psp_2-3u:1409: iha punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lokottareṣu dharmeṣu caran dānaṃ dadad dāyakaṃ nopalabhate,
K03psp_2-3u:1411: deyaṃ ca nopalabhate. evaṃ hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran paridamanāya
K03psp_2-3u:1412: pratyupasthito bhavati pariṇāmanāya. evaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣan kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayamāno vīryam
K03psp_2-3u:1413: ārambhamāṇo dhyānaṃ dhyāyan prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prajñāṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān
K03psp_2-3u:1415: āryasatyāny abhijñāṃ bhāvayan nopalabhate. balāni vaiśāradyāṃ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1416: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayan nopalabhate. sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhin sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
K03psp_2-3u:1417: bhāvayan nopalabhate. evaṃ mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ ca bhāvayan nopalabhate yāvat
K03psp_2-3u:1418: sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayan nopalabhate. evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1419: caran paridamanāya pariṇāmanāya ca pratyupasthito bhavati. iti sarvato damananamanakāritram
K03psp_2-3u:1420: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1421: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇan
K03psp_2-3u:1422: vā dhārayan vā vācayan vā paryavāpnuvan vā pravartayan vā svādhyāyan vā yoniśo manasikurvan
K03psp_2-3u:1423: vā saṃgrāmaśīrṣam ārūḍhaḥ saṃgrāme vartamāne saṃgrāme 'vatīrṇo vā śayito vātikrānto
K03psp_2-3u:1424: vā niṣaṇṇo vā sthito vā syāt,
K03psp_2-3u:1425: asthānaṃ kauśikānavakāśo yat tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām
K03psp_2-3u:1426: udgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayataḥ svādhyāyato yoniśo manasikurvato
K03psp_2-3u:1427: vā kaścid eva kāṇḍaṃ vā śastraṃ vā loṣṭaṃ vā kṣipet kṣiptāni vā tasya tāni śarīre
K03psp_2-3u:1429: paropakramena vāsya jīvitāntarāyo bhaven naitat sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:1430: tathā hi tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā dīrgharātram iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā
K03psp_2-3u:1431: ātmano rāgakāṇḍāni rāgaśastrāṇi nirjitāni bhavanti. pareṣām api rāgakāṇḍāni rāgaśastrāṇi
K03psp_2-3u:1432: nirjitāni. ātmano doṣakāṇḍāni doṣaśastrāni mohakāṇḍāni mohaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. pareṣām
K03psp_2-3u:1433: api doṣakāṇḍāni doṣaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāni mohaśastrāṇi nirjitām. ātmano dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni
K03psp_2-3u:1434: dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi nirjitāni pareṣām api dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi nirjitāni.
K03psp_2-3u:1435: ātmanaḥ paryutthānakāṇḍāni paryutthānaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. pareṣām api paryutthānakāṇḍāni
K03psp_2-3u:1436: paryutthānaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. ātmano 'nuśayakāṇḍāny anuśayaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. pareṣām
K03psp_2-3u:1437: apy anuśayakāṇḍāny anuśayaśastrāṇi nirjitāni. anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tasya kulaputrasya
K03psp_2-3u:1438: vā kuladuhitur vā kāṇḍaṃ vā śastraṃ vā śarīre kṣiptaṃ na patati. iti kleśanirjayakāritram
K03psp_2-3u:1439: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1440: avirahitaś ca sarvajñatācittena bhaviṣyati tasya kaścid evābhaiṣajyam avakiret,
K03psp_2-3u:1441: kākhordaṃ vā kuryād agnikhadāṃ vopanāmayec chastreṇa vā hanyād viṣaṃ vā dadyād udake vainac chorayet sarvāṇy etāni tasya na krāmanti. tat kasya
K03psp_2-3u:1444: kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā. atra hi kauśika śikṣamāṇaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nātmavyābādhāya cetayate,
K03psp_2-3u:1449: tathā hi naivātmānam upalabhate. na parān nobhayam upalabhate. na rūpam upalabhate.
K03psp_2-3u:1450: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam upalabhate. na yāvad vyastasamastān
K03psp_2-3u:1452: buddhadharmān yāvat sarvākārajñatām api nopalabhate. anupalabhamāno nātmavyābādhāya cetayate,
K03psp_2-3u:1454: nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratilabhate sarvasattvāṃś cāvalokayati. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:1455: atra hi vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇair atītais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā
K03psp_2-3u:1456: samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā. ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
K03psp_2-3u:1457: te 'py atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
K03psp_2-3u:1458: ye 'pi te daśadiglokadhātuṣv etarhi pratyutpannās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
K03psp_2-3u:1459: te 'py atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
K03psp_2-3u:1461: punar aparaṃ kauśika yatremāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:1462: na tatra maṇuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:1463: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pūjārthāya trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
K03psp_2-3u:1464: devaputrās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā
K03psp_2-3u:1466: ye 'py anyeṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā yāvad
K03psp_2-3u:1467: akaniṣṭhā devāputrās te 'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1469: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti te ca devaputrā agatyemāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1470: prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti pūjayitvā
K03psp_2-3u:1471: pratigamiṣyanti. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati tasyeme
K03psp_2-3u:1472: dṛṣṭadhārmikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti. tadyathāpi nāma kauśika ye kecid bodhimaṇḍagatā
K03psp_2-3u:1473: vā bodhimaṇḍaparisāmantagatā vā bodhimaṇḍābhyantaragatā vā tiryagyonigatān apy upādāya
K03psp_2-3u:1474: na te śakyante manuṣyeṇa vā amanuṣyeṇa vā viheṭhayituṃ vā vihiṃsayituṃ vā. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:1475: atra hi niṣadya taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā
K03psp_2-3u:1476: samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā. anāgatair api pratyutpannair api tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1477: samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbhotsyate abhisaṃbudhyate ca. abhisaṃbudhya
K03psp_2-3u:1480: sattvān divyamānuṣyakāyaṃ saṃpattau pratiṣṭhāpayanti. srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale
K03psp_2-3u:1481: 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabuddhatve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayanti. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:1482: anayaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitayā sapṛthivīpradeśaś caityabhūtaḥ kṛtaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1485: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1486: yo hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatām
K03psp_2-3u:1488: samantāc ca dīpamālābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1489: yaś ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya śarīrāṇi stūpeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:1490: pratiṣṭhāpya pratigṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet tāni ca satkuryād gurukuryād (PSP_2-3:57)
K03psp_2-3u:1493: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1494: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra pratiprakṣyāmi,
K03psp_2-3u:1495: yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuryāḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:1496: kauśika yeyaṃ tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvajñatā yo cāyaṃ tathāgatasyātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1497: sa katarasyāṃ pratipadi śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:1498: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1499: ihaiva bhagavan śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prajñāpāramitāyām anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1502: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1503: tasmāt tarhi kauśika nānenātmabhāvaśarīrapratilambhena tathāgatas tathāgata iti saṃkhyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1504: gacchati. sarvajñatāyāṃ tu pratilabdhāyāṃ tathāgatas tathāgata iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
K03psp_2-3u:1505: yeyaṃ kauśika sarvajñatā sā prajñāpāramitā nirjātā. evam ayam ātmabhāvaśarīrapratilābhas
K03psp_2-3u:1508: bhavati. evam asya sarvajñajñānahetuko 'yam ātmabhāvapratilābhaḥ. āśrayabhūtatvāt
K03psp_2-3u:1509: sarvasattvānāṃ caityabhūto vandanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyo
K03psp_2-3u:1510: 'rcanīyo 'pacāyanīyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ. evaṃ ca mama parinirvṛtasyāpi sata eṣāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ pūjā bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:1511: tasmāt tarhi kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā satkāreṇa vācayiṣyati dhārayiṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1512: puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ samantāc ca dīpamālābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed arcayed apacāyet,
K03psp_2-3u:1513: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
K03psp_2-3u:1515: sarvajñajñānasya hi kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā (PSP_2-3:58)
K03psp_2-3u:1516: kuladuhitrā vā pūjā kṛtā bhavet. yaḥ kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya
K03psp_2-3u:1517: parinirvṛtasya saptaratnamaye stūpe śarīraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet saptaratnamaye vā samudge vā kṛtvā parivahet,
K03psp_2-3u:1519: yaś ca iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyāmānāyāṃ vā pustakagatāyāṃ vā satkāraṃ kuryād gurukāraṃ kuryād mānanāṃ pūjanām arcanām apacāyanāṃ kuryāt,
K03psp_2-3u:1522: sarvajñajñānasya tena pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati ato nirjātā hi pañcapāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:1525: ato nirjātā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ ato nirjātāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā,
K03psp_2-3u:1529: ato nirjātā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kulasaṃpad bhogasaṃpad parivārasaṃpad,
K03psp_2-3u:1532: ato nirjātā cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartmo brahmapārṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇo yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrā,
K03psp_2-3u:1536: ato nirjātācintyā atulyā anuttarā niruttarā asamā asamasamā sarvākārajñatā.
K03psp_2-3u:1538: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1539: ya ime bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na satkurvanti na gurukurvanti
K03psp_2-3u:1540: na mānayanti na pūjayanti nārcayanti nāpacāyante puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1541: kiṃ nu bhagavañ jñāsyanti evaṃ maharddhikā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyatīti,
K03psp_2-3u:1542: evaṃ mahānuśaṃsā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyatīti,
K03psp_2-3u:1544: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1545: tat kiṃ manyase kauśika kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe 'vetyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
K03psp_2-3u:1548: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā ye dharme niṣkāṅkṣā ye saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣā,
K03psp_2-3u:1549: ye buddhe niṣṭhāṃgatā ye dharme niṣṭhāṃgatā ye saṃghe niṣṭhāṃgatāḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:1550: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1551: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe 'vetyaprasādena samanvāgatā ye dharme 'vetyaprasādena samanvāgatā ye saṃghe 'vetyaprasādena
K03psp_2-3u:1552: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā ye dharme niṣkāṅkṣā ye saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣā,
K03psp_2-3u:1553: ye buddhe niṣṭhāṃgatā ye dharme niṣṭhāṃgatā ye saṃghe niṣṭhāṃgatāḥ.

K03psp_2-3u:1556: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1557: kiyantas te jāmbādvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1558: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1559: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1560: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1561: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannā,
K03psp_2-3u:1562: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye rāgadoṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1563: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1564: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1565: kiyantas te jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1566: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:1567: śakra āha: alpatarakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1572: tato 'lpatarakā ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ. tato 'lpatarakās jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1575: tato 'lpatarakās te ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1576: tato 'lpatarakās te ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1577: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1578: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1581: alpakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe dharme saṃghe 'vetyaprasādena samanvāgatāḥ,

K03psp_2-3u:1585: tebhyo 'py alpebhyo 'lpatarakās te ye saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣān dharmān bhāvayanti.
K03psp_2-3u:1586: tebhyo 'py alpebhyo 'lpatarakā ye trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayanti. tebhyo 'lpebhyo
K03psp_2-3u:1589: tebhyo 'py alpebhyo 'lpatarakā ye catasraḥ pratisaṃvido bhāvayanti,
K03psp_2-3u:1590: tebhyo 'lpebhyo 'lpatarakā ye ṣaḍ abhijñā bhāvayanti. tato 'lpatarakā ye srotaāpannāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1594: tato 'lpatarakā ye 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ. tato 'lpebhyo 'lpatarakā ye bodhāya caranti.
K03psp_2-3u:1596: tathā hi taiḥ saṃsāre saṃsaradbhir na buddho dṛṣṭaḥ na dharmaḥ śrutaḥ na saṃghaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1597: paryupāsitaḥ. na dānaṃ dattaṃ na śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ na kṣāntir bhāvitā na vīryam ārabdhaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1598: na dhyānaṃ sevitaṃ na prajñā bhāvitā,
K03psp_2-3u:1599: na dānapāramitā śrutā evaṃ na śīlapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na vīryapāramitā na
K03psp_2-3u:1600: dhyānapāramitā na prajñāpāramitā śrutā nopāyakauśalaṃ śrutaṃ nādhyātmaśūnyatā na
K03psp_2-3u:1601: bahirdhāśūnyatā nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā śrutā na
K03psp_2-3u:1602: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrutā na samādhayo na sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1603: śrutā nāryasatyāni nābhijñā na balāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāṣṭādaśāveṇikā
K03psp_2-3u:1604: buddhadharmāḥ śrutā na sarvajñatā śrutā na bhāvitā na bahulī kṛtāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1605: anena kauśika hetunālpakās te sattvā ye buddhe 'vetyaprasādena samanvāgatā ye dharme 'vetyaprasādena samanvāgatā ye saṃghe 'vetyaprasādena (PSP_2-3:61)
K03psp_2-3u:1607: alpakās te sattvā ye buddhe dharme saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣā,
K03psp_2-3u:1608: alpakās te sattvā ye buddhe dharme saṃghe niṣṭhāṃgatā,
K03psp_2-3u:1609: alpakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye daśakuśalakarmapathasevinaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1611: alpakās te ye saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṃ dharmāṃ bhāvayanti. alpakās te ye trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni
K03psp_2-3u:1612: bhāvayanti. alpakās te ye 'ṣṭa vimokṣāṃ bhāvayanti alpakās te ye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr
K03psp_2-3u:1613: bhāvayanti. alpakās te ye catasraḥ pratisaṃvido bhāvayanti. alpakās te ṣaḍ abhijñā
K03psp_2-3u:1614: bhāvayanti. alpakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1617: pañcānam ūrdhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ. alpakās te jāmbudvīpakā
K03psp_2-3u:1618: manuṣyā ye pratyekabuddhayānaṃ saṃprasthitāḥ. tebhyo 'lpebhyo 'lpatarakā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1619: samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ tebhyo 'lpebhyo 'lpatarakā ye bodhāya caranti. tato
K03psp_2-3u:1620: 'lpatarakā ye bodhicittam upabṛṃhayanti. tato 'lpatarakā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam
K03psp_2-3u:1621: āpadyante. tato 'lpatarakā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti. tato 'lpatarakā ye 'vinivartanīyāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1623: ihāhaṃ kauśika paśyāmi anāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi aprameyām asaṃkhyeyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1624: sattvām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakauśalavirahitāṃs
K03psp_2-3u:1625: tata eko vā dvau vā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyatve 'vatiṣṭheyātāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:1626: bhūyastvena te śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante.
K03psp_2-3u:1628: durabhisaṃbhavā hi kauśika anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ kuśīdair hīnavīryair hīnādhimuktikair
K03psp_2-3u:1629: hīnasattvair duṣprajñaiḥ. evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho
K03psp_2-3u:1630: vidikṣu paśyāmy ahaṃ kauśika anāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān sattvān
K03psp_2-3u:1631: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya bodhāya carata upāyakauśalavirahitās tata
K03psp_2-3u:1632: eko vā dvau vā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyatve 'vatiṣṭheyātāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:1633: bhūyastvena te śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante.
K03psp_2-3u:1638: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā kṣipraṃ ca sukhaṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_2-3u:1639: abhisaṃboddhukāmena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā abhīkṣṇaṃ śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā
K03psp_2-3u:1640: vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā paripraśnīkartavyā yoniśo manasikartavyā
K03psp_2-3u:1642: ca ye 'pi cānye kuśalā dharmā iha prajñāparamitāyām antargatās te 'py udgrahītavyā
K03psp_2-3u:1643: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyāḥ paryavāptavyāḥ pravartayitavyā yoniśo manasikartavyāḥ tadyathāpi
K03psp_2-3u:1644: nāma dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:1646: sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni
K03psp_2-3u:1647: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry
K03psp_2-3u:1648: apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ ṣaḍ abhijñā daśa tathāgatabalāni
K03psp_2-3u:1649: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā,
K03psp_2-3u:1650: anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā ye prajñāpāramitāyām antargatās te 'py udgrahītavyā yāvad yoniśo manasikartavyāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1652: tathā hi kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā evaṃ prajñāsyanti atra hi tathāgataḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1653: pūrvabodhisattvacārikāṃ caran śikṣito yaduta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1656: sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv
K03psp_2-3u:1657: ārūpyasamāpattiṣu ṣaṭsu abhijñāsu daśatathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu
K03psp_2-3u:1658: pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyām anyeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:1659: cāparimāṇeṣu buddhadharmeṣv asmābhir apy asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām anuśikṣamāṇaiḥ śikṣitavyam eṣāsmākaṃ śāstā,
K03psp_2-3u:1660: tiṣṭhato vā tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā pratisartavyā bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1662: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1663: kiyat sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,

K03psp_2-3u:1666: yaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya pūjāyai saptaratnamayaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1668: samantāc ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānāyet pūjayet.
K03psp_2-3u:1669: tat kiṃ manyase kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
K03psp_2-3u:1670: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:1672: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1673: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati

K03psp_2-3u:1675: sarvajñatācittena likhitāṃ ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:1678: tiṣṭhatu kauśika stūpo ratnamayaḥ sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya
K03psp_2-3u:1679: parinirvṛtasya pūjākarmaṇe imaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ kuryād yojanocchritaiḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1680: tāṃś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed arcayed apacāyed divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1681: tat kiṃ manyase kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
K03psp_2-3u:1682: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:1684: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1685: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1686: avirahitaś sarvajñatācittena likhitāṃ ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhir
K03psp_2-3u:1687: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ pūjayiṣyati. iti svārthādhimuktimadhyamadhyā
K03psp_2-3u:1688: tiṣṭhatu kauśika jambūdvīpas tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇaḥ sacet kauśika ya imāṃ cāturmahādvīpakaṃ

K03psp_2-3u:1691: tat kiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet?
K03psp_2-3u:1692: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.

K03psp_2-3u:1697: arcayed apacāyet ayam eva tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:1699: tiṣṭhatu kauśika cāturmahādvīpako lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇaḥ sacet kauśika

K03psp_2-3u:1703: tat kiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet?
K03psp_2-3u:1704: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:1706: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,

K03psp_2-3u:1708: paryavāpnuyād yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiś
K03psp_2-3u:1710: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.

K03psp_2-3u:1713: pūjārthaṃ nānāratnamayaiḥ stūpaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ kārayet kārayitvā ca satkuryād gurukuryād
K03psp_2-3u:1715: tat kiṃ manyase kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet?
K03psp_2-3u:1716: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:1718: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_2-3u:1719: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed arcayed apacāyet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1720: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. iti svārthādhimuktir adhimātramadhyā
K03psp_2-3u:1721: tiṣṭhatu kauśika dvisāhasro lokadhātur nānāratnamayastūpaparipūrṇo yaḥ. kaścit kauśika
K03psp_2-3u:1722: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya pūjārtham imāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1723: lokadhātuṃ saptaratnamayais tathāgatastūpair yojanocchritaiḥ pūrayet pūrayitvā satkuryād
K03psp_2-3u:1725: tat kiṃ manyase kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet?
K03psp_2-3u:1726: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:1728: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_2-3u:1729: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet
K03psp_2-3u:1730: paryavāpnuyāt satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed arcayed apacāyet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1732: tiṣṭhatu kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur nānāratnamayastupaparipūrṇaḥ pūjito
K03psp_2-3u:1733: ye kecit kauśika trisāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītāḥ teṣām
K03psp_2-3u:1734: ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya pūjārthaṃ saptaratnamayān stūpān kārayed
K03psp_2-3u:1735: yojanocchritāṃs tāṃś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed arcayed apacāyet divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhiḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1736: tat kiṃ manyase kauśikāpi nu te sattvās tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:1737: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:1739: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_2-3u:1740: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatām api kṛtvā udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet paryavāpnuyād
K03psp_2-3u:1743: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:1744: evam ukte sakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1745: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugata,
K03psp_2-3u:1746: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavan satkṛtayā gurukṛtayā mānitayā pūjitayā atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitā pūjitāś
K03psp_2-3u:1747: ye 'pi te bhagavan pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu
K03psp_2-3u:1748: sattvās tebhya ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya pūjārthaṃ saptaratnamayān
K03psp_2-3u:1749: stūpān pratiṣṭhāpayed yojanocchritāṃs tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād
K03psp_2-3u:1751: api nu te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1752: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
K03psp_2-3u:1753: lokadhātuṣu sattvās tebhya ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya pūjārthaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1754: saptaratnamayān stūpān pratiṣṭhāpayed yojanocchritāṃs tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśesaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1755: vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed arcayed apacāyet divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhiḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1756: api nu te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1759: śakra āha: ataḥ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K03psp_2-3u:1760: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet paryavāpnuyād yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt tāṃś ca (PSP_2-3:67)
K03psp_2-3u:1761: satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed arcayed apacāyet divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhiś ca pūjayed arcayed apacāyet,
K03psp_2-3u:1762: ayam eva bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasmāt pūrvakāt kulaputrād vā kuladuhitṛto vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_2-3u:1763: tathā hi bhagavann asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarve kuśalā dharmā antargatāḥ. tadyathā
K03psp_2-3u:1764: daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāś catvāri dhyānāṃ catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1765: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmās trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni catvāry āryasatyāni ṣaḍ abhijñā
K03psp_2-3u:1766: aṣṭa vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:1767: vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā
K03psp_2-3u:1768: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni
K03psp_2-3u:1769: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ. pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā mahāmaitrī
K03psp_2-3u:1771: idaṃ tad buddhānāṃ bhagavatā śāsanaṃ yatra śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ śrāvakāś ca nirjātā niryānti niryāsyanti
K03psp_2-3u:1772: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1774: bahu te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyanti. aprameyam
K03psp_2-3u:1775: asaṃkhyeyam acintyam atulyam aparimāṇaṃ ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1776: kṛtvā udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:1777: uttare ca satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti arcayiṣyanti apacāyiṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:1780: prajñāpāramitā nirjātā hi kauśika tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ pañca pāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:1781: sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā
K03psp_2-3u:1783: pañca cakṣūṃṣi ṣaḍ abhijñā aṣṭa vimokṣā navānupūrvavihāra samāpattayaḥ sattvaparipāko buddhakṣetrasaṃpat,
K03psp_2-3u:1784: prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi kauśika mārgākārajñatā sarvajñatā sarvākārajñatā,
K03psp_2-3u:1788: tasmāt tarhi kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1789: likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś
K03psp_2-3u:1790: ca manasikariṣyati tāṃ ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati arcayiṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:1792: asya puṇyābhisaṃskārasyāsau paurvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K03psp_2-3u:1793: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api yāvat koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K03psp_2-3u:1794: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api na kṣamate.
K03psp_2-3u:1796: yāvad iyaṃ hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpe sthāsyati tāvad na buddharatnasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati na dharmaratnasya na saṃgharatnasyāntardhānaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1797: tāvad daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā loke bhaviṣyanti catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1800: āryasatyānāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ catasṛṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1801: pratisaṃvidāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1804: yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
K03psp_2-3u:1805: bhavati yāvad akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
K03psp_2-3u:1807: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samudāgamo bhavati. anuttarasya buddhajñānasya dharmacakrapravartanasya
K03psp_2-3u:1810: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā (PSP_2-3:69)
K03psp_2-3u:1811: devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrās tān śakro devānām indra āmantrayāmāsa:
K03psp_2-3u:1812: udgrahītavyā mārṣāḥ prajñāpāramitā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā mārṣāḥ prajñāpāramitā yoniśo manasikartavyā prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_2-3u:1814: prajñāpāramitāyā mārṣā udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā sarve 'kuśalā dharmāḥ parihīyante kuśalā dharmā vivardhante divyāḥ kāyā vivardhante asurāḥ kāyāḥ parihīyante,
K03psp_2-3u:1815: prajñāpāramitāyā mārṣā udgṛhītayā dhārtitayā vācitayā paryavāptayā na buddhanetrī samucchidyate na dharmanetrī na saṃghanetrī samucchidyate,
K03psp_2-3u:1816: triratnavaṃśānupacchedāya mārṣāḥ sarvāsāṃ pāramitānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
K03psp_2-3u:1818: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1819: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1821: sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ mārgākārajñatāyāḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ sarvākārajñatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
K03psp_2-3u:1823: srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ loke prādurbhāvāḥ prajñāyante.
K03psp_2-3u:1824: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1825: udgrahāṇa tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitām.
K03psp_2-3u:1827: yadā kauśika asurāṇām evaṃ samudācārā bhaviṣyanti devais trāyastriṃśaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayiṣyāma
K03psp_2-3u:1828: iti tadā tvaṃ kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhareḥ svādhyāyeḥ evaṃ teṣām asurāṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1830: na ca punas tān vigrahacittotpādān utpādayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:1831: yeṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ devakanyānāṃ vā cyutikālo bhavet teṣām api purataḥ svādhyāyaṃ kuryās,
K03psp_2-3u:1832: te yady ātmano 'pāyopapattiṃ drakṣyanti teṣām enāṃ prajñāpārāmitāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ te 'pāyopapatticittotpādā antardhāsyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:1833: tatraiva devabhavane te utpatsyante evaṃ maharddhikā hy asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravā yasya kasyacit kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā (PSP_2-3:70)
K03psp_2-3u:1834: vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotrāvabhāsam āgamiṣyati. sarve te tena kuśalamūlenānupūrveṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
K03psp_2-3u:1835: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1836: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugata tathā hi bhagavan ye 'tīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhūvan,
K03psp_2-3u:1837: yeṣāṃ śrāvakā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhitās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām
K03psp_2-3u:1838: āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti anāgate
K03psp_2-3u:1839: 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1840: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. ye 'pi caitarhi daśadiśi loke pratyutpanne 'dhvani
K03psp_2-3u:1841: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhagavantaḥ sa śrāvakasaṃghās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante
K03psp_2-3u:1842: yāpayanti sarve te ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
K03psp_2-3u:1844: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarve buddhadharmā antargatāḥ sarve bodhisattvadharmāḥ sarve pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ sarve śrāvakadharmā antargatāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1845: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1848: anuttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:1849: asamasameyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_2-3u:1851: tathā hi kauśika ye 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā daśadiśi loke tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1852: sarve te imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante
K03psp_2-3u:1853: abhisaṃbhotsyante ca. imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:1854: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ sarvapāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
K03psp_2-3u:1856: sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
K03psp_2-3u:1857: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadhamāḥ prajñāyante. trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni aṣṭa vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1858: ṣaḍ abhijñā dharmadhātur bhūtakoṭitathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmasthititā
K03psp_2-3u:1859: dharmaniyāmatā loke prajñāyate. pañca cakṣūṃṣi srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam
K03psp_2-3u:1861: arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ sarvajñatā loke prajñāyate. bodhisattvaṃ punaḥ kauśikāgamya
K03psp_2-3u:1862: daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā loke prabhāvyante. saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny
K03psp_2-3u:1864: ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa
K03psp_2-3u:1865: tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
K03psp_2-3u:1866: mārgākārajñatā sarvajñatā sarvākārajñatā loke prajñāyate. dharmadhātur bhūtakoṭitathatā
K03psp_2-3u:1867: avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā loke prajñāyate.
K03psp_2-3u:1868: pañca cakṣūṃṣi srotaāpattiphalaṃ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalam
K03psp_2-3u:1870: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke prabhāvyate. tadyathāpi
K03psp_2-3u:1871: nāma kauśika candramaṇḍalam āgamya sarvauṣadhītārāgaṇāḥ prabhāvyante. evam eva kauśika
K03psp_2-3u:1872: bodhisattvacandramaṇḍalam āgamya daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ. sarvakuśalacaryā samyakcaryā
K03psp_2-3u:1877: prajñāyante. sarvajñatā prabhāvyate. tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prabhāvyante.
K03psp_2-3u:1878: yadāpi buddhā bhagavanto loke nābhisaṃbudhyante notpādas tathāgatānāṃ bhavati,
K03psp_2-3u:1879: tadāpi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ. sattvānāṃ laukikāṃś ca lokottarāṃś ca dharmān deśayanti.
K03psp_2-3u:1883: yenopāyakauśalyena ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayati sarvasamādhīṃś
K03psp_2-3u:1884: ca samāpadyate sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni ca pratilabhate apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīś
K03psp_2-3u:1885: ca samāpadyate saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayati āryasatyāni bhāvayati aṣṭa
K03psp_2-3u:1886: vimokṣān bhāvayati navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate abhijñā bhāvayati triṇi
K03psp_2-3u:1888: bhāvayati daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān
K03psp_2-3u:1890: na ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā sākṣāt karoti. sattvāṃś ca paripācayati
K03psp_2-3u:1891: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati bodhisattvasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇāti sarvajñatāṃ cānuprāpnoti.
K03psp_2-3u:1892: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:1893: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati sa ebhiḥ dṛṣṭadhārmikair
K03psp_2-3u:1895: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1896: katamair bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā samanvāgatā
K03psp_2-3u:1897: bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
K03psp_2-3u:1900: tena hi kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na viṣeṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti nāgninā na
K03psp_2-3u:1901: śastreṇa nodakena kālaṃ kariṣyanti yāvan na kenacid vyādhinā kālaṃ kariṣyanti sthāpayitvā
K03psp_2-3u:1902: pūrvakarmavipākaṃ na ca rājakulād upadravā bhaviṣyanti. sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K03psp_2-3u:1903: vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyan rājakulaṃ praviśaty asyāvatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo
K03psp_2-3u:1906: tathā hy asyā eva prajñāpāramitāyās tejasā. sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃs tatra rājakulam upasaṃkramiṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1907: te cāsya tatra rājāno vā rājaputrā vā rājamahāmātrā vā pūrvam ālapitavyaṃ maṃsyante abhibhāṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante.
K03psp_2-3u:1909: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarvasattvānām antike maitracittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1910: karuṇācittaṃ muditācittam upekṣācittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati. ebhiḥ sa kauśika
K03psp_2-3u:1911: dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. ya imāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1912: prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:1913: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ebhiḥ sāṃparāyikair (PSP_2-3:73)
K03psp_2-3u:1914: guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:1915: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. yad uta na jātu daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1917: na caturbhir dhyānair na caturbhir apramāṇair na catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhir na
K03psp_2-3u:1918: pāramitābhir na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmair na satyair nāṣṭavimokṣair na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir
K03psp_2-3u:1919: na tribhir vimokṣamukhair nābhijñābhir na sarvaśūnyatābhir na sarvasamādhibhir na
K03psp_2-3u:1920: sarvadhāraṇīmukhair na daśabhir balair na vaiśāradyair na pratisaṃvidbhir nāṣṭādaśabhir
K03psp_2-3u:1921: āveṇikair buddhadharmair virahito bhaviṣyati. na lakṣaṇānuvyañjanair virahito bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:1922: sa na jātu nirayatiryagyoniyamalokeṣūpapatsyate. na jātv indriyavikalo bhaviṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:1923: na jātv aṅgahīno bhaviṣyati na jātu daridrakuleṣūpapatsyate na veṇukārakuleṣūpapatsyate
K03psp_2-3u:1924: na puṣkasakuleṣūpapatsyate na mauṣṭikakuleṣūpapatsyate na caṇḍālaurabhrikaśākunikakuleṣūpapatsyate
K03psp_2-3u:1925: na śūdrakuleṣūpapatsyate kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu
K03psp_2-3u:1926: vā udārodāreṣūpapatsyate. sa tataḥ prabhṛti satatasamitaṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānuvyañjanasamalaṃkṛtakāyo
K03psp_2-3u:1927: bhaviṣyati yatra vā lokadhātau buddhā bhagavanto bhaviṣyanti tatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1928: purataḥ padma aupapāduka upapatsyate. na jātv abhijñā virahito bhaviṣyati. sa ākāṅkṣaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:1930: tān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsituṃ dharmaṃ ca śrotuṃ buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāman sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
K03psp_2-3u:1932: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitā udgṛhītavyā dhārayitavyā
K03psp_2-3u:1933: vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā sarvajñatācittena cāvirahitena
K03psp_2-3u:1934: bhavitavyaṃ. sa etair dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ sāṃparāyikair guṇair avirahito bhaviṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:1936: atha khalv anyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmati sma.
K03psp_2-3u:1937: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat:
K03psp_2-3u:1938: idam anyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmati,
K03psp_2-3u:1939: yan nūnam ahaṃ yāvanmātraṃ mayā bhagavato 'ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyā udgrahītaṃ tāvanmātraṃ svādhyāyeyaṃ yad etad anyatīrthikānāṃ (PSP_2-3:74)
K03psp_2-3u:1940: parivrājakānāṃ śataṃ na bhagavantam upasaṃkrāmeyur nāntarāyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kuryuḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1941: atha khalu śakro devānām indro yāvad anena bhagavato 'ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyā udgrahītaṃ tāvat svādhyāyati sma.
K03psp_2-3u:1942: atha khalu te 'nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakā dūrata eva bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yenaiva mārgeṇāgatās tenaiva pratigatāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1944: kim atra kāraṇaṃ yenaite 'nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakā upārambhābhiprāyā bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yenaiva mārgeṇāgatās tenaiva pratigatāḥ?

K03psp_2-3u:1946: śakreṇa śāriputra devānām indreṇa iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā samanvāhṛtā yenaite 'nyatīrthikāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1947: parivrājakā dūrata eva bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yenaiva mārgeṇāgatās tenaiva pratigatāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1948: na hi śāriputra teṣām anyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānām ekasyāpi śuklaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
K03psp_2-3u:1949: sarva ete 'nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakāḥ pratihatacittā upārambhābhiprāyā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
K03psp_2-3u:1950: nāhaṃ taṃ śāriputra samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyām imāṃ prajñāpāramitām upārambhābhiprāyaḥ pratihatacitta upasaṃkrāmen,
K03psp_2-3u:1953: tathā hi śāriputra ya iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājikās trāyastriṃśā
K03psp_2-3u:1954: yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā
K03psp_2-3u:1955: yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrā ye 'pi śrāvakā ye 'pi pratyekabuddhā ye 'pi bodhisattvā
K03psp_2-3u:1956: mahāsattvās tair apīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:1958: punar aparaṃ śāriputra ye 'pi te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
K03psp_2-3u:1959: yāvad daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavantaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:1961: api sarvair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītā. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:1963: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasa etad abhavad:
K03psp_2-3u:1964: imās tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catasraḥ pariṣadaḥ saṃmukhaṃ sthitāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1965: amī ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrāḥ saṃmukhaṃ sthitā niḥsaṃśayam atra bodhisattvā (PSP_2-3:75)
K03psp_2-3u:1967: yan nūnam ahaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmeyaṃ vicakṣuḥkaraṇāyeti.
K03psp_2-3u:1968: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃś caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ nirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitukāmo bhavet.
K03psp_2-3u:1969: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat:
K03psp_2-3u:1970: māro batāyaṃ pāpīyāṃś caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ nirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitukāmaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:1971: yo 'yaṃ mārasya pāpīyasaś caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo vyūhaḥ. na rājño bimbisārasya
K03psp_2-3u:1977: yo 'yaṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo māreṇa pāpīyasā nirmitaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1978: dīrgharātraṃ khalu punar māraḥ pāpīyān bhagavato 'vatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī sattvānāṃ ca viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:1979: yan nūnam aham imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhareyaṃ smṛtyā svādhyāyaṃ kuryām.
K03psp_2-3u:1980: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ prajñāparamitāṃ samanvājahāra smṛtyā svādhyāyam akarot,
K03psp_2-3u:1981: yathā yathā śakro devānām indraḥ smṛtyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyati sma tathā tathā māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tenaiva mārgeṇa tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva pratyudāvṛtto 'bhūt.
K03psp_2-3u:1982: atha khalu ye 'syāṃ pariṣadi cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te divyāni puṣpāṇy abhinirmāyāntarīkṣagatā eva yena bhagavāṃs tenākṣipanti sma tenābhyavakiranti sma.
K03psp_2-3u:1984: ciraṃ bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ pracaratu yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:1985: jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyānāṃ pracariṣyati tāvan na tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1987: saṃghasya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati. evaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau,
K03psp_2-3u:1988: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvānāṃ caryāviśeṣaḥ prajñāsyate,
K03psp_2-3u:1989: yatra ca digbhāge imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā likhitāṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti pustakalikhitām api kṛtvā sthāpayiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:1992: sanāthā vigatatamondhakārā ca eṣā dig bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1994: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:1996: yatra yatra diśi lokadhātuprasare iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pracariṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1997: pustakalikhitā ālokajātā ca eṣā dig bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:1998: sanāthā vigatatamondhakārā ca eṣā dig bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:1999: atha khalu te devaputrā divyāni kusumāny abhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenābhyavakiranti sma.
K03psp_2-3u:2001: yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:2002: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati na tasya mārā vā mārakāyikā
K03psp_2-3u:2003: vā devaputrā avatāraṃ lapsyante. vayam api bhagavaṃ tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur
K03psp_2-3u:2005: śāstāram iti bhagavaṃs taṃ vayaṃ kulaputraṃ vā kuladuhitaraṃ vā maṃsyāmahe ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:2006: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:2007: na te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vāvarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:2008: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś
K03psp_2-3u:2009: ca manasikariṣyanti. pūrvajinakṛtādhikārās te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
K03psp_2-3u:2010: vā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
K03psp_2-3u:2011: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti. bahubuddhaparyupāsitāḥ kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītās te kulaputrāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2014: ato nirjātā hi sarvajñatā yad uta prajñāpāramitā nirjātā sarvajñatā nirjātā ca prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_2-3u:2016: tathā hi nānyā prajñāpāramitā nānyā sarvajñatā iti hi sarvajñatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K03psp_2-3u:2017: evam ukte bhagavān sakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: evam etat (PSP_2-3:77)
K03psp_2-3u:2019: yathā vadasi sarvajñatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. iti svaparārthādhimuktir mṛdumadhyā
K03psp_2-3u:2020: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:2021: tathā hi bhagavān na dānapāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati na śīlapāramitāyā na
K03psp_2-3u:2022: kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
K03psp_2-3u:2025: nāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
K03psp_2-3u:2026: na ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ na sarvāṇāṃ śūnyatānāṃ na samādhīnāṃ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
K03psp_2-3u:2027: na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ na vaiśāradyānāṃ na pratisaṃvidāṃ nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati.
K03psp_2-3u:2028: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:2029: prajñāpāramitā ānanda pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā yad uta ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
K03psp_2-3u:2030: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
K03psp_2-3u:2032: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
K03psp_2-3u:2035: ānanda apariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
K03psp_2-3u:2037: apariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ apariṇāmitā kṣāntir apariṇāmitaṃ vīryam apariṇāmitaṃ dhyānam apariṇāmitā prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
K03psp_2-3u:2038: ānanda āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan no hīdaṃ sugata,
K03psp_2-3u:2039: kathaṃ punar bhagavan dānaṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitaṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
K03psp_2-3u:2040: kathaṃ punar bhagavan śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmitā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
K03psp_2-3u:2042: advayayogenānanda dānaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2044: dānaṃ yāvat prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
K03psp_2-3u:2045: ānanda āha: kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena dānaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
K03psp_2-3u:2046: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ kathaṃ bhagavan prajñādvayayogena pariṇāmitā sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
K03psp_2-3u:2048: rūpasyānanda advayayogena vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyādvayayogena yāvad bodheḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:2054: tathā hi ānanda rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ vedanā vedanayā śūnyā saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam.
K03psp_2-3u:2056: tathā hi rūpaṃ ca vedanā ca saṃjñā ca saṃskārā ca vijñānaṃ ca pāramitāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ yāvad bodhiś ca pāramitāś cādvayam etad
K03psp_2-3u:2057: tasmāt tarhy ānanda prajñāpāramitā nu pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2059: āryasatyānām aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2060: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām
K03psp_2-3u:2061: āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvad bodheḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā.
K03psp_2-3u:2062: tadyathāpi nāmānanda mahāpṛthivīṃ niśrāya sāmagrīvaśena bījāni virohanti. evam evānanda
K03psp_2-3u:2063: prajñāpāramitāṃ niśrāya prajñāpāramitām āgamya sarvāḥ. pāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:2064: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattaya āryasatyāni ṣaḍabhijñāḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni virohanti. daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikā buddhadharmā virohanti yāvat sarvajñatā (PSP_2-3:79)
K03psp_2-3u:2065: virohati. sarvajñatāṃ pariniśrāya sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
K03psp_2-3u:2067: yāvad āveṇikā buddhadharmā virohanti. tasmād ānanda prajñāpāramitaivāsāṃ pāramitānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2068: pariṇāyikā yāvād aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:2070: śakra āha: na khalu punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2071: sarvagūṇāḥ parikīrtitāḥ yān guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parigṛhṇāti imāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2072: prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan yoniśaś ca manasikurvan prajñāpāramitayā
K03psp_2-3u:2073: bhagavann udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā daśānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2074: kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2075: catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām
K03psp_2-3u:2076: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ trayānaṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2077: sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2078: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2079: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā
K03psp_2-3u:2080: paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:2083: cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:2084: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgrahītayā yāvad yoniśo manasikṛtayā srotaāpannāḥ prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:2087: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavann udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante.
K03psp_2-3u:2088: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:2089: na punaḥ kauśika yaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtā teṣām etāvata evaṃ guṇān
K03psp_2-3u:2091: apramāṇena hi kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā śīlaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:2092: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś
K03psp_2-3u:2093: ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajñatācittena cāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti. apramāṇena samādhiskandhena
K03psp_2-3u:2095: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś
K03psp_2-3u:2096: ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajñatācittena cāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti. tathāgatapratimās te
K03psp_2-3u:2097: kauśika kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā veditavyā ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīyanti
K03psp_2-3u:2098: dhārayiyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti sarvajñatācittena
K03psp_2-3u:2099: cāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti. yaś ca kauśika sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2101: yaś ca prajñāpāramitāvihāriṇāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2102: prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ asya kauśika śīlaskandhasya
K03psp_2-3u:2106: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
K03psp_2-3u:2107: saṃkhyām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām apy upaniṣadam api nopaiti.
K03psp_2-3u:2109: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmeś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:2110: na ca kaścid dharmo nāvigato na jñātaḥ. ye kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2113: kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca ime dṛṣṭadhārmikāḥ sāṃparāyikāś ca guṇānuśaṃsāḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:2115: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:2116: ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2117: saṃvidhāsyāmi ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
K03psp_2-3u:2119: avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvajñatācittena imāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:2121: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:2122: teṣāṃ punaḥ kauśika kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2123: bahūni devaputraśatasahasrāṇi dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkramiṣyanti. teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2124: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ pratibhānaṃ te devaputrā
K03psp_2-3u:2125: upasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante. yadāpi te dharma bhāṇakā na mantrayitukāmā bhaviṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:2126: tadāpi tenaiva devaputrā dharmagauraveṇa pratibhānam upasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante. imam
K03psp_2-3u:2127: api kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaguṇaṃ pratilapsyante ya imāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2128: prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:2129: tāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:2130: punar aparaṃ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2131: catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ purato nāvalīnacittatā bhaviṣyati ko vā mamānuyokṣyate upālapsyate ceti.
K03psp_2-3u:2133: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:2134: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā abhinnā laukikāś ca lokottarāś ca sādhāraṇāś
K03psp_2-3u:2135: ca kuśalāś ca saṃskṛtāś cāsaṃskṛtāś ca śrāvakadharmāś ca pratyekabuddhadharmāś ca
K03psp_2-3u:2138: tathā hi te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ (PSP_2-3:82)
K03psp_2-3u:2139: sthitvā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitās te upālambhaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na samanupaśyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:2140: yo 'py upālabhyeta tam api na samanupaśyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:2141: evaṃ hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītānām upālambho na bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:2142: punar aparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇato
K03psp_2-3u:2143: dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvato yoniśaś ca manasikurvataś cittaṃ nāvalīyate na
K03psp_2-3u:2144: saṃlīyate nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate.
K03psp_2-3u:2146: tathā hi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vastu na samanupaśyati ya ālīyeta vā saṃlīyeta
K03psp_2-3u:2147: vā uttrasyed vā saṃtrasyed vā saṃtrāsam āpadyate vā. imān api sa kauśika kulaputro
K03psp_2-3u:2148: vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān pratigrahīṣyati ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:2149: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati satkariṣyati mānayiṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:2151: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām
K03psp_2-3u:2152: udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati tāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2153: ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2154: sa priyo bhaviṣyati mātāpitṛṇāṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:2155: ye 'pi te daśadiśi loke sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāś ca pratyekabuddhāś
K03psp_2-3u:2156: cārhantaś ca sarve śaikṣāḥ sarve cāśaikṣās teṣām api sa bodhisattvaḥ priyo bhaviṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:2157: sa devakasyāpi lokasya sa mārakasya sa śramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sa devamānuṣāsurāyāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2158: prajāyāḥ priyo bhaviṣyati manaāpaḥ. iti svaparārthārdhimuktimadhyādhimātrā
K03psp_2-3u:2159: anācchedena ca pratibhānena samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyayā dānapāramitayā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. evam anācchedyayā śīlapāramitayā (PSP_2-3:83)
K03psp_2-3u:2160: anācchedyayā kṣāntipāramitayā anācchedyayā vīryapāramitayā anācchedyayā dhyānapāramitayā
K03psp_2-3u:2161: anācchedyayā prajñāpāramitayā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyayā adhyātmaśūnyatayā
K03psp_2-3u:2162: anācchedyayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyaiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2164: samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. anācchedyair āryasatyair anācchedyābhir apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:2166: anācchedyair daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir
K03psp_2-3u:2167: aṣṭādaśabhiś cāveṇikair buddhadharmair anācchedyena sattvaparipākena anācchedyayā
K03psp_2-3u:2168: buddhakṣetrapariśuddhyā anācchedyayā sarvākārajñatayā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. pratibalaś ca bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:2169: utpannotpannānāṃ tīrthyavādānāṃ sahadharmeṇaiva nigrahaṃ kariṣyati. imam api kauśika
K03psp_2-3u:2170: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ ca guṇaṃ parigṛhṇīyād ya imāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2171: prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:2172: avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati sa sarvākārajñātācittena tāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:2175: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitām
K03psp_2-3u:2176: api kṛtvā dhārāyiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati tatra kauśika ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre
K03psp_2-3u:2177: lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitās
K03psp_2-3u:2178: te tatrāgatyaināṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
K03psp_2-3u:2179: manasikariṣyanti vandiṣyanti namaskṛtvā vanditvā ca punar eva prakramiṣyanti. evaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2180: trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapāriṣadyā brahmapurohitā
K03psp_2-3u:2181: mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā
K03psp_2-3u:2182: anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā brhatphalāḥ śuddhāvāsā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2183: tatra ye kauśika mahābrahmāṇo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānās te 'pi
K03psp_2-3u:2184: tatrāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā namaskṛtya
K03psp_2-3u:2186: prakramiṣyanti. ye 'pi śuddhāvāsakāyikā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā
K03psp_2-3u:2187: devaputrās te 'pi tatrāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā
K03psp_2-3u:2188: namaskṛtya punar eva prakramiṣyanti. tena hi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā
K03psp_2-3u:2190: ye te daśadiglokadhātuṣu devaputrāś cāturmahārājakāyikā yāvad bṛhatphalā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2191: samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprashitā ye 'pi śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā ye 'pi cānye devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās
K03psp_2-3u:2192: te 'pīhāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā pūjayitvā punar gacchantu,
K03psp_2-3u:2193: teṣām etad dharmadānaṃ dattaṃ bhavantu. ye 'pi daśadiglokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā
K03psp_2-3u:2194: devaputrā yāvad bṛhatphalā devaputrā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā
K03psp_2-3u:2195: ye 'pi śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrās te 'pi tatrāgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:2196: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti vanditvā namaskṛtya pūjayitvā punar eva
K03psp_2-3u:2197: prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante. tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā ya iha
K03psp_2-3u:2198: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devā ye
K03psp_2-3u:2199: 'pi te daśadiglokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya
K03psp_2-3u:2200: kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti. nāpy asya kaścid
K03psp_2-3u:2201: avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:2202: imān api kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_2-3u:2204: tathā hi ye devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitās te 'pi tatrāgantavyaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2205: maṃsyante. tathā hi kauśika devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sarvasattvānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2206: traṇāya hitasukhāya saṃprasthitāḥ. iti svaparārthādhimuktir adhimātramadhyā
K03psp_2-3u:2207: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:2208: kathaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā jñāsyati,
K03psp_2-3u:2209: iha cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā āgacchanti yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrā āgacchantīti?
K03psp_2-3u:2210: evaṃ samantād daśabhyo digbhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā satkartuṃ vā gurukartuṃ vā mānayituṃ vā pūjayituṃ vā.
K03psp_2-3u:2211: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:2213: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udāram avabhāsaṃ jñāsyati niṣṭhā tena gantavyā mahaujaskā
K03psp_2-3u:2214: mahaujaskā devā āgātā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitum udgrahītuṃ paryavāptuṃ dhārayituṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2215: satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ vandituṃ namaskartum.
K03psp_2-3u:2216: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā amānuṣaṃ divyaṃ gandham anāghrātapūrvam
K03psp_2-3u:2217: āghrāsyati niṣṭhā tena gantavyā mahaujaskā mahaujaskā iha devaputrā āgatā iti prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2218: vācayituṃ śrotum udgrahītuṃ paryavāptuṃ dhārayituṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum.
K03psp_2-3u:2219: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caukṣasamudācāro bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:2220: tasya tayā caukṣasamudācāratayā devatā āgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya dhārayitvā
K03psp_2-3u:2221: vācayitvā satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā āttamanaskā bhaviṣyanti. yāś ca
K03psp_2-3u:2222: tatra pṛthivīpradeśe 'lpaujaskā alpaujaskā devatā bhaviṣyanti tās tato 'pakramitavyaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2223: maṃsyante. teṣāṃ mahaujaskānāṃ mahaujaskānāṃ devānāṃ tejaś ca śriyaś cāsahamānāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:2224: yathāyathā mahaujaskā mahaujaskā devatā upasaṃkramiṣyanti tathātathā te kulaputrāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2225: kuladuhitaro vā udārādhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti. tasmiṃś ca pṛthivīpradeśe 'caukṣasamudācāratā na pracārayitavyā,
K03psp_2-3u:2229: punar aparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā kāyo na klānto bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:2230: kāyasukhaṃ bhaviṣyati. kāyalaghutāṃ ca bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya pratipanno
K03psp_2-3u:2231: bhaviṣyati. sa ca kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kāyalaghutāṃ kāyakarmaṇyatāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2232: kāyasukhatāṃ cittalaghutāṃ cittakarmaṇyatāṃ cittasukhatāṃ ca jñāsyati. sukhena sa
K03psp_2-3u:2233: rātrau śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati. imāṃ eva prajñāpāramitām āśayena kalpayan na pāpakān svapnān drakṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:2234: drakṣyaṃś ca punaḥ svapnena tathāgatān evārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān drakṣyati dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇacitritagātrān
K03psp_2-3u:2238: yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmapratisaṃyuktām eva kathāṃ śroṣyati. tāsāṃ ca pāramitānām
K03psp_2-3u:2239: arthaṃ śroṣyati yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām arthaṃ śroṣyati. bodhivṛkṣaṃ drakṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:2240: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bodhimaṇḍam upasaṃkramamāṇaṃ drakṣyati. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_2-3u:2242: bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati dharmasaṃgītiratāni evaṃ sarvajñatā
K03psp_2-3u:2243: parigrahītavyā evaṃ sattvāḥ paripācayitavyā evaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitavyam
K03psp_2-3u:2244: iti. bahunāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśataśahasrāṇāṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi śabdaṃ śroṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:2245: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2246: śabdaṃ śroṣyati. amuṣmin lokadhātau amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iyadbhir
K03psp_2-3u:2248: dharmaṃ deśayati. pūrvasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati parinirvāyamāṇāni
K03psp_2-3u:2249: yāvad daśasu dikṣu bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati parinirvāyamāṇāni.
K03psp_2-3u:2250: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ stūpān dhātudharān nānāratnamayān bahūni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
K03psp_2-3u:2251: drakṣyati. tāṃś ca stūpān satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:2252: sa khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imān evaṃrūpān bhadrakāṃś ca svapnān
K03psp_2-3u:2253: drakṣyati. sa sukham eva svapsyati sukhaṃ ca pratibhotsyate ojaḥprakṣiptaṃ ca kāyaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2254: saṃjñāsyati. laghuṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃjñāsyati na guruṃ. na cāsya balavatī gṛddhir āhāre
K03psp_2-3u:2256: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika yogācārasya bhikṣoḥ samādher vyutthitasya manasikārasaṃtarpitena
K03psp_2-3u:2257: cittena na balavaty āhāre gṛddhir bhavati.
K03psp_2-3u:2258: evam eva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na balavaty āhāre gṛddhir bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:2260: tathā hi tasyāmanuṣyā ojaḥ kāya upasaṃharanti. ye cāpi (PSP_2-3:87)
K03psp_2-3u:2262: ojaḥ kāye prakṣipanti. imaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2263: guṇaṃ parigṛhṇīte ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīte paryavāpnoti dhārayati vācayati
K03psp_2-3u:2264: yoniśaś ca manasikaroti avirahitaś ca sarvajñatācittena. iti svaparārthādhimuktir adhimātrādhimātrā
K03psp_2-3u:2265: kiṃ cāpi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgṛhṇīyān na dhārayen
