K03psp_2-3u:2266: na vācayen na paryavāpnuyān na yoniśaś ca manasikuryān na parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśayed
K03psp_2-3u:2267: api tu khalu punaḥ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:2268: yaś ca kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed
K03psp_2-3u:2269: vācayet paryavāpnuyād yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśayet tāṃ ca likhitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2271: ayaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tato nidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:2272: na tv eva yaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān
K03psp_2-3u:2274: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2276: tāṃś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:2277: iti parārthādhimuktir mṛdumṛddhi stūpasatkāraparivarto nāma tṛtīyaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2278: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:2279: yady ayaṃ kauśika jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ bhavet,
K03psp_2-3u:2280: tāni te kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā upanāmayed,
K03psp_2-3u:2282: tatas tvaṃ tayor dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ kaṃ parigṛhṇīyāḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:2283: śakra āha: saced me bhagavann ayaṃ jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhas tathāgataśarīrāṇām upanāmyeta,
K03psp_2-3u:2284: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā upanāmyeta parikalpam upādāya imām evāhaṃ tayor dvayor (PSP_2-3:88)
K03psp_2-3u:2285: bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyāṃ. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2286: na mama bhagavaṃs teṣu tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:2287: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgataśarirāṇi na satkartukāmo na gurukartukāmo na mānayitukāmo
K03psp_2-3u:2288: na pūjayitukāmo. api tu khalu punar me bhagavann evaṃ syāt prajñāpāramitānirjātāni
K03psp_2-3u:2289: tathāgataśarirāṇi yena tāni satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjyante,
K03psp_2-3u:2290: prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi yena tāni pūjāṃ labhante.
K03psp_2-3u:2291: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:2292: prajñāpāramitā kauśika agrāhyā anidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā. tat
K03psp_2-3u:2293: kathaṃ tvam agrāhyāṃ prajñāpāramitām anidarśanām apratighām ekalakṣaṇāṃ yad utālakṣaṇām
K03psp_2-3u:2296: na hi prajñāpāramitā grahāya anugrahāya vā sthitā,
K03psp_2-3u:2297: na hānāya na vṛddhaye notkṣepāya na vikṣepāya na saṃkleśāya na vyavadānāya,
K03psp_2-3u:2300: na bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ na śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ na śaikṣadharmāṇāṃ nāśaikṣadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā,
K03psp_2-3u:2308: śakra āha: evam etad bhadanta śāriputra yathā vadasi na prajñāpāramitā buddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī yāvan na sarvajñatāyā dātrī. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2314: atha khalu bhagavān śakrasya devānām indrasya sādhukāram adāt:
K03psp_2-3u:2315: sādhu sādhu kauśika evam etad yathā nirdiśasi na prajñāpāramitā dvayaṃ pratyupasthitā,
K03psp_2-3u:2321: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:2322: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca prajñāpāramitā (PSP_2-3:89)
K03psp_2-3u:2324: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā ca vīryapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca,
K03psp_2-3u:2325: dharmadhātuś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K03psp_2-3u:2326: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet,
K03psp_2-3u:2328: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
K03psp_2-3u:2329: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā ca vīryapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca,
K03psp_2-3u:2330: tathatā ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K03psp_2-3u:2331: bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet,
K03psp_2-3u:2333: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś cācintyadhātuś ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
K03psp_2-3u:2334: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā ca vīryapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca,
K03psp_2-3u:2335: bhūtakoṭiś cācintyadhātuś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K03psp_2-3u:2336: śakra āha: namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena namaskṛtāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2337: yatra śikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
K03psp_2-3u:2338: yadāhaṃ bhagavan sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ tasmin devendrāsane niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi svake
K03psp_2-3u:2339: āsane tatra ye devaputrā mamopasthānāyāgacchanti te māṃ tatra sthaṃ namasyanti. yadāhaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2340: tatra na bhavāmi svake siṃhāsane tadā te devaputrās tat mamāsanaṃ namaskṛtya punar eva prakrāmanti,
K03psp_2-3u:2341: iha śakro devānām indro dharmāsane niṣaṇṇas trāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmāseti.
K03psp_2-3u:2342: evam eva bhagavan yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā likhitvā sthāsyate svādhyāsyate vā parebhyo vā saṃprakāśayiṣyate,
K03psp_2-3u:2343: tatra ye te daśabhyo digbhyo devaputrā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragās te tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ namaskṛtya punar eva prakramiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:2346: yad api tathāgataśarīrāṇi tad api prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitatvāt pūjāṃ pratilabhante. prajñāpāramitā bhagavan bodhisattvacaryāṃ carataḥ sarvajñānasyāśrayabhūtā,
K03psp_2-3u:2348: tasmād ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pratyaṃśābhyāṃ prajñāpāramitām eva parigṛhṇīyām.
K03psp_2-3u:2349: imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya svādhyāyaṃ kuryān dharmāntargatena mānasena yasmin samaye
K03psp_2-3u:2351: tasmin samaye bhagavan nimittam eva na samanupaśyāmi bhayasya vā stambhitatvasya vā. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2352: animittā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā aliṅgā anabhilapyā,
K03psp_2-3u:2355: animittā hi bhagavan dānapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilapyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan dānapāramitā yāvat sarvajñatā,
K03psp_2-3u:2356: saced bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sanimittā saliṅgā sābhilapyā sapravyāhārābhaviṣyan
K03psp_2-3u:2357: nānimittā nāliṅgā nānabhilapyā nāpravyāhārā naiva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2358: sarvadharmān animittān aliṅgān anabhilapyān apravyāhārān iti viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_2-3u:2359: abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām animittam aliṅgam anabhilapyam apravyāhāraṃ dharmam adeśayiṣyat,
K03psp_2-3u:2360: yasmād bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā animittā aliṅgā anabhilapyā apravyāhārā tasmāt
K03psp_2-3u:2361: tathāgataḥ sarvadharmān animittān aliṅgān anabhilapyān apravyāhārān viditvā anuttarāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2362: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām animittam aliṅgam anabhilapyam apravyāhāraṃ dharmaṃ deśayet.
K03psp_2-3u:2364: tasmād bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena satkartavyā gurukartavyā
K03psp_2-3u:2367: na śrāvakabhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_2-3u:2368: abhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati. avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati tathāgatadarśanena sattvaparipākena
K03psp_2-3u:2370: tāṃś ca tathāgatān satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ. iti parārthādhimuktimṛdvadhimātrā
K03psp_2-3u:2371: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yady ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddho 'pi me upanāmyeta,
K03psp_2-3u:2372: imāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitaṃ kṛtvā upanāmyeta,
K03psp_2-3u:2373: aham anayor dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayor imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyāṃ. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2374: ato nirjātāni hi tathāgataśarīrāṇi. tena satkriyante gurukriyante mānayante pūjyante
K03psp_2-3u:2375: yena te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca tāni satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā na
K03psp_2-3u:2377: devamanuṣyasaṃpattīr anubhūya yathāpraṇidhānena nirvāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena (PSP_2-3:91)
K03psp_2-3u:2378: vā. api tu khalu punar bhagavan yac ca tathāgatadarśanaṃ yac ca prajñāpāramitādarśanaṃ tulyam etat,
K03psp_2-3u:2379: tathā hi bhagavan yā prajñāpāramitā yaś ca tathāgato 'dvayam etad advaidhīkāram. iti parārthādhimuktir madhyamṛddhī
K03psp_2-3u:2380: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yaś ca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tribhiḥ prātihāryair dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_2-3u:2381: yad uta dvādaśāṅgaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yāvad avadānopadeśā,
K03psp_2-3u:2382: yaś ca sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya parebhyaś ca vistareṇa deśayeta tulyam etat. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2383: ato nirjātāni hi bhagavaṃs trīṇi prātihāryāṇi,
K03psp_2-3u:2384: tato nirjātaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yāvad avadānopadeśāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:2385: punar aparaṃ bhagavan ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti yad uta sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yāvad avadānopadeśāḥ tribhiḥ prātihāryair,
K03psp_2-3u:2386: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho yāvad vidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālkopameṣu
K03psp_2-3u:2387: lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti tribhiḥ prātihāryair yad uta sūtraṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2389: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyāt yāvat parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayet tulyam etat. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2390: ato nirjātāni hi bhagavaṃs trīṇi prātihāryāṇi. tato nirjātaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yāvad avadānopādeśāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:2391: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yaś caikaikasyāṃ diśi yāvanto daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu
K03psp_2-3u:2392: gaṅgānadīvālukopamās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tān satkuryād gurukuryāt
K03psp_2-3u:2394: yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā satkuryād gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhis tulyam etat. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2395: ato nirjātā hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:2397: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:2399: tasya na nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatiḥ. pratikāṅkṣitavyā na śrāvakabhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
K03psp_2-3u:2400: tathā hi sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthito 'vinivartanīyāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:2401: tathā hi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā udgṛhṇāti dhārayati
K03psp_2-3u:2402: vācayati paryavāpnoti yoniśaś ca manasikaroti tāṃ ca likhitāṃ satkaroti gurukaroti
K03psp_2-3u:2404: tasya na kutaścid bhayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyaṃ. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dhanikabhayabhītaḥ puruṣo rājānam upatiṣṭhet,
K03psp_2-3u:2405: sa rājānaṃ sevamāno yebhya evāsya bhayaṃ bhavati tair eva sevyate na ca tebhyo bibheti. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2406: evam etat bhagavan balavati niśraye bhayaṃ na bhavati. evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni
K03psp_2-3u:2407: tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante. tatra bhagavan yathā sa rājā evaṃ prajñāpāramitā draṣṭavyā,
K03psp_2-3u:2408: yathā sa rājaniḥśritaḥ puruṣaḥ pūjāṃ labhate. evam eva tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni
K03psp_2-3u:2409: pūjāṃ labhante. yad api bhagavaṃs tat sarvajñajñānaṃ tad api prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:2410: tasmāt tayor dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ pratyaṃśam imām evāhaṃ prajñārapāmitāṃ parigṛhṇīyāṃ. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2413: ato nirjātāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:2415: ato nirjātāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante,
K03psp_2-3u:2417: yatra bhagavaṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:2418: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti tatra teṣāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2419: sattvānāṃ manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ na lapsyante,
K03psp_2-3u:2420: sarve ca te sattvā anupūrveṇa parinirvāṇadharmāṇo bhaviṣyanti. evaṃ maharddhikā bhagavann
K03psp_2-3u:2421: iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā. yatra hi nāma bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā trisāhasramahāsāhasre
K03psp_2-3u:2422: lokadhātau ye sattvās teṣāṃ buddhakṛtyena pratyupasthitā,
K03psp_2-3u:2424: bhagavaṃs tatra lokadhātau pratikāṅkṣitavyo yatra lokadhātau iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:2425: pracariṣyati. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavann anarghaṃ yat maṇiratnaiḥ bhavet tat khalu
K03psp_2-3u:2426: punar mahāmaṇiratnam ebhir eva guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ bhavet. yatrayatra tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2427: sthāpyeta tatratatrāmanuṣyā avatāraṃ na labhante. yatrayatra cāmanuṣyagṛhītaḥ strī
K03psp_2-3u:2428: vā puruṣo vā bhavet tatratatra tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ praveṣyeta praveśitamātra eva tasmin
K03psp_2-3u:2429: mahāmaṇiratne so 'manuṣyaḥ prakrāmet tasya mahāmaṇiratnasya tejo 'sahamānaḥ. pittena
K03psp_2-3u:2430: vā dahyamāne śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tad api pittaṃ nigṛhṇīyān na vivardhetopaśāmyeta.
K03psp_2-3u:2431: vātābhibhūte vā śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tam api vātaṃ nigṛhṇīyāt. śleṣmaṇā
K03psp_2-3u:2432: upastabdhe śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta taṃ sarvaṃ śleṣmāṇaṃ praśamayet. saṃnipātābhibhūte
K03psp_2-3u:2433: vā śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā purataḥ sthāpyeta tasyāpi
K03psp_2-3u:2434: sa vyādhir upaśāmyeta. tac ca mahāmaṇiratnaṃ rātrāvabhāsaṃ kuryāt. uṣṇakāle ca vartamāne
K03psp_2-3u:2435: yatra pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ śiśiraḥ parivarteta.
K03psp_2-3u:2436: śiśirakāle 'pi vartamāne yatra pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta sa pṛthivīpradeśo
K03psp_2-3u:2437: gharmaḥ parivarteta. yatra ca tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta sa ca pṛthivīpradeśo nātyuṣṇo
K03psp_2-3u:2439: yatra pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratṇaṃ tiṣṭhati tatra pṛthivīpradeśe nāśīviṣā upavicaranti vṛścikādīni vā sarīsṛpāṇi vā,
K03psp_2-3u:2440: yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā āśīviṣeṇa daṣṭo bhavet tasyāpi tan mahāmaṇiratnam
K03psp_2-3u:2441: upadarśyeta tasya saha darśanenaiva tad viṣaṃ vigacchet. ebhir evam ādibhir guṇair
K03psp_2-3u:2443: ye 'pi bhagavan striyo vā puruṣā vā nānāvyādhiparigatā bhavanti teṣām api kāye tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta,
K03psp_2-3u:2444: teṣām api sarve te vyādhaya upaśamaṃ gaccheyuḥ. yatrāpi bhagavann udake tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tad api sarvam (PSP_2-3:94)
K03psp_2-3u:2445: udakaṃ svavarṇasadṛśaṃ kuryāt. saced bhagavaṃs tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ nīlena vāsasā pariveṣṭya
K03psp_2-3u:2446: udake prakṣipet tad udakaṃ nīlaṃ kuryāt. sacet pītakena sacel lohitakena vastreṇa
K03psp_2-3u:2447: saced māñjiṣṭhavarṇena sacet sphaṭikavarṇena vastreṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvā
K03psp_2-3u:2448: udake prakṣipyeta tad varṇam udakaṃ bhavet. nānāraṅgaraktair api vastrais tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2449: baddhvā udake prakṣipyeta tad udakaṃ nānāvarṇaṃ kuryāt. yatra ca bhagavann udake
K03psp_2-3u:2450: kaluṣe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tat sarvam udakaṃ prasādayed ebhir evam ādibhir
K03psp_2-3u:2452: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandaḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:2454: kauśika divyaṃ tan mahāmaṇiratnam utāho jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇām etad mahāmaṇiratnaṃ vidyate.
K03psp_2-3u:2455: śakra āha: divyaṃ tad bhadanta mahāmaṇiratnaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:2456: yāni jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni tāni parīttāni gurūṇi ca,
K03psp_2-3u:2457: yāni punar divyāni tāni mahānti laghūni ca,
K03psp_2-3u:2458: tair ākārais tathā suparipūrṇāni jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni yathā na
K03psp_2-3u:2459: suparipūrṇāni punar jāmbūdvīpakāni maṇiratnāni divyānāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ saṃkhyām api
K03psp_2-3u:2460: nopayānti kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api nopayānti. tat khalu mahāmaṇiratnaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2461: yasmin karaṇḍake tiṣṭhati yadā tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ tasmāt karaṇḍakād utkṣiptaṃ bhavati
K03psp_2-3u:2463: atra tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthitam abhūd iti.
K03psp_2-3u:2464: evam etad bhadantānanda yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pṛthivīpradeśe pracariṣyati na tatra
K03psp_2-3u:2465: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā kāyikā vā caitasikā vā duḥkhopadravā manuṣyakṛtā vā
K03psp_2-3u:2466: amanuṣyakṛtā vā bhaviṣyanti. mahāmaṇiratnam iti prajñāpāramitāyā etad adhivacanaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2467: sarvajñajñānasya ca. kiyantaḥ śakyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā guṇāḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:2468: parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi prajñāpāramitāyā guṇāḥ. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā
K03psp_2-3u:2469: kṣāntipāramitāyā śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā adhyātmaśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2470: smṛtyupasthānāṃ samyakprahāṇānām ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya (PSP_2-3:95)
K03psp_2-3u:2471: mārgasyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānām aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2472: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2473: vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ sarvajñajñānasyāpi
K03psp_2-3u:2474: dharmadhātor api dharmaniyāmatāyās tathatāyā bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātoḥ sarvajñajñānasyaite
K03psp_2-3u:2475: guṇā yena parinirvṛtasyāpi tathāgatasya śarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante. sarvajñajñānasya
K03psp_2-3u:2477: tathāgataśarirāṇi bhājanabhūtāny abhūvaṃs tenaitāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante.
K03psp_2-3u:2479: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:2480: ratnapāramitāyā bhagavann imāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam abhūt. asaṃkleśāvyavadānapāramitāyā anutpādānirodhapāramitāyā anāgatipāramitāyā imāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:2483: punar aparaṃ bhagavaṃs tiṣṭhatu trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:2484: saced bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇāś cūḍikābaddhā bhaveyur,
K03psp_2-3u:2485: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā upanāmyeta,
K03psp_2-3u:2486: tayor ahaṃ bhagavan dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayor imām eva prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyāṃ. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2487: ato nirjātāni hi tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni pūjāṃ labhante.
K03psp_2-3u:2488: yaḥ punar bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryāt
K03psp_2-3u:2489: mānayet pūjayet sa tasya kuśalamūlasya parittīkṛtāni divyāni mānuṣyakāṇi ca sukhāni
K03psp_2-3u:2490: pratyanubhūya kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu
K03psp_2-3u:2491: vā cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu vā trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu
K03psp_2-3u:2492: deveṣu sukhaṃ pratyanubhūya tena kuśalamūlena duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:2493: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvato yoniśaś ca manasikurvato dhyānapāramitā (PSP_2-3:96)
K03psp_2-3u:2494: paripūryate dhyānapāramitā paripūrṇā vīryapāramitā paripūryate vīryapāramitā paripūrṇā
K03psp_2-3u:2495: kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate kṣāntipāramitā paripurṇā śīlaparamitā paripūryate śīlapāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:2496: paripūrṇā dānapāramitā paripūryate dānapāramitā paripūrṇā. evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
K03psp_2-3u:2498: so 'tikramya śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya bodhisattvābhijñāḥ pratilabhya buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:2500: yair ātmabhāvaiḥ sattvān paripācayiṣyati. yadi vā cakravartyātmabhāvaṃ paigṛhya kṣatriya
K03psp_2-3u:2501: mahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhya brāhmaṇa mahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhya gṛhapatimahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2502: parigṛhya sattvān paripācayiṣyati. tasmād bhagavan na me tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravam
K03psp_2-3u:2503: eva me bhagavan nāpi na grahītukāmaḥ. api tu khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitayā satkṛtayā
K03psp_2-3u:2504: gurukṛtayā mānitayā pūjitayā tathāgataśarīrāṇy api satkṛtāni bhavanti gurukṛtāni
K03psp_2-3u:2506: punar aparaṃ bhagavan ye daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā asaṃkhyeyeṣv
K03psp_2-3u:2507: aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti. tāṃś ca
K03psp_2-3u:2508: dharmakāyena ca rūpakāyena ca draṣṭukāmena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā
K03psp_2-3u:2509: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā yoniśaś
K03psp_2-3u:2510: ca manasikartavyā. sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tān daśasu dikṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2512: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā buddhānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā.
K03psp_2-3u:2513: dharmatayā dve ime bhagavatāṃ dharmate. katame dve?
K03psp_2-3u:2517: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatājñānaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu yad āryasatyeṣu yad
K03psp_2-3u:2519: yac caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu (PSP_2-3:97)
K03psp_2-3u:2520: jñānaṃ, yat kuśalamūleṣu sāsravānāsraveṣu sāvadyānavadyeṣu laukikalokottareṣu saṃkleśavyavadānadharmeṣu jñānam iyam ucyate saṃskṛtadharmatā.
K03psp_2-3u:2522: yasya dharmasya notpādo na nirodho na sthitir nāsthiḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:2523: nānyathātvaṃ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na hānir na vṛddhiḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:2524: yāvat sarvadharmāṇām abhāvasvabhāvatā. katamā sarvadharmāṇām abhāvasvabhāvatā?
K03psp_2-3u:2525: yā adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā
K03psp_2-3u:2528: abhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā parabhāvaśūnyatā. yat sarvadharmāṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2529: prakṛtiśūnyatātvam anupalambho yāvad yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirabhilapyatā apravyāhāratā
K03psp_2-3u:2532: atha khalu bhagavān sakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:2533: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
K03psp_2-3u:2534: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi
K03psp_2-3u:2535: te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva
K03psp_2-3u:2536: prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. ye 'py etarhi daśadiglokadhātuṣu
K03psp_2-3u:2537: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti
K03psp_2-3u:2538: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi
K03psp_2-3u:2539: te 'bhūvann atītānāgatāḥ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām
K03psp_2-3u:2542: ye 'pi sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca. ye 'pi te daśadiśi loke 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu śrāvakā,
K03psp_2-3u:2543: ye ca pratyekabuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya śrāvakabodhipratyekabodhiprāptās. tat kasya hetos? tathā hy (PSP_2-3:98)
K03psp_2-3u:2546: tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa na punaḥ paramārthena. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2547: na hi prajñāpāramitāyām apāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā sthalaṃ vā nimnaṃ vā samaṃ vā viṣamaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2548: vā nimittaṃ vā animittaṃ vā laukikaṃ vā lokottaraṃ vā saṃskṛtaṃ vā asaṃskṛtaṃ vā
K03psp_2-3u:2549: kuśalaṃ vā akuśalaṃ vā atītaṃ vā anāgataṃ vā pratyutpannaṃ vā prajñāyate. na ca kauśika
K03psp_2-3u:2550: prajñāpāramitā kasyacid dharmasya pradāyikā na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ nārhatvadharmāṇāṃ pradāyikā.
K03psp_2-3u:2552: śakra āha: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā. atra hi bhagavan bodhisattvā
K03psp_2-3u:2553: mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvasattvacittacaritāni prajānanti na ca
K03psp_2-3u:2555: na jīvaṃ na poṣaṃ na puruṣaṃ na manujaṃ na mānavaṃ na kārakaṃ na vedakaṃ na jānakaṃ na paśyakam upalabhante. na rūpam upalabhante,
K03psp_2-3u:2556: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam upalabhante. na pṛthivīdhātum upalabhante,
K03psp_2-3u:2557: nābdhātuṃ na tejodhātuṃ na vāyudhātuṃ nākāśadhātuṃ na vijñānadhātum upalabhante. na cakṣur upalabhante,
K03psp_2-3u:2561: yad api tac cakṣūrūpasaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā
K03psp_2-3u:2562: aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nopalabhante. evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyaṃ mano nopalabhante.
K03psp_2-3u:2564: śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ yāvan manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopalabhante yāvad yad api tan manodharmasaṃsparśapratyayād
K03psp_2-3u:2565: utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nopalabhante. smṛtyupasthānāninopalabhante.
K03psp_2-3u:2567: nopalabhante. nāryasatyāni nāṣṭavimokṣān na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr na ṣaḍabhijñā
K03psp_2-3u:2569: na daśatathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān upalabhante. nādhyātmaśūnyatām upalabhante,
K03psp_2-3u:2570: na bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upalabhante.
K03psp_2-3u:2571: na samādhīn na dhāraṇīmukhāny upalabhante. na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāny upalabhante.
K03psp_2-3u:2572: na bodhiṃ na buddhaṃ na buddhadharmān upalabhante. na hi prajñāpāramitā upalambhayogena
K03psp_2-3u:2574: tathā hi svabhāvo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K03psp_2-3u:2578: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupalambhayogena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhim api nopalabhate prāg eva bodhisattvadharmān.
K03psp_2-3u:2579: śakra āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām eva carati nānyāsu pāramitāsu?
K03psp_2-3u:2581: sarvāsu kauśika pāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati na kevalaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ.
K03psp_2-3u:2582: tac cānupalambhayogena sa dānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate dāyakam api nopalabhate pratigrāhakam api nopalabhate,
K03psp_2-3u:2583: śīlapāramitāṃ nopalabhate śīlavantam api nopalabhate dauḥśīlyam api nopalabhate,
K03psp_2-3u:2584: kṣāntipāramitāṃ nopalabhate kṣamiṇam api nopalabhate kṣamyam api nopalabhate vīryapāramitāṃ nopalabhate kartavyam api nopalabhate kāyacittam api nopalabhate,
K03psp_2-3u:2585: dhyānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate cittam api nopalabhate samādhim api nopalabhate,
K03psp_2-3u:2586: prajñāpāramitāṃ nopalabhate prajñāvantam api nopalabhate prajñayam api nopalabhate.
K03psp_2-3u:2587: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_2-3u:2588: dānaṃ dadataḥ. prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2589: kṣāntiṃ bhāvayato vīryam ārambhamāṇasya dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya dharmān vibhāvayato
K03psp_2-3u:2590: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā sarvadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena.
K03psp_2-3u:2595: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām anupalambhayogena. daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2596: catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena.
K03psp_2-3u:2598: anupalambhayogena yāvat sarvadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena. tadyathāpi nāma kauśika
K03psp_2-3u:2600: na ca teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ cchāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ copalabhyate,
K03psp_2-3u:2601: api tu cchāyā cchāyeti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati. evam eva kauśika pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2602: sarvajñātāpariṇāmitānāṃ na viśeṣo na nānākaraṇam upalabhyate 'nupalambhayogena.
K03psp_2-3u:2603: iti parārthādhimuktir adhimātrādhimātrety ukto adhimuktimanaskāraḥ guṇaparikīrtanaparivarto nāma caturthaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2604: śakra āha: mahāguṇasamanvāgatā bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:2607: kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitām api
K03psp_2-3u:2609: tāṃ ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhir yathopadiṣṭāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ yoniśo manasikuryād,
K03psp_2-3u:2610: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyāt,
K03psp_2-3u:2613: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra pratiprakṣyāmi yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuryāḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:2614: kauśika, yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:2615: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarṣapaphalamātrakaṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ parasmai dadyāt saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt,
K03psp_2-3u:2616: so 'pi kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tat sarṣapaphalamātrakaṃ (PSP_2-3:101)
K03psp_2-3u:2619: śakra āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājāneyāyaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi svayaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed arcayed apacāyeta,
K03psp_2-3u:2620: so 'pi sarṣapaphalamātrakaṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ parasmai dādyād ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2621: puṇyaṃ prasavet. evam arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamānena tathāgatena vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya
K03psp_2-3u:2622: ātmabhāvaṃ vajropamaṃ bhittvā tathāgataśarīrāṇy adhiṣṭhitāni mahākaruṇāṃ saṃjanaya
K03psp_2-3u:2623: sattvakāye tathāgatadhātuvainayikānāṃ sattvānām. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2624: ye kecid bhagavan tathāgatasya parinirvṛttasyāntaśaḥ sarṣapaphalamātrakam api dhātuṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2625: pūjayiṣyanti sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ na śakyaṃ tasya kuśalamūlasya paryanto 'dhigantuṃ yāvat parinirvāṇam iti.
K03psp_2-3u:2627: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2628: satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyaty arcayiṣyaty apacāyiṣyate puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:2629: parasmai ca likhitvā dadyād evaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. iti prathamā stutimātra
K03psp_2-3u:2630: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathopadiṣṭāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2631: parebhyo gatvā ācakṣīta deśayet prakāśayed vibhajed uttānīkuryād ayaṃ sa kulaputro
K03psp_2-3u:2632: vā kuladuhitā vā tataḥ pūrvakāt kulaputrād vā kuladuhitur vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
K03psp_2-3u:2634: anyatarānyataro vā gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2635: eṣa evātra śāstā draṣṭavyo yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na hy anyaḥ śāstā anyā prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:2638: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā atītānāgatapratyutpannās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prādurbhūtāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:2640: te 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim (PSP_2-3:102)
K03psp_2-3u:2641: abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. atraiva kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śrāvakāḥ śikṣitāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:2644: bodhisattvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmanti avakrāntāś ca avakramiṣyanti ca. tasmāt
K03psp_2-3u:2645: tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān saṃmukhaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2647: iyam eva prajñāpāramitā pustakalikhitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā
K03psp_2-3u:2650: kan nv ahaṃ dharmam upaniśritya vihareyaṃ satkuryāṃ gurukuryāṃ mānayeyaṃ pūjayeyam
K03psp_2-3u:2651: iti. so 'haṃ kauśika yadā nādrākṣaṃ sadevake loke sabrahmake samārake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2652: prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāṃ sadṛśam. tasya me sadṛśaṃ samanupaśyamānasya etad abhūt;
K03psp_2-3u:2653: yan nūnam ahaṃ ya eva mayā dharmābhisaṃbuddhas tam eva dharmaṃ satkuryāṃ gurukuryāṃ mānayeyaṃ pūjayeyam iti,
K03psp_2-3u:2654: dharmam eva copaniśrāya vihareyam iti. ayam eva kauśika saddharmo yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_2-3u:2655: aham eva kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkaromi gurukaromi mānayāmi pūjayāmi satkṛtya
K03psp_2-3u:2656: gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā upaniśrāya ca viharāmi. kiṃ vā punaḥ kauśika kulaputreṇa
K03psp_2-3u:2657: vā kuladuhitrā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:2658: na satkartavyā na gurukartavyā na mānayitavyā na pūjayitavyā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:2659: tathā hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikaiḥ kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyam eva
K03psp_2-3u:2660: prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:2663: tathāgatanir jātāś ca sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhās. tasmāt tarhi kauśika mahāyānikaiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2664: kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā śrāvakayānikaiś ca iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā
K03psp_2-3u:2667: yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante. iti dvitīyā stutimātrā
K03psp_2-3u:2668: ekaṃ kauśika sattvaṃ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpya aprameyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K03psp_2-3u:2669: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2670: daśasu kauśika kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu sattvāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā aparimuktā eva nirayatiryagyoniyamalokāsuragatibhyaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:2671: srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ punaḥ sarvadurgatibhyo mukto bhavati. iti tṛtīyā stutimātrā
K03psp_2-3u:2672: sakṛdāgāmiphale evaṃ sattvaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K03psp_2-3u:2673: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. iti caturthī stutimātrā
K03psp_2-3u:2674: evam anāgāmiphale ekaṃ sattvaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K03psp_2-3u:2675: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. iti pañcamī stutimātrā
K03psp_2-3u:2676: evam ekaṃ sattvam arhattve pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K03psp_2-3u:2677: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. iti ṣaṣṭhī stutimātrā
K03psp_2-3u:2678: evam ekaṃ sattvaṃ pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K03psp_2-3u:2679: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. iti saptamī stutimātrā
K03psp_2-3u:2680: yaḥ kaścit kauśika kulaputro vās kuladuhitā vā jāmbudvīpakān sattvān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet,
K03psp_2-3u:2681: yo vānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. tat kasya
K03psp_2-3u:2682: tathā hi buddhanetryāḥ so 'nupacchedāya pratyupasthito bhavati. iti aṣṭamī stutimātrā
K03psp_2-3u:2683: evaṃ yaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakān sattvān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed,
K03psp_2-3u:2684: yo vānya ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ sanyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. iti navamī stutimātrety uktā stutiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2685: evaṃ yaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakān sattvān anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed,
K03psp_2-3u:2686: yo vānya ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. iti prathamā stobhamātrā
K03psp_2-3u:2687: evaṃ yaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakān sattvān arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayed,
K03psp_2-3u:2688: yo vānya ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. iti dvitiyā stobhamātrā
K03psp_2-3u:2689: evaṃ yaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakān sattvān pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed,
K03psp_2-3u:2690: yo vānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. tat kasya
K03psp_2-3u:2691: tathā hi buddhanetryāḥ. so 'nupacchedāya pratyupasthito bhavati,
K03psp_2-3u:2692: ya ekaṃ sattvam apy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2693: bodhisattvanirjātā hi kauśika yāvantas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ. tad anena
K03psp_2-3u:2694: kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ bodhisattvo 'pi pūjayitavyaḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa
K03psp_2-3u:2696: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ. kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:2697: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:2698: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:2700: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_2-3u:2701: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyād antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2702: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā,
K03psp_2-3u:2703: yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvaniyāmam avakrāntāś cāvakramiṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:2704: cāvakrāmanti ca. yāvad arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca. pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2705: prāptāḥ prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca. bodhisattvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntā avakramiṣyanti ca avakrāmanti,
K03psp_2-3u:2706: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante abhisaṃbudhyante ca. katame ca te kauśika anāsravā dharmās?
K03psp_2-3u:2707: tadyathā pāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāś catvāry āryasatyāni catvāry apramāṇāni
K03psp_2-3u:2708: catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'ṣṭa vimokṣā navānupūrvaṃ vihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā
K03psp_2-3u:2710: sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2711: pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yāvad aparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭās
K03psp_2-3u:2712: tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tad anenāpi te kauśika (PSP_2-3:105)
K03psp_2-3u:2713: paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam. yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2714: pustakalikhitām api kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāl likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi ayan tato bahutaraṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2716: tathā hi atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā,
K03psp_2-3u:2717: yair dharmaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni prajñayante,
K03psp_2-3u:2719: trāyastiṃśā yāmā tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartmo brahmapārṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇo yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagā devā prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:2725: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:2730: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prajñāyante. tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbudvīpakāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2731: sattvā yāvat pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpitā yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau
K03psp_2-3u:2732: sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu yāvat
K03psp_2-3u:2734: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:2735: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:2737: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_2-3u:2738: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyād antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:2740: buddhadharmāś ca. tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturmahādvīpdvīpake lokadhātau sattvā daśasu
K03psp_2-3u:2742: yaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ye sāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tan sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet,
K03psp_2-3u:2745: kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām antaśaḥ pustakalikhitām api kṛtvā parasmai dadyād antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2746: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:2748: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasre lokadhātau sattvā yāvat pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpitā,
K03psp_2-3u:2749: yaḥ kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ye dvisāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu yāvat pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:2750: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:2751: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:2753: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K03psp_2-3u:2754: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyād antaśo likhanāyāpi
K03psp_2-3u:2755: vācanāyāpi ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasre lokadhātau
K03psp_2-3u:2757: ye kecit kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro
K03psp_2-3u:2758: vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pṛtiṣṭhāpayet yāvat pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayed,
K03psp_2-3u:2759: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitām api kṛtvā
K03psp_2-3u:2760: parebhyo dadyād antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi ayan tataḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K03psp_2-3u:2761: vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
K03psp_2-3u:2762: sattvā yāvat pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ yāvantaḥ kāuśika daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
K03psp_2-3u:2763: lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu
K03psp_2-3u:2765: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitām api kṛtvā
K03psp_2-3u:2766: parasmai dadyād antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi ayan tataḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K03psp_2-3u:2767: vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2768: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭās,
K03psp_2-3u:2769: tatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvaniyāmam avakrāntā avakramiṣyanti avakrāmanti ca,
K03psp_2-3u:2770: yāvad arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca. pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpsyante
K03psp_2-3u:2771: prāpnuvanti ca. bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvāś ca bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntā avakramiṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:2772: avakrāmanti ca. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante
K03psp_2-3u:2775: tadyathā pāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāś catvāri satyāni adhyātmaśūnyatā
K03psp_2-3u:2777: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo daśa tathāgatabalāni yāvad aparimāṇā buddhadharmā
K03psp_2-3u:2778: vistareṇopadiṣṭās tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tad anenāpi
K03psp_2-3u:2780: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitām api kṛtvā parebhyo dadyād antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K03psp_2-3u:2782: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā,
K03psp_2-3u:2783: yair dharmaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:2784: cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ prajñāyante yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagā devāḥ prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:2785: pāramitāḥ prajñāyante yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:2790: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K03psp_2-3u:2791: vā caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu
K03psp_2-3u:2792: pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:2793: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:2794: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:2796: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
K03psp_2-3u:2797: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyād antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2798: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:2799: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:2800: idan tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:2801: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvāṃś cāturdvīpakān sāhasre dvisāhasre trisāhasre lokadhātau
K03psp_2-3u:2802: sarvasattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu dhyānāpramāṇeṣv ārūpyābhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpya.
K03psp_2-3u:2803: tatrāyaṃ yoniśo manasikāro na dvayacarito bodhau prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:2807: na dvayacarito bodhau dānapāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
K03psp_2-3u:2808: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. na dvayacarito bodhau adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām
K03psp_2-3u:2809: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati. na
K03psp_2-3u:2811: yoniśo manasikariṣyati. na dvayacarito bodhau aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān sarvākārajñatāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2813: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anekaparyāyeṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2814: parebhyo deśayiṣyati vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati vicariṣyati uttānīkariṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:2815: artham upadekṣyati. tatrāyaṃ prajñāpāramitārtho 'dvaye na prajñāpāramitāṃ drakṣyati na dvaye,
K03psp_2-3u:2816: na nimittato nānimittataḥ nāyūhato na niryūhataḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:2825: na pratyaṃśato nāpratyaṃśataḥ na dharmato nādharmataḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:2827: na bhūtakoṭito nābhūtakoṭitaḥ. ayam eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:2828: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ parebhyo vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati svādhyāsyati deśayiṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:2829: bhāvayiṣyati uttānīkariṣyati arthaṃ copadekṣyati. na tv eva yaḥ kevalam ātmane codgrahīṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:2830: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. iti pañcamī stobhamātrā
K03psp_2-3u:2831: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svayaṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:2832: tāṃ ca parebhyo vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati prajñāpayiṣyati prasthāpayiṣyati vibhāvayiṣyati uttānīkariṣyati arthaṃ copadekṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:2833: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:2834: śakra āha: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:2836: evaṃ khalu kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitā upadeṣṭavyā sārthā savyañjanā,
K03psp_2-3u:2838: kuladuhitā vā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇena puṇyaskandhena samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. iti ṣaṣṭhī stobhamātrā
K03psp_2-3u:2839: sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu dīkṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśy aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān
K03psp_2-3u:2840: aparimāṇāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvajjīvaṃ sukhopadhānena satkuryād
K03psp_2-3u:2842: yaḍ ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa
K03psp_2-3u:2843: parebhyo vistareṇa deśayed artham asyā vijñāpayet saṃprakāśayed vibhāvayed vicared
K03psp_2-3u:2844: uttānīkuryād ayam eva tataḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2845: atra hi prajñāpāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā tair atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2846: samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate
K03psp_2-3u:2848: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān kalpān dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2849: parebhyo vistareṇa saṃprakāśayet kathayed yāvat sūcayet tac cānupalambhayogena,
K03psp_2-3u:2850: ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tatra kauśika katama upalambhaḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:2855: parasmai dānan dadato dānam eva sthāsyati,
K03psp_2-3u:2858: amūn sattvān rakṣāmi neyaṃ śīlapāramitā. ahaṃ kṣāntim ārabhe,
K03psp_2-3u:2870: nāyaṃ prajñāpāramitā. evaṃ hi kauśika upalambhe caritasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na dānapāramitā paripūryate,
K03psp_2-3u:2871: na śīlapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na vīryapāramitā na dhyānapāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:2873: śakra āha: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā paripūryate?
K03psp_2-3u:2881: iha kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānan dadan na dāyakam upalabhate na pratigrāhakam upalabhate na deyam upalabhate,
K03psp_2-3u:2882: iyam ucyate dānapāramitā. na śilam upalabhate na śīlavantaṃ na sattvam upalabhate,
K03psp_2-3u:2883: iyam ucyate śīlapāramitā. na kṣāntim upalabhate na kṣamyaṃ na kṣamiṇam upalabhate,
K03psp_2-3u:2884: iyam ucyate kṣāntipāramitā. na vīryam upalabhate na kāyaṃ na cittam upalabhate,
K03psp_2-3u:2885: iyam ucyate vīryapāramitā. na dhyānam upalabhate na dhyāyinaṃ na dhyātavyam upalabhate,
K03psp_2-3u:2886: iyam ucyate dhyānapāramitā. na prajñām upalabhate na prajñāvantaṃ na prajñeyam upalabhate yeṣām arthāya bhāvayati,
K03psp_2-3u:2887: iyam ucyate prajñāpāramitā. evaṃ carataḥ kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā paripūryate,
K03psp_2-3u:2888: śīlapāramitā paripūryate kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate vīryapāramitā paripūryate dhyānapāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:2889: paripūryate prajñāpāramitā paripūryate. evaṃ hi kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur
K03psp_2-3u:2890: vā anupalambheneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sārthā savyañjanopadeṣṭavyā. evaṃ dhyānapāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:2891: vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitā anupalambheneyaṃ sārthā savyañjanopadeṣṭavyā. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2892: bhaviṣyanti kauśikānāgate 'dhvani kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca te prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām
K03psp_2-3u:2893: upadekṣyanti. tatra kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitasya
K03psp_2-3u:2894: prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāśravaṇena vināśayiṣyanti teṣām apīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sārthā
K03psp_2-3u:2896: śakra āha: katamā sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā?
K03psp_2-3u:2898: iha kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyāma iti prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām
K03psp_2-3u:2899: upadekṣyanti. tatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā rūpam anityam ity upadekṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:2900: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam anityam ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ copadekṣyanti ya evaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2901: ca carati sa carati prajñāpāramitāyām iti. yeṣām upadekṣyanti kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṛṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2902: vā te rūpam anityam iti gaveṣiṣyanti. evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam anityam
K03psp_2-3u:2903: iti gaveṣiṣyanti. te prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti. te prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2904: cariṣyanti. te cakṣur anityam ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano
K03psp_2-3u:2905: 'nityam ity upadekṣyanti. rūpam anityam ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ śabdā gandhā rasāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:2906: spraṣṭavyā dharmā anityā ity upadekṣyanti. pṛthivīdhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:2908: ākāśadhātuṃ vijñānadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣurdhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:2909: śrotradhātuṃ ghrāṇadhātuṃ jihvādhātuṃ kāyadhātuṃ manodhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:2910: rūpadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti. śabdadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti. gandhadhātuṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2911: rasadhātuṃ spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ dharmadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣurvijñānadhātum
K03psp_2-3u:2912: anītya ity upadekṣyanti. śrotravijñānadhātuṃ ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ jihvāvijñānadhātuṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2913: kāyavijñānadhātuṃ manovijñānadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣuḥsaṃsparśadhātuni
K03psp_2-3u:2914: anitya ity upadekṣyanti. śrotrasaṃsparśadhātuṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśadhātuṃ jihvāsaṃsparśadhātuṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2915: kāyasaṃsparśadhātuṃ manaḥsaṃsparśadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā
K03psp_2-3u:2917: vedanā anityā ity upadekṣyanti. rūpaṃ duḥkham anityam anātmety aśubham ity upadekṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:2918: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ duḥkham anityam anātmety aśubham ity upadekṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:2919: pṛthivīdhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. abdhātuṃ tejodhātuṃ vāyudhātum
K03psp_2-3u:2920: ākāśadhātuṃ vijñānadhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmā
K03psp_2-3u:2921: duḥkhā iti anātmāna ity aśubhā ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣur duḥkham ity anātmety aśubham
K03psp_2-3u:2922: ity upadekṣyanti. śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano duḥkham ity anātmety aśubham ity
K03psp_2-3u:2923: upadekṣyanti. rūpadhātuṃ śabdadhātuṃ gandhadhātuṃ rasadhātuṃ spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ dharmadhātuṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2924: duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣurdhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha
K03psp_2-3u:2925: ity upadekṣyanti. śrotradhātuṃ ghrāṇadhātuṃ jihvādhātuṃ kāyadhātuṃ manodhātuṃ duḥkha
K03psp_2-3u:2926: ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:2928: duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti. cakṣuḥsaṃsparśadhātuṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā
K03psp_2-3u:2929: vedanā duḥkhety anātmikety aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśadhātuṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2931: aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ te prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāprativarṇikāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2933: dānapāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti. evaṃ rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam
K03psp_2-3u:2934: anityaṃ duḥkham anātmāśubham ity upadekṣyanti. yāvac cakṣū rūpaṃ cakṣurvijñānadhātum
K03psp_2-3u:2935: anityo duḥkho 'nātmāśubha ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ yāvac chrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānadhātum
K03psp_2-3u:2936: anityo duḥkho 'nātmāśubha ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ prajñāpāramitā anityā duḥkhānātmāśubhety
K03psp_2-3u:2937: upadekṣyanti. evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:2938: anityā duḥkhānātmāśubhety upadekṣyanti. evam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr anityā
K03psp_2-3u:2940: prajñāpārmitāyāṃ carantaḥ. evam upadekṣyanti smṛtyupasthānāny anityāni duḥkhāny anātmāny
K03psp_2-3u:2942: duḥkhā anātmāno 'śubhā ity upadekṣyanti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto yāvat sarvākārajñatām
K03psp_2-3u:2943: anityā duḥkhānātmāśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
K03psp_2-3u:2945: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśanta evam upadekṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:2946: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sa tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayamānaḥ prathamāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2947: bhūmau sthāsyasi yāvad daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2948: kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ bhāvayamānaḥ prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi
K03psp_2-3u:2949: yāvad daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. tac ca nimittayogenopalambhayogena sarvākārasaṃjñayā
K03psp_2-3u:2952: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā evam upadekṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:2953: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sa tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayamānaḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ samatikramiṣyasi,
K03psp_2-3u:2956: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā teṣāṃ mahāyānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśanta evam upadekṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:2957: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sa tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayamāno bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramiṣyasi,
K03psp_2-3u:2959: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśamānā evam upadekṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:2960: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sa tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayamāno 'nutpattikadharmakṣāntiṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2961: pratilapsyase sa tvam anutpattikadharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhya bodhisattvābhijñāsu sthāsyasi
K03psp_2-3u:2962: sa tvam abhijñāsu sthitvā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyasi buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2964: evam upadekṣyanti. evam upadiśamānāḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:2965: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:2966: yaḥ kulaputraḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
K03psp_2-3u:2967: yoniśo manasikariṣyati so 'saṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:2968: evaṃ copadiśamānāḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:2969: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇām upadekṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:2970: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2971: yat kuśalamūlaṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:2972: tat sarvam anumodya ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmaya. evam
K03psp_2-3u:2973: upadiśamānāḥ kauśika te kulaputra vā kuladuhitaro vā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:2974: śakra āha: katham upadiśantas te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām
K03psp_2-3u:2976: iha kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:2977: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayamāno rūpam anityato mā drākṣīs. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:2981: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra rūpan na nityam iti vā anityam iti vā vyapadiśyate. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:2982: tathā hi rūpam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kuto nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati?
K03psp_2-3u:2983: evaṃ copadiśantas te kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti. evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam anityato mā drākṣīs. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:2987: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra vijñānaṃ na nityam iti vā anityam iti vā vyapadiśyate. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:2988: tathā hi vijñānam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kuto nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati?
K03psp_2-3u:2989: evam upadiśantas te kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām
K03psp_2-3u:2993: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu ṣaṭsv abhijñāsu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:2994: catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu kartavyam. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra
K03psp_2-3u:2995: prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra sarvajñatām anityato drākṣīs. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:2999: yā prajñāpāramitā na tatra sarvajñatāyā nityatā vā anityatā vā vyapadiśyate. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:3000: tathā hi sarvajñataiva na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityatā vā anityatā vā bhaviṣyati?
K03psp_2-3u:3001: evaṃ copadiśantaḥ. kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:3002: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā teṣāṃ mahāyānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā evaṃ na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:3003: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca tvaṃ kaṃcid dharmaṃ drākṣīḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3004: mā ca kasmiṃcid dharme sthāḥ. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:3005: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na sa dharmaḥ saṃvidyate yo dharmo draṣṭavyo yatra vā pratiṣṭhātavyaḥ. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:3006: tathā hi kauśika sarvadharmā svabhāvena śūnyāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3007: yaś ca dharmaḥ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ so 'bhāvo,
K03psp_2-3u:3009: yā prajñāpāramitā sā na kasyacid dharmasyāyuhalaṃ vā niryūhalaṃ vā utpādo vā nirodho
K03psp_2-3u:3010: vā ucchedo vā śaśvato vā ekārthatā vā nānārthatā vā āgamo vā nirgamo vā. evam upadiśantaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3011: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:3012: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā artho vyapadeṣṭavyaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:3013: evam upadiśan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati. na tv eva
K03psp_2-3u:3014: te pūrvakāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca. ity aṣṭamī stobhamātrā
K03psp_2-3u:3015: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:3016: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:3017: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:3019: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3020: sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo naikaiḥ paryāyaiḥ kathayiṣyati deśayiṣyati vibhāvayiṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:3021: uttānīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām
K03psp_2-3u:3022: udgṛhṇīṣva paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3024: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannaś ca srotaāpattiphalaṃ ca prabhāvyate. tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbudvīpakāḥ sarvasattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale
K03psp_2-3u:3026: tiṣṭhantu sāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale vinītās,
K03psp_2-3u:3027: tiṣṭhantu dvisāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale vinītāḥ. tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvsḥ srotaāpattiphale
K03psp_2-3u:3028: yāvantaḥ kauśika pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā (PSP_2-3:116)
K03psp_2-3u:3029: srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣūrdhvam
K03psp_2-3u:3030: adho gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K03psp_2-3u:3031: vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:3032: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:3033: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:3035: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3036: parebhyaḥ. sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇa kathayed deśayed artham asyāḥ saṃprakāśayed
K03psp_2-3u:3038: evaṃ ca vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīṣva paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:3039: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannaḥ prabhāvyate.
K03psp_2-3u:3041: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanto jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvās tān sarvān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhapayet. iti prathamā praśaṃsāmātrā
K03psp_2-3u:3042: yāvad anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. iti dvitīyā praśaṃsāmātrā
K03psp_2-3u:3043: yāvad arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:3044: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:3045: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:3047: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3048: sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśet kathayet saṃprakāśayed vibhajed vibhāvayed vicared uttānīkuryād,
K03psp_2-3u:3049: evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:3050: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prajñāyate.
K03psp_2-3u:3051: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhattve vinītā yaḥ kaścit
K03psp_2-3u:3052: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā cāturdvīpakān sarvasattvān arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet. sāhasre
K03psp_2-3u:3053: lokadhātau sarvasattvān arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet. dvisāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvān
K03psp_2-3u:3056: yāvantaḥ kauśika pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvās tān
K03psp_2-3u:3057: sarvān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvad arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet. evaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3058: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ diśi vidikṣūrdhvam adho gaṅgānadīvālukpameṣu
K03psp_2-3u:3059: lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvās tān sarvān yāvad arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:3060: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:3061: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:3063: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_2-3u:3064: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśayed deśayet kathayed vibhāvayed vicared uttānīkuryād,
K03psp_2-3u:3065: evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya
K03psp_2-3u:3066: yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. ayam eva tato
K03psp_2-3u:3067: bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:3068: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhantaḥ prajñāyante. iti tṛtiyā praśaṃsāmātrā
K03psp_2-3u:3069: punar aparaṃ kauśika yāvanto daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukpameṣu lokadhātuṣv ekaikasyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3070: diśi sattvās tān sarvān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:3071: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:3072: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:3074: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_2-3u:3075: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanām arthikebhyaḥ chandikebhyo vistareṇopadiśet kathayet saṃprakāśayed vibhāvayed vicared uttānīkuryād,
K03psp_2-3u:3076: evaṃ ca kathayed evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi
K03psp_2-3u:3077: dhāraya vācaya yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:3078: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ prabhāvyate. iti caturthī praśaṃsāmātrā
K03psp_2-3u:3079: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye jāmbudvīpe sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?

K03psp_2-3u:3086: paryavāpnuhi yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva.
K03psp_2-3u:3087: yathāyathā tvaṃ kulaputra yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipatsyase tathātathā
K03psp_2-3u:3088: tvaṃ kulaputra sarvajñatāyā lābhī bhaviṣyasi. yathāyathā ca te sarvajñatāparipūriṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3089: gamiṣyati tathātathā ca te bhūyasyā mātrayā prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gamiṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:3090: yathāyathā ca te prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gamiṣyati tathātathā tvam anuttarāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3092: ato nirjātā hi kauśika prathamacittotpādikā bodhisattvā,
K03psp_2-3u:3093: ye ca kecana daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvās
K03psp_2-3u:3094: teṣām api sarveṣāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātā prathamacittotpādikā bhūmiḥ. iti pañcamī praśaṃsāmātrā
K03psp_2-3u:3095: yāyantaś cāturdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī praśaṃsāmātrā
K03psp_2-3u:3096: yāyantaḥ sāhasre sattvāḥ. iti saptamī praśaṃsāmātrā

K03psp_2-3u:3101: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:3102: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
K03psp_2-3u:3104: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,

K03psp_2-3u:3106: evaṃ ca vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa dhāraya vācaya deśaya saṃprakāśaya
K03psp_2-3u:3107: paryavāpnuhi yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva.
