K03psp_2-3u:3110: sarvajñatāyā lābhī bhaviṣyasi. yathāyathā te sarvajñatāparipūriṃ gamiṣyati tathātathā
K03psp_2-3u:3111: te bhūyasyā mātrayā prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gamiṣyati. yathāyathā te prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3112: gamiṣyati tathātathā tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:3113: ato nirjātā hi kauśika prathamacittotpādikā bodhisattvā ye ca kecana daśasu dikṣv
K03psp_2-3u:3114: ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvās teṣām api sarveṣāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3115: prajñāpāramitānirjātā prathamacittotpādikā bhūmiḥ. ity aṣṭamī praśaṃsāmātrā
K03psp_2-3u:3116: punar aparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jāmbudvīpakās sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K03psp_2-3u:3117: vā avinivartanīyabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayed yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3118: teṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanām upadiśed yāvat saṃprakāśayed,
K03psp_2-3u:3119: evaṃ ca vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīṣva dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3120: yathāyathā tvaṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipatsyase tathātathā tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo 'vinivartānīyatve sthāsyasi,
K03psp_2-3u:3122: ayaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_2-3u:3123: yāvantaś cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvā yāvat sāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvā yāvad
K03psp_2-3u:3124: dvisāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvā yāvantaś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lohadhātau sarvasattvā
K03psp_2-3u:3125: yāvad daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gangānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvās
K03psp_2-3u:3126: tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhita vā avinivartanīyabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayed,
K03psp_2-3u:3127: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānām upadiśed yāvat saṃprakāśayet sārthāṃ savyañjanām,
K03psp_2-3u:3128: evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa dhāraya vācaya deśaya
K03psp_2-3u:3129: saṃprakāśaya paryavāpnuhi yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3132: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:3133: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanto (PSP_2-3:120)
K03psp_2-3u:3134: jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvās tān sarvān avinivartanīyatve sthāpayed anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K03psp_2-3u:3135: tebhyaś ca prajñāpāramitām upadiśet saṃprakāśayed vibhāvayed vicared uttānīkuryād
K03psp_2-3u:3136: vibhajet sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ tebhyo 'nyatarebhyo brūyād ahaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti,
K03psp_2-3u:3137: tasmin kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vistareṇa sārthaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3138: savyañjanām upadiśed deśayet saṃprakāśayed vibhāvayed vibhajed vistareṇottānikuryād
K03psp_2-3u:3139: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved yāvad daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
K03psp_2-3u:3140: lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā avinivartanīyatve sthāpayet
K03psp_2-3u:3141: tebhyaḥ kaścid eva imāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadiśet tebhyaś caikaḥ kaścid evaṃ brūyād
K03psp_2-3u:3142: ahaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti,
K03psp_2-3u:3143: yaś ca tasmai imāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadiśed deśayet saṃprakāśayed vibhāvayed vicared
K03psp_2-3u:3144: uttānīkuryād vibhajet sārthāṃ savyañjanām ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:3145: avaivartikebhyo hi bodhisattvebhyo 'tyarthaṃ dharma upadeṣṭavyo niyatā hi te saṃbodhiparāyaṇā
K03psp_2-3u:3146: na te bhūyo vinivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher amī bhūtkaṇṭhitāḥ saṃsārād mahākaruṇāsaṃpīḍitāś
K03psp_2-3u:3147: ca. iti navamī praśaṃsāmātrety uktvā praśaṃsā
K03psp_2-3u:3148: śakra āha: yathāyathā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva āsannībhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes
K03psp_2-3u:3155: sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu
K03psp_2-3u:3156: pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāsv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair anugrāhyaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3157: sa ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmāmiṣāsaṃgrahābhyām anugrahitavyaḥ. ayam eva dharmāmiṣānugrāhakas tato bahutaraṃ (PSP_2-3:121)
K03psp_2-3u:3159: evam etad bhavati yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pāramitāsv avavādyate 'nuśāsyate. sarvaśūnyatāsu
K03psp_2-3u:3161: abhijñāsu samādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv
K03psp_2-3u:3163: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3164: sādhu sādhu kauśika yas tvaṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cotsāhaṃ dadāsi,
K03psp_2-3u:3165: evam eva tvayā karaṇīyaṃ ya āryaśrāvakāḥ sattvān anugrahītukāmās te bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām anugrahaṃ kurvanti,
K03psp_2-3u:3166: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau anugṛhṇanti dharmāmiṣānugrahābhyāṃ cānupālayanti. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:3168: ataḥ pratyekabuddhayānam ato mahāyānam. yadi hi bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpāditam abhaviṣyat,
K03psp_2-3u:3169: tadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāśikṣiṣyat ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:3170: dharmeṣu nāryasatyeṣu nāṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu
K03psp_2-3u:3171: na ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu nādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ na bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3172: nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na sarvasamādhiṣu na
K03psp_2-3u:3173: sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu na tathāgatabaleṣu na vaiśāradyeṣu na pratisaṃvitsu nāṣṭādaśāsv
K03psp_2-3u:3174: āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv aśikṣiṣyatāśikṣamāṇe na teṣu dharmeṣu nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_2-3u:3175: abhisaṃbudhyeta anabhisaṃbudhyamāne tasmin nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prajñāyeta na
K03psp_2-3u:3176: pratyekabuddhabodhir na śrāvakabodhiḥ. yasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3177: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvasamādhhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu
K03psp_2-3u:3179: vimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu ṣaṭsv abhijñāsu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu
K03psp_2-3u:3180: vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yāvat sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate,
K03psp_2-3u:3181: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvalokadhātor nirayān ucchīnatti,
K03psp_2-3u:3182: tiryagyoniṃ pitṛviṣayam ucchīnatti. kṣatriyamahāśālakulaprādurbhāvo bhavati. brāhmaṇamahāśālakulaprādurbhāvo
K03psp_2-3u:3184: bhavati. trāyastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3186: mahābrahmāṇāṃ parīttābhānām apramāṇābhānām ābhāsvarāṇāṃ parīttaśubhānām apramāṇaśubhānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3187: śubhakṛtsnānām anabhrakānāṃ puṇyaprasavānāṃ bṛhatphalānāṃ suddhāvāsānām avṛhāṇām
K03psp_2-3u:3188: atapānāṃ sudṛśānāṃ sudarśanānām akaniṣṭhānām ākāśānatyāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ vijñānānantyāyatanopagānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3189: devānām akiñcanyāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ loke
K03psp_2-3u:3190: prādurbhāvo bhavati. dānapāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. śīlapāramitāyā loke
K03psp_2-3u:3191: prādurbhāvo bhavati. kṣāntipāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhāvati. vīryapāramitāyā loke
K03psp_2-3u:3192: prādurbhāvo bhavati. dhyānapāramitāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. prajñāpāramitāyā
K03psp_2-3u:3193: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
K03psp_2-3u:3194: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3195: dharmāṇāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām
K03psp_2-3u:3197: abhijñānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ bodhisattvabhūmīnāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3198: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3199: pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. sarvajñatāyā
K03psp_2-3u:3200: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati. śrāvakayānasya pratyekabuddhayānasya mahāyānasya ca loke
K03psp_2-3u:3203: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3204: yad bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
K03psp_2-3u:3205: sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ tac cānupalambhayogena.
K03psp_2-3u:3208: yac ca pratyekabuddhayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
K03psp_2-3u:3209: bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu tato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
K03psp_2-3u:3210: sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitam agram ākhyāyate
K03psp_2-3u:3211: śreṣṭham ākhyāyate jyeṣṭham ākhyāyate varam ākhyāyate pravaram ākhyāyate praṇītam
K03psp_2-3u:3213: uttamam ākhyāyate 'nuttamam ākhyāyate. asamam ākhyāyate asamasamam ākhyāyate. iti viśeṣapariṇāmaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3215: tathā hi yat sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ dānamayaṃ śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3216: puṇyakriyāvastu sarvaṃ tad ātmadamanāya ātmaśamanāya ātmaparinirvāṇāya yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
K03psp_2-3u:3218: aṣṭavimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaś catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣaḍ abhijñā ātmadamanāya
K03psp_2-3u:3219: ātmaśamanāya ātmaparinirvāṇāya bhavanti. bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya punar anumodanāsahagataṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3220: puṇyakriyāvastu sarvasattvānāṃ damanāya śamanāya parinirvāṇāya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K03psp_2-3u:3222: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3223: yat punar ayaṃ maitreya bodhisattva ye te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyāprameyāparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu,
K03psp_2-3u:3225: ekaikasyāṃ diśi yāvad asaṃkhyeyāprameyāparimāṇā buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtās teṣāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3226: yāvat prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvac cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3227: yāvad nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvat saddharmo nāntarhitaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3230: yac ca pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ dānamayaṃ śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmyaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu,
K03psp_2-3u:3233: yaś ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3238: yaś ca tair buddhair bhagavadbhir dharmo deśito,
K03psp_2-3u:3239: ye ca tatra dharmadeśanāyāḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptā anāgāmiphalaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3240: prāptā arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntās teṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni,
K03psp_2-3u:3241: yaiś ca tatra tathāgateṣv arhatsu vā parinirvṛteṣu vā kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni tat
K03psp_2-3u:3242: sarvam abhisaṃkṣipyāgrayā anumodanayā jyeṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā uttamayā
K03psp_2-3u:3245: anumodyānumodanāsahagataṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher āhārakaṃ bhavatv iti.
K03psp_2-3u:3246: yat punar ayaṃ māhāyānika evaṃ tathā cittaṃ pariṇāmayati yair ārambaṇair yair vastubhis tac cittam utpāditam,
K03psp_2-3u:3247: api nu tāni vastūni tāny ārambaṇāni tathā saṃvidyante tathopalabhyante yathā tair mahāyānikaiḥ kulaputrair nimittīkṛtāni?
K03psp_2-3u:3250: na tāny ārambaṇāni tathopalabhyante yathā tair mahāyānikaiḥ kulaputrair nimittīkṛtyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitām.
K03psp_2-3u:3252: yadi tāvad asaṃvidyamānair vastubhir asaṃvidyamānair ārambaṇais te buddhā bhagavanto
K03psp_2-3u:3253: nimittīkṛtās tadā ye te daśasu dikṣu sarvadiglokadhātuprasareṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante
K03psp_2-3u:3254: yāpayanti teṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_2-3u:3255: abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvat saddharmasthitiḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3259: yāni cāśaikṣāṇy anāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni tāni sarvāṇy abhisaṃkṣipyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K03psp_2-3u:3260: pariṇāmitāni ānimittayogena mā cāsya saṃjñāviparyāso 'bhūt. anitye nityam iti saṃjñāviparyāsaś
K03psp_2-3u:3263: aśānte śāntam iti saṃjñāviparyāsaś cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:3264: atha punaḥ kiṃ yathaiva vastu yathaivārambaṇaṃ tathā bodhis tathā cittaṃ tathā dānapāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:3265: śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā tathā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
K03psp_2-3u:3267: tathā āryasatyāni tathā adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā tathā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni
K03psp_2-3u:3268: tathā aṣṭavimokṣās tathā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayas tathā ṣaḍabhijñās tathā sarvasamādhayas
K03psp_2-3u:3269: tathā sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni tathā daśatathāgatabalāni tathā vaiśāradyāni tathā pratisaṃvidas
K03psp_2-3u:3271: yadi tāvad yathaiva vastu yathārambaṇaṃ tathā bodhis tathā cittaṃ tathā rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā
K03psp_2-3u:3272: vijñānaṃ tathā cakṣuḥ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥ tathā adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
K03psp_2-3u:3274: tathā āryasatyāni tathā aṣṭavimokṣās tathā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayahi tathā trīṇi
K03psp_2-3u:3275: vimokṣamukhāni tathā ṣaḍabhijñās tathā sarvasamādhayas tathā sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
K03psp_2-3u:3276: tathā daśa tathāgatabalāni tathā vaiśāradyāni tathā pratisaṃvidaḥ tathā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:3282: katamat tad anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu yad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati?
K03psp_2-3u:3284: saced bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritā abhaviṣyan,
K03psp_2-3u:3289: na te tāni vastūni na tāny ārambaṇāni na tān buddhān bhagavato na tāni kuśalamūlāni
K03psp_2-3u:3290: na tāny anumodanāsahagatāni puṇyakriyāvastūni nimittikṛtyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:3291: api tu khalu punas tathā pariṇāmayiṣyanti yathā na dvayayogena nādvayayogena na nimittayogena
K03psp_2-3u:3292: nānimittayogena nopalambhayogena nānupalambhayogena na saṃkleśayogena na vyavadānayogena
K03psp_2-3u:3294: sacet punar ete bodhisattvāḥ na ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitā abhaviṣyan,
K03psp_2-3u:3295: na buddhaparyupāsitā nāvaropitakuśalamūlā na kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā na svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitā abhaviṣyan,
K03psp_2-3u:3296: tāni vastūni tāny ārambaṇāni tāni kuśalamūlāni tān anumodanāsahagatāṃś cittotpādān nimittīkṛtyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayiṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:3297: na khalu punar iyaṃ bhadanta subhūte prajñāpāramitā evam upadiṣṭā navayānasaṃprasthitasya
K03psp_2-3u:3298: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyā. evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:3299: kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitā adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyataivam
K03psp_2-3u:3300: upadiṣṭā navayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyā.
K03psp_2-3u:3302: api tasya syāc chraddhāmātrakaṃ prasādamātrakaṃ premamātrakaṃ gauravamātrakaṃ tad
K03psp_2-3u:3303: apy antardhīyetāvinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyopadeṣṭavyā
K03psp_2-3u:3304: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhāṣitavyopadeṣṭavyā. sa evaṃ śrutvā nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati
K03psp_2-3u:3305: na saṃtrāsam āpadyate. sacet kalyāṇamitraparigṛhīto bhaviṣyati pūrvajinakṛtādhikāro
K03psp_2-3u:3307: evaṃ ca punar bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
K03psp_2-3u:3308: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyam. yena cittenānumodya pariṇāmayati tac
K03psp_2-3u:3310: tāni ca vastūni tāny ārambaṇāni tāni ca kuśalamūlāni kṣīṇāni niruddhāni vigatāni vipariṇatāni,
K03psp_2-3u:3317: na ca yaś cittasvabhāvaḥ. sa śakyaḥ pariṇāmayitum.
K03psp_2-3u:3318: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ jānīte abhāvaḥ prajñāpāramiteti,
K03psp_2-3u:3320: rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam ity abhāvaḥ. saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā abhāvo,
K03psp_2-3u:3326: bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastv anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:3327: yady evaṃ pariṇāmayati pariṇāmitaṃ bhavaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K03psp_2-3u:3328: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3329: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tāni
K03psp_2-3u:3330: kuśalamūlāny. anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitāni bhavanti. kathaṃ cānumodanāsahagataṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3333: sacet maitreya navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:3334: tāṃ ca prajñāpāramitām anupalambhayogena grahīṣyati na nimittayogena. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ (PSP_2-3:127)
K03psp_2-3u:3335: śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitām anupalambhayogena grahīṣyati na nimittayogena. adhyātmaśūnyatāyām
K03psp_2-3u:3336: adhimuktibahulo bhavīṣyati. bahirdhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyām
K03psp_2-3u:3339: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣv adhimuktibahulo bhaviṣyati. abhijñāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣv
K03psp_2-3u:3340: adhimuktibahulo bhaviṣyati. daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu
K03psp_2-3u:3341: pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv adhimuktibahulo bhaviṣyati. kalyāṇamitraparigṛhitaś
K03psp_2-3u:3342: ca bhaviṣyati. tāni cāsya kalyāṇamitrāṇimām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3343: kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanām upadekṣyanti. tathā
K03psp_2-3u:3344: copadekṣyanti yathā prajñāpāramitayā avirahīto bhaviṣyaty evaṃ sarvābhiḥ pāramitābhir
K03psp_2-3u:3345: avirahito bhaviṣyati. yāvat sarvaśūnyatābhiḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmair āryasatyair
K03psp_2-3u:3348: caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭābaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair
K03psp_2-3u:3349: avirahito bhaviṣyati. yāvad bodhisattvanyāmam avakrānto bhaviṣyati. mārakarmāṇi copadekṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:3350: tasya tāni mārakarmāṇi śrutvā na hānir na vṛddhir bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:3351: tathā hi teṣāṃ mārakarmaṇāṃ svabhāvo nopadṛśyate. buddhair bhagavadbhir avirahitaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3352: syād yāvan bodhisattvanyāmam avakrānteti. tatra ca kuśalamūlāny avaropayiṣyati. taiś
K03psp_2-3u:3353: ca kuśalamūlair bodhisattvakulaṃ grahīṣyati. tena ca bodhisattvakulena na jātu virahito
K03psp_2-3u:3354: bhaviṣyati yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:3355: punar aparaṃ navayānasaṃprasthitena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3359: ye te daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti
K03psp_2-3u:3360: dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3361: ye puṇyābhisaṃskārā yair vā tatra kuśalamulāny avaropitāni kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu (PSP_2-3:128)
K03psp_2-3u:3362: vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu vā cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu vā deveṣu,
K03psp_2-3u:3363: trāyastriṃśeṣu vā yāmeṣu vā tuṣiteṣu vā nirmāṇaratiṣu vā paranirmitavaśavartiṣu vā deveṣu,
K03psp_2-3u:3364: brahmapārṣadyeṣu vā brahmapurohiteṣu vā mahābrahmasu vā parīttābheṣu vā apramāṇābheṣu
K03psp_2-3u:3365: vā ābhāsvareṣu vā parīttaśubheṣu vā apramāṇaśubheṣu vā śubhakṛtsneṣu vā anabhrakeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:3366: vā puṇyaprasaveṣu vā bṛhatphaleṣu vā suddhāvāseṣu vā avṛheṣu vā atapeṣu vā sudṛśeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:3367: vā sudarśaneṣu vā akaniṣṭheṣu vā deveṣu kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni sarvāny abhisaṃkṣipya
K03psp_2-3u:3368: piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā agrayānumodanayā śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā uttamayā
K03psp_2-3u:3369: anuttamayā anumodanayā anumodetānumodya cānumodanāsahagataṃ kuśalamūlam anuttarāyai
K03psp_2-3u:3372: saced bhadanta subhūte navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3373: bhagavatāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sarvakuśalamūlāni samanvāhṛtyāgrayā anumodanayā anumodate
K03psp_2-3u:3374: anumodya ca yāvad anuttamayā anumodanayā anumodyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
K03psp_2-3u:3375: kathaṃ na bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñāviparyāso bhavati,
K03psp_2-3u:3379: sacet maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān buddhān bhagavataḥ saśrāvakasaṃghān samanvāharati,
K03psp_2-3u:3380: tatra na buddhasaṃjñī na śrāvakasaṃjñī bhavati,
K03psp_2-3u:3381: na kuśalamūlasaṃjñī bhavati. yenāpi cittena pariṇāmayati tatrāpi cittena cittasaṃjñī bhavaty,
K03psp_2-3u:3382: evaṃ pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso bhavati,
K03psp_2-3u:3385: saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān buddhān bhagavatas tāni ca kuśalamūlān samanvāhṛtya
K03psp_2-3u:3386: nimittīkaroti nimittīkṛtyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayaty evaṃ pariṇāmayataḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3388: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān buddhān bhagavatas tāni ca kuśalamūlāni yena
K03psp_2-3u:3389: ca cittena samanvāharati tāni tathaiva kṣīṇāni kṣīṇānīty evaṃ prajānāti. yac ca kṣīṇan
K03psp_2-3u:3390: na tac chakyaṃ pariṇamayitum. yenāpi cittena pariṇāmayati (PSP_2-3:129)
K03psp_2-3u:3391: tasyāpi cittasya saiva dharmatā. yatrāpi pariṇāmayati tasyāpi saiva dharmatā.
K03psp_2-3u:3392: saced evaṃ pariṇāmayati samena pariṇāmayati na viṣamena,
K03psp_2-3u:3395: saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvat
K03psp_2-3u:3396: prathamacittotpādam upādāya parinirvāṇaṃ yāvad ca saddharmāntardhānaṃ tac chrāvakāṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3397: pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca yāvad yaiś ca tatra pṛthagjanaiḥ kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni,
K03psp_2-3u:3398: yā ca dharmadeśanā śrutā śrutvā ca yaiś ca tatra devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragaiḥ kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni,
K03psp_2-3u:3399: kuśatriyamahāśālakulair vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakulair vā gṛhapatimahāśalakulair vā cāturmahārājakāyikair
K03psp_2-3u:3400: vā devair yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikair vā devaiḥ saddharmaḥ śrutaḥ kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni,
K03psp_2-3u:3401: cittaṃ cotpāditam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā
K03psp_2-3u:3402: tulayitvāgrayānumodanayānumodate jyeṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇitayā uttamayā
K03psp_2-3u:3403: anuttamayā asamayā asamasamayā anumodanayā anumodate anumodya tat sarvam anuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3405: sacet punar evaṃ saṃjānīte kṣīṇās te dharmā niruddhā vigatā vipariṇatā so 'pi dharmasvabhāvena
K03psp_2-3u:3406: śūnyo yatrāpi pariṇāmayati. saced evaṃ pariṇāmayati pariṇāmitaṃ bhavaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K03psp_2-3u:3407: sacet punar evaṃ saṃjānīte na ca dharmādharmān pariṇāmayanti. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:3409: saced evaṃ pariṇāmayati pariṇāmitaṃ bhavaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. evaṃ hi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3410: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carato na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:3411: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tāṃ pariṇāmanāṃ nābhiniviśate,
K03psp_2-3u:3412: tāni kuśalamūlāni tadbodhicittaṃ ca na samanupaśyati yatrābhiniveśeta,
K03psp_2-3u:3413: idaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttaraṃ pariṇāmanam. ity aviparyastalakṣaṇapariṇāmaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3414: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ puṇyakriyāvastv abhisaṃskāraṃ viviktaṃ saṃjānīte skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3415: prajñāpāramitayā viviktaṃ saṃjānīte. evaṃ dhyānapāramitayā vīryapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā śīlapāramitayā (PSP_2-3:130)
K03psp_2-3u:3416: dānapāramitayā viviktaṃ saṃjānīte. adhyātmaśūnyatayā viviktaṃ saṃjānīte yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā
K03psp_2-3u:3417: viviktaṃ saṃjānīte. saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣair dharmair viviktaṃ saṃjānīte. daśabhir
K03psp_2-3u:3418: balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair
K03psp_2-3u:3419: viviktaṃ saṃjānīte. evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇyakriyāvastv abhisaṃskāraḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3421: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'numodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu svabhāvena viviktaṃ saṃjānīte,
K03psp_2-3u:3436: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāsvabhāvena viviktā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvena viviktā,
K03psp_2-3u:3437: evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ catvāry āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattavo
K03psp_2-3u:3440: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā buddhadharmasvabhāvena viviktāḥ. evaṃ hi bodhisattvena
K03psp_2-3u:3441: mahāsattvena viviktāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_2-3u:3443: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yat kuśalamūlaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3444: tat sarvam anusmaratā evaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yādṛśa eva sa pariṇāmas tādṛśam eva tac
K03psp_2-3u:3446: saced evaṃ saṃjānīte pariṇāmitaṃ bhavaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_2-3u:3447: evaṃ pariṇāmayato na saṃjñāviparyāso bhavati na cittaviparyāso bhavati na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati.
K03psp_2-3u:3448: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prañāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittayogena (PSP_2-3:131)
K03psp_2-3u:3449: teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāni saṃjānīte,
K03psp_2-3u:3451: ye cātītā buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtā animittā aviṣayāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:3453: na pariṇāmayati tāni kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_2-3u:3454: evaṃ cāsya saṃjñāviparyāso bhavati cittaviparyāso bhavati dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati.
K03psp_2-3u:3455: sacet tān buddhān bhagavatas tāni kuśalamulāni tāṃś cābhisaṃskārāṃs tāṃś cittotpādān saṃjānīte na nimittīkaroti,
K03psp_2-3u:3456: pariṇāmitāni tāni kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye bhavati. evaṃ ca bodhisattvasya
K03psp_2-3u:3457: mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso bhavati na cittaviparyāso bhavati na dṛṣṭiviparyāso
K03psp_2-3u:3460: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nimittīkaroti pariṇāmayati ca?
K03psp_2-3u:3462: atra hi tāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām upāyakauśalāni śikṣitavyām. ata eva ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām upāyakauśalaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:3463: na ca prajñāpāramitām anāgamya śakyaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu pariṇāmayitum.
K03psp_2-3u:3465: mā haivāsya syād bhadanta subhūte vacanīyam. na te buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃvidyante. nāpi tāni kuśalamūlāni,
K03psp_2-3u:3467: nāpi te cittotpādā yāvan nānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
K03psp_2-3u:3469: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:3470: niruddhās te ātmabhāvā tāni ca kuśalamūlāni te cābhisaṃskārās te ca cittotpādāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:3471: atha ca punar nimittīkṛtya vikalpyante te buddhā bhagavantas tāni ca kuśalamūlāni
K03psp_2-3u:3472: te cābhisaṃskārās te ca cittotpādā nimittīkṛtya vikalpyante. na ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3473: samyaksaṃbuddhā evaṃ nimittayogena pariṇāmayato 'numodanām abhyanujānanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:3474: eṣa evāsya mahān upalambho yat parinirvṛtān buddhān bhagavato nimittīkaroti vikalpayati
K03psp_2-3u:3475: copalabhate tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayitukāmena na
K03psp_2-3u:3476: copalabhya nimittīkṛtya pariṇāmayitavyāni. na copalambhasaṃjñino na nimittasaṃjñinas,
K03psp_2-3u:3477: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pariṇāmatāṃ maharddhikām iti vadanti. tat hasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:3480: tadyathāpi nāma praṇītabhojanaṃ viṣasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ varṇena gandhena copetaṃ tad eva bālajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta,
K03psp_2-3u:3481: tasya tat paribhuñjānasya varṇato 'pi gandhato 'pi roceta,
K03psp_2-3u:3482: pariṇāme ca duṣkhavipākaṃ syāt. evam eva ihaikatyā durgṛhītena durupalakṣitena duḥsvādhyātena cārtham ajānanto 'budhyamānā evam upadekṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:3483: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prathamacittotpādam
K03psp_2-3u:3484: upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvac ca nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
K03psp_2-3u:3486: yāny etasmin antare prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caradbhiḥ kuśalamūlāny abhisaṃskṛtāni,
K03psp_2-3u:3487: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3488: caradbhiḥ kuśālamūlāny abhisaṃskṛtāni. yāni ca caturdhyānapratisaṃyuktāni caturapramāṇapratisaṃyuktāni
K03psp_2-3u:3495: yaiś ca kuśalamūlābhisaṃskārair buddhakṣetrāni pariśodhitāni sattvāś ca paripācitāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3496: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho
K03psp_2-3u:3502: tāni sarvāny abhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
K03psp_2-3u:3503: evaṃ hi pariṇāmo nimittayogenopalambhayogena ca pariṇāmito viṣatvāya kalpayate. tadyathāpi
K03psp_2-3u:3504: nāma tat saviṣaṃ bhojanaṃ nāsty upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ pariṇāmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:3505: saviṣo hy upalambhaḥ sanimittaḥ sahetukaḥ sapratyayo ya evaṃ pariṇāmayati tena tathāgato
K03psp_2-3u:3506: 'bhyākhyāto bhavati. na ca sa tathāgatasyoktavādī bhavati na ca dharmavādī. tatra
K03psp_2-3u:3507: bodhisattvayānikaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitrbhiś ca naivaṃ śikṣitavyam.
K03psp_2-3u:3510: kathaṃ punar atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kuśalamūlāny anumodya pariṇāmayitavyāni?
K03psp_2-3u:3511: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvad
K03psp_2-3u:3512: anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvac ca saddharmasthitiḥ saśrāvakasaṃghānām
K03psp_2-3u:3513: etasminn antare yāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā kuśalamūlāny abhisaṃskṛtāni yāvat sarvajñatā
K03psp_2-3u:3517: kathaṃ ca pariṇāmayatas tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmitāni bhavanty anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye?
K03psp_2-3u:3519: iha mahāyānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā tathāgatam anabhyākhyātukāmena,
K03psp_2-3u:3520: evaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā jānanti niruttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
K03psp_2-3u:3522: iha mahāyānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā tathāgatam anabhyākhyātukāmena,
K03psp_2-3u:3523: evaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā jānanti niruttareṇa buddhajñānena,
K03psp_2-3u:3524: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni yajjātikāni yatsvabhāvāni yallakṣaṇāni yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyante.
K03psp_2-3u:3525: tathāham apy anumode yathā te buddhā bhagavanto jānanti tathāham api pariṇāmayāmy
K03psp_2-3u:3526: anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye. evaṃ mahāyānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tāni
K03psp_2-3u:3528: evaṃ ca pariṇāmayitukāmena pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā jānanti niruttareṇa buddhajñānena,
K03psp_2-3u:3529: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni yajjātikāni yatsvabhāvāni yallakṣaṇāni yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyante.
K03psp_2-3u:3530: tathāham apy anumode yathā te buddhā bhagavanto jānanti tathāham api pariṇāmayāmy
K03psp_2-3u:3531: anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye. evaṃ mahāyānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tāni
K03psp_2-3u:3532: kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayitavyāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye. evaṃ ca pariṇāmayaṃs
K03psp_2-3u:3533: tathāgatān nābhyācaṣṭe uktavādī ca bhavati. tathāgatasya dharmavādī,
K03psp_2-3u:3534: caivaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmo nirviṣo bhavati.
K03psp_2-3u:3536: punar aparaṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (PSP_2-3:134)
K03psp_2-3u:3538: yathā rūpam aparyāpannaṃ kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātum ārūpyadhātum,
K03psp_2-3u:3539: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam aparyāpannaṃ kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātum ārūpyadhātum,
K03psp_2-3u:3540: evaṃ dhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ prajñāpāramitāpy aparyāpannā kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātum ārūpyadhātum,
K03psp_2-3u:3541: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitāpy aparyāpannā kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātum ārūpyadhātuṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:3542: yā cāparyāpannā na sātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
K03psp_2-3u:3543: evam adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā aparyāpannā kāmarūpārūpyadhātum,
K03psp_2-3u:3548: daśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā aparyāpannāḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātum,
K03psp_2-3u:3549: evaṃ tathatā avitathatā anayatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmaniyāmatā dharmasthititā bhūtakoṭir acintyadhātur aparyāpannaḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:3550: śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanāni sarvākārajñatā asaṃpramuṣitadharmatā sadā copekṣāvihāritā aparyāpannā kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:3551: yac cāparyāpannaṃ tan nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:3552: yathaiva tad aparyāpannam evaṃ pariṇāmo 'py aparyāpanno,
K03psp_2-3u:3553: yatrāpi dharme pariṇāmayati te 'pi dharmā aparyāpannā,
K03psp_2-3u:3558: teṣām api tāni kuśalamūlāny aparyāpannāni kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:3559: yac cāparyāpannaṃ tan nātītan nānāgatan na pratyutpannam.
K03psp_2-3u:3560: saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ saṃjānīte,
K03psp_2-3u:3562: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā yad vijñānaṃ tat kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātum aparyāpannam,
K03psp_2-3u:3564: saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ saṃjānīte, yad (PSP_2-3:135)
K03psp_2-3u:3566: tan nātītan tan nānāgatan na pratyutpannan tan na śakyaṃ nimittayogena copalambhayogena vā pariṇāmayitum. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:3567: na hi tasya svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate. yasya ca svabhāvo na saṃvidyate so 'bhāvo. na cābhāvo
K03psp_2-3u:3568: 'bhāvena śakyaḥ pariṇāmayitum. evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ dhātava āyatanāni
K03psp_2-3u:3570: evaṃ dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:3571: evaṃ adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
K03psp_2-3u:3572: evaṃ yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
K03psp_2-3u:3574: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvajñatā
K03psp_2-3u:3575: asaṃpramuṣitadharmatā sadopekṣāvihāritā na kāmadhātuparyāpannā na rūpadhātuparyāpannā
K03psp_2-3u:3577: yā cāparyāpannā na sātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā na sā śakyā nimittayogena na copalambhayogena vā pariṇāmayitum. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:3578: na hi tasyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate. yo na saṃvidyate so 'bhāvo. na cābhāvo 'bhāvena śakyaḥ pariṇāmayitum. evaṃ hi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmo nirviṣo bhavati.
K03psp_2-3u:3579: yaḥ punar mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nimittayogena copalambhayogena
K03psp_2-3u:3580: ca tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayati tāni mithyā pariṇāmayati na ca mithyā pariṇāmaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3581: samyakpariṇāmaṃ buddhā bhagavanto varṇayanti. yaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ pariṇāmaṃ na
K03psp_2-3u:3582: varṇayanti sa tena pariṇāmayati. na dānapāramitāyāṃ pariṇāmayati na śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3583: na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3584: pariṇāmayati. na ṣaḍpāramitāḥ paripūrayiṣyati. na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān
K03psp_2-3u:3586: na yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattir nāryasatyāni nāṣṭavimokṣān
K03psp_2-3u:3587: na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattir na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni nābhijñā na daśatathāgatabalāni
K03psp_2-3u:3588: na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayiṣyati. na
K03psp_2-3u:3589: samādhīn na dhāraṇīmukhāni paripūrayiṣyati. na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyati. na
K03psp_2-3u:3591: yo na buddhakṣetrāṃ pariśodhayiṣyati na sattvān paripācayiṣyati sa nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:3593: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:3595: anayā ca dharmatayā tat kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayitavyam ity,
K03psp_2-3u:3597: tathāham api tayā dharmatayā pariṇāmayāmy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
K03psp_2-3u:3599: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa:
K03psp_2-3u:3600: sādhu sādhu subhūte sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ subhūte yas tvam eva bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pariṇāmanāskandham upadiśasi,
K03psp_2-3u:3603: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ lābhino bhaveyuś,
K03psp_2-3u:3604: caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pañcānām abhijñānāṃ lābhino bhaveyuḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:3605: subhūte api nu te sattvās tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:3609: ataḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutataṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_2-3u:3611: evaṃ hi subhūte tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā kuśalamulapariṇāmo 'gra ākhyāyate
K03psp_2-3u:3612: jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate śreṣṭha ākhyāyate vara ākhyāyate pravara ākhyāyate praṇīta ākhyāyate
K03psp_2-3u:3613: uttama ākhyāyate anuttama ākhyāyate niruttama ākhyāyate iti mṛdumahāpuṇyodayapariṇāmaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3614: punar aparaṃ suhbute yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve srotaāpannā bhaveyuḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3616: tān sarvān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvajjīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayec cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārais. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:3617: subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:3621: ataḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_2-3u:3623: punar aparaṃ subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve pratyekabuddhā bhaveyus,
K03psp_2-3u:3624: tān sarvān pratyekabuddhān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvajjīvaṃ satkuryād
K03psp_2-3u:3625: gurukuryād mānayet pūjayec cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārais. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:3626: subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_2-3u:3630: ataḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_2-3u:3633: punar aparaṃ subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃpratiṣṭheran,
K03psp_2-3u:3634: tatra ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te sarva ekaikaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3636: satkuryur gurukuryur mānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuḥ sarvasukhopadhānair upatiṣṭheyur,
K03psp_2-3u:3637: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣūrdhvam adho diśi gaṅgānadīvālkopameṣu
K03psp_2-3u:3638: lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te sarva ekaikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃś
K03psp_2-3u:3640: pūjayeyuḥ sarvasukhopadhānair upatiṣṭheyuḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:3641: subhūte api nu te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:3643: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam aparimāṇaṃ bhagavann upamāpi na sukarā kartuṃ tasya puṇyakriyāvastunaḥ. saced bhagavaṃs tat puṇyakriyāvastu rūpi bhavet,
K03psp_2-3u:3645: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3646: sādhu sādhu subhūte sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ subhūte yas tvam evaṃ bravīṣi. ataḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_2-3u:3647: ya evaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ nirupalepapariṇāmanayānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayed.
K03psp_2-3u:3648: evaṃ subhūte tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā ayaṃ kuśalamulapariṇāmo 'gra ākhyāyate
K03psp_2-3u:3649: śreṣṭha ākhyāyate jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate vara ākhyāyate pravara ākhyāyate (PSP_2-3:138)
K03psp_2-3u:3650: praṇīta ākhyāyate uttama ākhyāyate anuttama ākhyāte niruttama ākhyāyate. tasya subhūte
K03psp_2-3u:3651: nirupalepapariṇāmanāpuṇyaskandhasyāsau pūrvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3652: nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm
K03psp_2-3u:3653: api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyam api kalām api
K03psp_2-3u:3654: gaṇanām apy upamām apy aupamyam apy upaniśām apy upaniṣadam api na kṣamate. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:3655: tathā hi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś copalambhasaṃjñino ye daśakuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatāś caturdhyānacaturapramāṇacaturārūpyasamāpattipañcābhijñāsamanvāgatās. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:3656: tathā hi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś copalambhasaṃjñinas tān sarvasattvān srotaāpannabhūtān
K03psp_2-3u:3657: yāvad arhattvabhūtān sarvasattvān pratyekabuddhabhūtān satkuryur gurukuryur mānayeyuḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3659: tathā hi sa tān aupalambhikān bodhisattvān satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet. ity adhimātrapuṇyodayapariṇāmaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3660: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaś cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ ca devānāṃ viṃśatidevaputrasahasrāṇi prāñjalībhūtāni bhagavantaṃ namasyanti sma. evaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3661: mahāpariṇāmo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yo 'yam upāyakauśalenānupalambhayogena
K03psp_2-3u:3662: nirupalepayogenānimittayogena tāni kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
K03psp_2-3u:3663: tathā pariṇāmayati yathā na dvayam upaiti nādvayam.
K03psp_2-3u:3664: atha khalu śakro devānām indras trāyastriṃśair devaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhir
K03psp_2-3u:3665: divyatūryatāḍāvacaravādyaiś ca bhagavantaṃ pūjayāmāsa. evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣata:
K03psp_2-3u:3666: mahāpariṇāmo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yo 'yam upāyakauśalenānupalambhayogena
K03psp_2-3u:3667: nirupalepayogenānimittayogena tāni kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
K03psp_2-3u:3668: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathā na dvayam upaiti nādvayam.
K03psp_2-3u:3669: atha khalu suyāmo devaputraḥ saṃtuṣito nirmāṇaratiḥ paranirmitavaśavartī ca devaputro 'nekair devaputraśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavantam etad
K03psp_2-3u:3670: mahāpariṇāmo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yo 'yam upāyakauśalenānupalambhayogena
K03psp_2-3u:3671: nirupalepayogenānimittayogena tāni kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
K03psp_2-3u:3674: atha khalu brahmapārṣadyānāṃ devānām anekāni devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāny upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya śabdam akārṣuḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3676: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yathāpi nāma bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītā
K03psp_2-3u:3677: upāyakauśalyena ca teṣāṃ paurvakāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3678: ca aupalambhikānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny abhibhavanti. evaṃ brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3679: parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3680: puṇyaprasavā vṛhatphalāḥ śuddhāvāsāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā avṛhā atapā akaniṣṭhāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3681: anekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sardhāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmann upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya śabdam akārṣuḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3683: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yathāpi nāma bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītā,
K03psp_2-3u:3684: upāyakauśalena ca teṣāṃ paurvakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca aupalambhikānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny abhibhavanti.
K03psp_2-3u:3685: atha khalu bhagavāṃś cāturmahārājakāyikān devaputrān yāvad akaniṣṭhān devaputrān āmantrayāmāsa:
K03psp_2-3u:3686: yadi devaputrā ye trisāharamahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā bhaveyus,
K03psp_2-3u:3687: te sarve 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3688: sapratyekabuddhānāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3689: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvac ca nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3690: yāvat saddharmasthitir etasminn antare teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3691: teṣāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ tato 'nyeṣāṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ yat kuśalamūlaṃ dānapāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:3694: 'nye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmās tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipyānumodyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K03psp_2-3u:3695: pariṇāmayeyur upalambhayogena. yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K03psp_2-3u:3696: saṃprasthito bhavet so 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3698: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
K03psp_2-3u:3699: parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvat saddharmasthitir etasminn antare teṣāṃ sarveṣām anyeṣāṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3700: yat kuśalamūlaṃ dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramita dhyānapāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:3701: prajñāpāramitā yāvad aparimāṇā buddhadharmās tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā
K03psp_2-3u:3704: evaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ pūrvakānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇām antikād
K03psp_2-3u:3705: bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. idaṃ ca kuśalamūlaṃ tasya pūrvakasya kuśalamūlasya śatatamīm
K03psp_2-3u:3706: api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamate. idaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānupalambhayogena
K03psp_2-3u:3707: pariṇāmitam agram ākhyāyate yāvad niruttaram ākhyāyate.
K03psp_2-3u:3709: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3710: yo bhagavaṃs tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā sa ca kuśalamūlānumodanāpariṇāmanāpuṇyaskandha
K03psp_2-3u:3711: ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛto 'grayānumodanayā numoditaḥ. kathaṃ bhagavann agrānumodanā bhavati
K03psp_2-3u:3714: yadā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ arhatāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3715: samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sapratyekabuddhānām anyeṣāṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3716: kuśalān dharmān na gṛhṇāti na muñcati na manyate nāvamanyate nopalabhate. evaṃ cāsya
K03psp_2-3u:3717: bhavati naivātra kaścid dharma utpadyate na nirudhyate na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate,
K03psp_2-3u:3718: na ca teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hānir na vṛddhir nāgamo na nirgamo na rāśir nābhāvaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3719: etena paryāyeṇa yac caiṣām atītānāgatapratyutpannāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā
K03psp_2-3u:3720: dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā tathāham anumode anumodyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K03psp_2-3u:3721: pariṇāmayāmīti pariṇāmayet. evam anumodamānasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyagrānumodanā
K03psp_2-3u:3722: bhavati yāvan niruttarānumodanā bhavati. asyāḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte anumodanāyā anyā
K03psp_2-3u:3723: yā anumodanās tāḥ. sarvā śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopayānti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamante.
K03psp_2-3u:3725: punar aparaṃ subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā (PSP_2-3:141)
K03psp_2-3u:3726: vā teṣāṃ atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3727: sapratyekabuddhānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvac cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_2-3u:3728: abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvat saddharmasthitir
K03psp_2-3u:3729: etasminn antare yat kuśalamūlaṃ dānapāramitāpratisaṃyuktam evaṃ śilaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3731: tato 'nyeṣām api sarvasattvānāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni dānamayāni śilamayāni bhāvanāmayāni tāni sarvāṇy anumoditukāmena evam anumoditavyam. yathādhimuktis tathā dānam,
K03psp_2-3u:3732: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ yathādhimuktis tathā prajñā,
K03psp_2-3u:3733: yathādhimuktis tathā rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ yathādhimuktis tathā vijñānaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:3734: yathādhimuktis tathā dhātava āyatanāni yathādhimuktis tathā pratītyasamutpādaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3746: yathādhimuktis tathā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām abhisaṃbodhiḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3747: yathādhimuktis tathā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:3748: yathādhimuktis tathā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3750: yathādhimuktis tathā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmatā,
K03psp_2-3u:3752: yathādhimuktis tathā sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ muktānām aśāntānām akliṣṭānām aviśuddhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
K03psp_2-3u:3753: ajātānām asaṃjātānām anutpannānām aniruddhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
K03psp_2-3u:3755: sā subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām agrā anumodanā yāvan niruttarā anumodanā.
K03psp_2-3u:3756: anayā ca subhūte anumodanayā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ (PSP_2-3:142)
K03psp_2-3u:3758: punar aparaṃ subhūte daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye te buddhā bhagavantaḥ. saśrāvakasaṃghās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante
K03psp_2-3u:3759: tān kaścid eva mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ. kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatan arhataḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3760: samyaksaṃbuddhān saśrāvakasaṃghān yāvajjīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryād gurukuryād
K03psp_2-3u:3762: ca teṣāṃ buddhāṃ bhagavatāṃ rātriṃdivam autsukyam āpadyeta satkaraṇagurukaraṇamānanapūjanaiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3764: śīle ca tiṣṭhed upalambhayogena kṣāntiṃ bhāvayed vīryam ārabheta dhyānaṃ samāpadyeta prajñāṃ ca bhāvayed upalambhayogena,
K03psp_2-3u:3765: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhita vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodḥau saṃprasthito dānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3766: caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3767: caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupalambhayogena tāni kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
K03psp_2-3u:3768: pariṇāmayati. asya puṇyābhisaṃskārasya kuśalamūlābhisaṃskārasya cāsau paurvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3769: śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamate. ayaṃ sa pariṇāmaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3770: agra ākhyāyate yāvad niruttara ākhyāyate. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K03psp_2-3u:3771: dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā śīlapāramitāyāṃ caratā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caratā vīryapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3772: caratā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā upāyakauśalenānupalambhayogena
K03psp_2-3u:3775: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3783: sarveṣāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṣemakarī bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_2-3u:3791: anutpannā niruddhā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya,
K03psp_2-3u:3793: anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ nāthakarī bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmaratnadātrītām upādāya,
K03psp_2-3u:3796: sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvasaṃdarśayitrī bhagavan prajñāpāramitā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya. iti svabhayaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:3799: yathā śāriputra śāstari tathā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:3800: yathā śāstā namaskartavyas tathā prajñāpāramitā namaskatavyā. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:3803: śāstaiva prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitaiva śāstā. ato hi śariputra prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3804: sarve tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prabhāvyante bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3805: pratyekabuddhāś cārhantaś cānāgāminaś ca sakṛdāgāminaś ca srotaāpannāś ca prabhāvyante.
K03psp_2-3u:3806: ataś ca daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ prabhāvyante. catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni
K03psp_2-3u:3808: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:3811: vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ prabhāvyante yāvat
K03psp_2-3u:3813: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūt:
K03psp_2-3u:3814: kuta iyam āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya pṛcchā jātā kiṃnidānā vā?
K03psp_2-3u:3815: atha khalv āyuṣmān śariputraḥ sakrasya devānām indrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3817: kuta iyam āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya pṛcchā jātā kiṃnidānā veti. prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3818: kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvā upāyakauśalena ca teṣām atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3819: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_2-3u:3820: abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvat saddharmasthitir etasminn antare yat kiṃcit kuśalaṃ tat sarvākārajñatāyai
K03psp_2-3u:3821: pariṇāmayantīty etannidānā me pṛcchā jātā. iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvānāṃ (PSP_2-3:144)
K03psp_2-3u:3822: mahāsattvānāṃ dānapāramitām abhibhavati. evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānapāramitām
K03psp_2-3u:3823: abhibhavati. tadyathāpi nāma kauśika jātyandhānāṃ śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3824: vā pariṇāyakam abhavyaṃ mārgāvatārāya kuta eva nagarapraveśāya?
K03psp_2-3u:3825: evam eva kauśika imā pañcapāramitā jātyandhabhūtā bhavanti prajñāpāramitāṃ vinā pariṇāyakā abhavyā mārgāvatārāya kuta eva sarvākārajñatāmahānagaram
K03psp_2-3u:3826: yadā punaḥ kauśika pañcapāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā bhavanti tadā pañcapāramitāḥ sacakṣuskā bhavanti pāramitānāmadheyaṃ ca pratilabhante.
K03psp_2-3u:3827: śakra āha: yad bhadanta śāriputra evam āha,
K03psp_2-3u:3828: prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītāḥ pañcapāramitā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. na ca bhadanta
K03psp_2-3u:3829: śariputra dānapāramitāparigṛhītāḥ pañcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. evaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3832: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. na dānapāramitāparigṛhītāḥ kauśika pañcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3833: labhante. evaṃ na śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitāparigṛhītāḥ kauśika pañcapāramitāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3834: pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tasmāt tarhi kauśika prajñāpāramitaiva pañcānāṃ pāramitānām
K03psp_2-3u:3835: agrā ākhyāyate śreṣṭhā ākhyāyate jyeṣṭhā ākhyāyate varā ākhyāyate pravarā ākhyāyate
K03psp_2-3u:3836: uttamā ākhyāyate anuttamā ākhyāyate asamā ākhyāyate asamasamā ākhyāyate.
K03psp_2-3u:3838: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3842: saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyānabhinirhārāyā prajñāpāramiṭābhinirhartvyā. evaṃ dhātūnām āyatanānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3858: evam abhinirhṛtā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā katamaṃ dharmam arpayati?
K03psp_2-3u:3860: evam abhinirhṛtā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati,
K03psp_2-3u:3861: yato na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati tasmāt prajñāpāramiteti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
K03psp_2-3u:3865: na kuśalaṃ dharmam arpayati nākuśalaṃ dharmam arpayati. evaṃ na sāvadyaṃ nānavadyaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3866: na sāsravaṃ nānāsravaṃ na saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na niḥkleśaṃ na laukikaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3867: na lokottaraṃ na saṃkliṣṭaṃ na vyavadānaṃ na saṃsāraṃ na nirvāṇam arpayati. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:3868: na hi prajñāpāramitā kasyacid dharmasyopalambhayogena pratyupasthitā tena kāraṇena na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati.
K03psp_2-3u:3869: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3870: kim iyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvākārajñatām api nārpayati?
K03psp_2-3u:3873: kim iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvākārajñatām api nārpayatīti. evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
K03psp_2-3u:3874: prajñāpāramitā kauśika na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati nopalabhate sarvākārajñatām api nārpayati nopalabhate.
K03psp_2-3u:3876: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvākārajñatām api nārpayati nopalabhate?
K03psp_2-3u:3878: na hi kauśika prajñāpramitā yathā nāma yathā nimittaṃ yathābhisaṃskāras tathārpayati.
K03psp_2-3u:3882: yathā nopaiti nopādadāti nadhitiṣṭhati na prajahāti nābhiniviśate (PSP_2-3:146)
K03psp_2-3u:3883: tathārpayati yathā na kaṃcid dharmam arpayati muñcati na pratigṛhṇāti. evaṃ hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmān nārpayati na muñcati na pratigṛhṇāti.
K03psp_2-3u:3884: śakra āha: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇām anutpādāya anirodhāya anabhisaṃskārāya anupalabdhaye avināśāya pratyupasthitā.
K03psp_2-3u:3885: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3886: saced bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ saṃjñāsyati,
K03psp_2-3u:3888: riñciṣyati bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkariṣyati bhagavan prajñāpāramitām.
K03psp_2-3u:3890: asti subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo riñcan prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3891: dūrīkuryān prajñāpāramitām. saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ saṃjñāsyati,
K03psp_2-3u:3892: rikteyaṃ prajñāpāramiteyaṃ tucchā asārā vaśikeyaṃ prajñāpāramiteti,
K03psp_2-3u:3893: riñciṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkariṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3894: prajñāpāramitām. ayaṃ subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa riñciṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3897: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavan pratyarpitayā katame dharmāḥ pratyarpitā bhavanti?
K03psp_2-3u:3899: prajñāpāramitayā subhūte pratyarpitayā na rūpaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_2-3u:3900: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ na vijñānaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. na cakṣuḥ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_2-3u:3901: na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvā na kāyo na manaḥ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. na rūpaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_2-3u:3902: na śabdo na gandho na raso na spraṣṭavyaṃ na dharmāḥ pratyarpitā bhavanti. na dānapāramitā pratyarpitā bhavati,
K03psp_2-3u:3903: na śīlapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na vīryapāramitā na dhyānapāramitā na prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:3904: pratyarpitā bhavati. nādhyātmaśūnyatā pratyarpitā bhavati. na bahirdhāśūnyatā pratyarpitā
K03psp_2-3u:3905: bhavati. nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā pratyarpitā bhavati yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
K03psp_2-3u:3906: pratyarpitā bhavati. na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ pratyarpitā bhavanti. na
K03psp_2-3u:3907: daśabalavaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ pratyarpitā bhavanti.
K03psp_2-3u:3908: na srotaāpattiphalṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati.
K03psp_2-3u:3909: nānāgāmiphalaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. nārhattvaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3910: pratyarpitaṃ bhavati. nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ pratyarpitā bhavati.
K03psp_2-3u:3912: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitayā pratyarpitayā na rūpaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati yāvad na sarvākārajñatā pratyarpitā bhavati?
K03psp_2-3u:3914: rūpasya subhūte 'nupalabdhyā prajñāpāramitā pratyarpitā bhavati yāvat sarvākārajñatānupalabdhyā
K03psp_2-3u:3915: prajñāpāramitā pratyarpitā bhavati. evaṃ khalu subhūte prajñāpāramitayā pratyarpitayā
K03psp_2-3u:3916: na rūpaṃ pratyarpitaṃ bhavati yāvad na sarvākārajñatā pratyarpita bhavati.
K03psp_2-3u:3922: subhūte katamena paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_2-3u:3925: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. evaṃ dhātūn āyatanāni
K03psp_2-3u:3926: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na dānapāramitāṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti.
K03psp_2-3u:3927: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ na prajñāpāramitāṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. nādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3928: mahatkaroti nālpīkatoti yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na
K03psp_2-3u:3929: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. nāryasatyāni nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3930: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni nābhijñā mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na tathāgatabalāni
K03psp_2-3u:3931: na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti.
K03psp_2-3u:3932: na bodhiṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na buddhadharmaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. yāvan
K03psp_2-3u:3933: na buddhaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na rūpaṃ vipulīkaroti na parittīkaroti. na rūpaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3934: balavatkaroti na durbalīkaroti. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3935: mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā. sacet punar navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo
K03psp_2-3u:3936: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām āgamya dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3937: śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitām āgamya evaṃ jñāsyati na prajñāpāramitā rūpaṃ mahatkaroti
K03psp_2-3u:3938: nālpīkaroti yāvan na buddhadharmaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti. na rūpaṃ balavatkaroti
K03psp_2-3u:3939: na durbalīkaroti. evaṃ saṃjānan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:3940: naiṣa bhagavan niṣyandaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. yad rūpaṃ mahad alpaṃ vā kuryād yāvad buddhadharmaṃ mahad alpaṃ vā kuryān naiṣa prajñāpāramitāyā niṣyandaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:3941: na hy upalambhasaṃjñino bodhisattvās tathā sattvājātitayā prajñāpāramitā draṣṭavyā. rūpājātitaḥ prajñāpāramitājātitā (PSP_2-3:148)
K03psp_2-3u:3942: draṣṭavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānājātitaḥ prajñāpāramitājātitā draṣṭavyā yāvad
K03psp_2-3u:3945: vijñānāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatā draṣṭayyā yāvad buddhāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatā
K03psp_2-3u:3946: draṣṭavyā. rūpābhāvatayā prajñāpāramitābhāvatā veditavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānābhāvatayā
K03psp_2-3u:3947: prajñāpāramitābhāvatā veditavyā yāvad buddhābhāvatayā prajñāpāramitābhāvatā veditavyā.
K03psp_2-3u:3948: sattvaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā veditavyā. rūpaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā
K03psp_2-3u:3949: veditavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā veditavyā
K03psp_2-3u:3950: yāvad buddhaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyata veditavyā. evaṃ sattvānimittatayā sattvāpraṇihitatayā
K03psp_2-3u:3961: veditavyā yāvad buddhabalāsamanvāgatatayā prajñāpāramitā balāsamanvāgatatā vedjtavyā.
K03psp_2-3u:3962: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_2-3u:3964: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3965: yo 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām adhimokṣyate,
K03psp_2-3u:3967: kiyaccirasaṃprasthitaḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā abhūd anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K03psp_2-3u:3975: kiyacciraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carito ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām arthataś ca nayataś cādhimokṣyate?
K03psp_2-3u:3976: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3977: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśasu dikṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paryupāsyehāgata ihopapanno bhaviṣyati. iti
K03psp_2-3u:3978: yaḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃkhyeyāny aprameyāṇi kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi samudāgato 'bhūd anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_2-3u:3979: sa prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3980: carito vīryapāramitāyāṃ carito dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3981: sann ihāgato bhaviṣyati. sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā
K03psp_2-3u:3982: dṛṣṭayā śrutayā vā śāstā mayā dṛṣṭa iti cittam utpādayiṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:3983: śāstā mayā śruta iti cittam utpādayiṣyati. sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ prajñāpāramitām arthataś ca nayataś cādhigamiṣyaty
K03psp_2-3u:3984: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3985: śakyā punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā draṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā?
K03psp_2-3u:3987: no hīdaṃ subhūte na hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śrotāro draṣṭāro na prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3988: te paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādaya. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:3989: kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ te na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām
K03psp_2-3u:3990: upādāya. adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām
K03psp_2-3u:3991: upādāya. smṛtyupasthānāni na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān
K03psp_2-3u:3992: na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya. evam āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:3994: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān na paśyanti
K03psp_2-3u:3995: na śṛṇvanti. buddhabodhiṃ na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya.
K03psp_2-3u:3997: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:3998: kiyacciraṃ caritaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpatsyate?
K03psp_2-3u:4001: syāt subhūte paryāyo yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya gambhīrāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4002: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4003: śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. tac copāyakauśalena na ca kaṃcid
K03psp_2-3u:4004: dharmaṃ pratikṣipati yathā nopacayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4005: na jātu ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir virahito bhavati na buddhair bhagavadbhir,
K03psp_2-3u:4006: yaiś ca pūjāviśeṣair ākāṅkṣet tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4007: pūjayituṃ tasya te pūjāviśeṣāḥ sahacittotpādenaiva saṃṛdhyante. buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4008: saṃkrāmati. na jātu mātuḥ kukṣāv upapadyate. na ca jātu virahito bhavati abhijñābhir.
K03psp_2-3u:4009: na ca kenacit kleśena sārdhaṃ saṃvasati. na śrāvakacittena na pratyekabuddhacittena
K03psp_2-3u:4010: sārdhaṃ saṃvasati. buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati sattvāṃś ca paripācayan
K03psp_2-3u:4011: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayan. ayaṃ subhūte bobhisattvo mahāsattvo yo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4012: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yogam āpatsyate. ity upāyakauśalam
K03psp_2-3u:4013: santi punaḥ subhūte mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca yair bahūni buddhaśatāni
K03psp_2-3u:4014: bahūni buddhasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
K03psp_2-3u:4015: dṛṣṭāni bhavanti. tebhyaś cāntike śikṣamāṇair dānāni dattāni bhavanti,
K03psp_2-3u:4016: śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ kṣāntir bhāvitā vīryam ārabdhaṃ dhyānam āsevitaṃ prajñā bhāvitā bhavati
K03psp_2-3u:4017: sā copalambhayogena. te 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ parṣaḍbhyo
K03psp_2-3u:4018: 'pakramiṣyanti. te punaḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāgauravatayāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4019: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād apakramiṣyanti. ihaiva te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
K03psp_2-3u:4020: ca mahāyānikāḥ saṃnipatitā ye gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakramiṣyanti. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:4021: tathā hi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca pūrvānte 'pi gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakrāntā,
K03psp_2-3u:4022: etarhy api gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakrāmānti. na kāyena na
K03psp_2-3u:4023: cittena samagrīn dāsyanti duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmopaceṣyanti. te tena dauṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena
K03psp_2-3u:4024: karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ pratyākhyāsyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:4025: taiḥ pratyākhyāya atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatāpratyākhyātā
K03psp_2-3u:4026: bhavati. te tena sarvajñatāpratyākhyānena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena
K03psp_2-3u:4027: bahūni varṣāṇi bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi (PSP_2-3:151)
K03psp_2-3u:4028: bahūni varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi mahāniraye prakṣepsyante. teṣāṃ mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4029: saṃkrāmatāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanī vā apsaṃvartanī vā vāyusaṃvartanī vā prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:4030: te tāsu saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhātāsv anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayās teṣu prakṣepsyante.
K03psp_2-3u:4032: mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ saṃkramiṣyanti. teṣāṃ mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4033: punar eva saṃvartanīyaḥ prādurbhaviṣyanti. tāsu saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsu pūrvasyāṃ diśi prakṣepsyante,
K03psp_2-3u:4034: dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣūrdhvam adho diśi yo mahānirayās teṣu prakṣepsyante.
K03psp_2-3u:4035: tebhyo 'pi punaḥ saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsv anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayās teṣu
K03psp_2-3u:4036: prakṣepsyante. teṣu punar api tebhyo lokadhātubhyaḥ saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsu tebhyo
K03psp_2-3u:4037: mahānirayebhaś cyutās tena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇākṣīṇena punar eva ihopapatsyante.
K03psp_2-3u:4038: te punar eva mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ saṃkramiṣyanti. te teṣu mahānirayeṣūpapannā
K03psp_2-3u:4039: bahūni tīvrāṇi mahākaṭukāni mahānirayaduḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti. tāvad eva te
K03psp_2-3u:4040: tāni nirayaduḥkhāṃ pratyanubhaviṣyanti yāvat punar eva saṃvartanīyaḥ prādurbhaviṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:4041: saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsv itaś cyutā anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu punar eva mahānirayeṣūpapatsyante.
K03psp_2-3u:4042: evaṃ samantāt punar api daśasu dikṣu tiryagyoniṣūpapatsyante. punar eva daśasu dikṣu
K03psp_2-3u:4043: yamalokeṣūpapannā mahātīvrāṃ mahākaṭukāṃ mahāduṣkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayantas tat karma
K03psp_2-3u:4044: kṣepayiṣyanti. te bahuduḥkhavedanīyaṃ karma kṣepayitvā kadācit karhicit mānuṣyakam
K03psp_2-3u:4045: ātmabhāvaṃ pratilapsyante. te yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra jātyandhā bhaviṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:4046: jātyandhakuleṣūpapatsyante. caṇḍālakuleṣu vā puṣkasakuleṣu vā śākunikuleṣu vā sukarikuleṣu
K03psp_2-3u:4047: vā aurabhikakuleṣu vā nīceṣu vā kutsiteṣu vā kuleṣu vā nīcavṛttisu vā upapatsyante.
K03psp_2-3u:4048: te teṣūpapannā andhā vā bhaviṣyanti kāṇā vā ajihvā vā ahastā vā apādā vā akarṇakā
K03psp_2-3u:4049: vā anāsikā vā yatra buddhaśabdaṃ na śroṣyanti na dharmaśabdaṃ na saṃghaśabdaṃ na
K03psp_2-3u:4050: bodhisattvaśabdaṃ na pratyekabuddhaśabdaṃ śroṣyanti nārhacchabdaṃ śroṣyanti te tenaiva
K03psp_2-3u:4052: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:4053: pañca bhagavann ānantaryāṇy asya dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyasya karmaṇaḥ kṛtasyopacitasya prativarṇikā api na bhavanti?
K03psp_2-3u:4055: prativarṇiketi śāriputra na vaktavyāsya dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyakarmaṇaḥ kṛtasyopacitasya. ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4056: nātra śikṣitavyaṃ naiṣa dharmo naiṣa vinayo naitac (PSP_2-3:152)
K03psp_2-3u:4057: chāstuḥ śāsanaṃ naitat tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair bhāṣitam iti bhāṣyante,
K03psp_2-3u:4059: anyāṃś ca sattvān vivecayiṣyanti. te svasaṃtānāny upahatya parasaṃtānāny upahantavyāni
K03psp_2-3u:4060: maṃsyante. te svasaṃtānaṃ saviṣaṃ kṛtvā parasaṃtānāny api saviṣāṇi kariṣyanti. te
K03psp_2-3u:4061: svayaṃ naṣṭāḥ. parān api nāśayiṣyanti. svayaṃ ca gambhīrāṃ prajñāramitām ajānanto
K03psp_2-3u:4063: parāṃś ca tathaiva grāhayiṣyanti. nāhaṃ śāriputra teṣāṃ pudgalānāṃ śravaṇam apy abhyanujānāmi kaḥ punar vādo darśanaṃ kuta eva sthānaṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4065: dharmadūṣakā hi te śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ kaśaṃbakajātīyāḥ kṛṣṇā
K03psp_2-3u:4066: hi jātayaḥ śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ. teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathārūpāṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4067: pudgalānāṃ ye śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyaṃ maṃsyante te 'nayena vyasanam āpatsyante. yaś
K03psp_2-3u:4068: cemāṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayiṣyati dharmadūṣakaḥ sa pudgalo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:4070: na khalu punar bhagavaṃs tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasya bhagavatā tatropapannasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam ākhyātam.
K03psp_2-3u:4072: tiṣṭhatu śāriputra tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasya tatropapannasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4073: mā tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ śrutvā uṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ mukhād āgacchet,
K03psp_2-3u:4075: duḥkhaṃ śrutvā śokaśalpasamarpito vā bhavet. ucchoṣyed vā mlāyed vā nīlo vā harito vā lūno vā yāvad idaṃ tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasya dṛśasyātmabhāvapratilābhasya pramāṇam iti,
K03psp_2-3u:4076: yasyāyam īdṛśo doṣaḥ saṃvidyata iti. na bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyāvakāśaṃ karotīdaṃ tasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti.
K03psp_2-3u:4078: ākhyātu bhagavān paścimāyā janatāyā ālokāḥ kṛto bhaviṣyaty anena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena dharmadūṣakāḥ pudgalā īdṛśam ātmabhāvaṃ parigrahīṣyantīti.
K03psp_2-3u:4080: evam eva śāriputra paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyaty anenāsau dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena
K03psp_2-3u:4081: karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena mahānirayeṣu duḥkham anubhaviṣyati. yā etasyaiva duḥkhasyāpramāṇatā
K03psp_2-3u:4083: eṣa eva śuklāṃśikasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā tebhyo dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyebhyaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:4084: karmabhyo nirvṛttir bhaviṣyati. te jivitahetor api dharmaṃ na pratikṣepsyanti. mā
K03psp_2-3u:4085: bhūd asmākam īdṛśair duḥkhaiḥ samavadhānam iti.
K03psp_2-3u:4086: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:4088: bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā bhavitavyaṃ mā bhūd īdṛśānāṃ duḥkhānām anubhavanam
K03psp_2-3u:4089: iti tathāgataṃ vā na drakṣyāma iti dharmaṃ vā na śroṣyāma iti saṃghaṃ vā na drakṣyāma
K03psp_2-3u:4090: ity apagatabuddhotpādeṣu vā buddhakṣetreṣūpapatsyāmaha iti manuṣyadaridreṣu vā agrāhyavacanā
K03psp_2-3u:4091: vā bhaviṣyāma ity. anena bhagavan dharmapratikṣepavākkarmaṇā kṛtenopacitena vyasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4095: karma kṛtaṃ bhavaty upacitam ihaiva te subhūte mohapuruṣāḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye
K03psp_2-3u:4096: pravrajitā bhaviṣyanti. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayitavyāṃ maṃsyante pratibādhitavyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4097: maṃsyante. prajñāpāramitayā subhūte dūṣitayā pratibādhitayā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4099: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhyā dūṣitayā pratibādhitayātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4100: bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā dūṣitā bhavati pratibādhitā. sarvajñatayā dūṣitayā pratibādhitayā
K03psp_2-3u:4101: dharmaḥ. pratibādhito bhavati. dharmeṇa pratibādhitena saṃghaḥ. pratibādhito bhavati.
K03psp_2-3u:4102: saṃghena pratibādhitena laukikī samyagdṛṣṭir lokottarā ca samyakdṛṣṭiḥ pratibādhitā
K03psp_2-3u:4103: bhavati. evaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:4105: ṣaḍabhijñāḥ pratibādhitā bhavanti. adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā sarvasamādhayaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4107: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ pratibādhitā
K03psp_2-3u:4108: bhavanti. yāvat sarvajñatā pratibādhitā bhavati. sarvajñatayā pratibādhitayāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇo
K03psp_2-3u:4109: 'puṇyaskandhaḥ parigṛhīto bhavati. tena vāpuṇyaskandhena parigṛhitenāprameyam asaṃkhyeyam
K03psp_2-3u:4113: ya ime bhagavan mohapuruṣā gambhirāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhiṣyanti,
K03psp_2-3u:4116: caturbhiḥ subhūte ākārais te mohapuruṣā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhiṣyanti. katamaiś caturbhir?
K03psp_2-3u:4117: yad uta mārādhiṣṭhitāś ca te mohapuruṣā bhaviṣyanti. anabhiyuktāś ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhaviṣyanti (PSP_2-3:154)
K03psp_2-3u:4118: na ca prasādaṃ pratilapsyante. abhiniviṣṭāś ca te pañcaskandheṣu bhaviṣyanti pāpamitrahastagatā.
K03psp_2-3u:4119: doṣacaritāś ca te mohapuruṣā bhaviṣyanty ātmotkarṣakāḥ parapaṃsakāḥ. ebhiḥ subhūte
K03psp_2-3u:4120: caturbhir ākāraiḥ samanvāgatās te mohapuruṣā gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratikṣepsyanti.

K03psp_2-3u:4126: kiyad bhagavan gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā yeyaṃ duradhimocyā?
K03psp_2-3u:4128: rūpaṃ subhūte 'baddham amuktaṃ. tat kasya heto?
K03psp_2-3u:4133: vijñānaṃ subhūte 'baddham amuktam. tat kasya hetor?

K03psp_2-3u:4135: dānapāramitāsvabhāvā hi dānapāramitā. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā subhūte 'baddhāmuktā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4136: prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvā hi prajñāpāramitā. adhyātmaśūnyatā subhūte 'baddhāmuktā. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:4138: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā subhūte 'baddhāmuktā. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:4139: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvā hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā. smṛtyupasthānāni subhūte 'baddhāny amuktāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4140: smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvā hi smṛtyupasthānām. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabodhyaṅgāni mārgāḥ subhūte 'baddhā amuktās. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:4141: mārgāsvabhāvā hi mārgāḥ. evaṃ daśabalāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā subhūte 'baddhāmuktā. tat kasya
K03psp_2-3u:4142: sarvākārajñatāsvabhāvo hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā. rūpasya subhūte pūrvānto 'baddho 'muktas. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4143: pūrvāntābhāvasvabhāvo hi subhūte rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ vijñānasya subhūte pūrvānto 'baddho 'muktas. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4145: evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāḥ subhūte pūrvānto 'baddho 'muktas. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4146: pūrvānto 'bhāvasvabhāvo hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā. rūpasya subhūte 'parānto 'baddho 'muktas. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:4147: aparānto 'bhāvasvabhāvo hi subhūte rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānasya subhūte 'parānto 'baddho 'muktaḥ. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:4149: hi subhūte vijñānam. evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāḥ subhūte 'parānto 'baddho 'muktaḥ. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:4150: aparāntābhāvasvabhāvo hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā. rūpaṃ subhūte pratyutpannam abaddham amuktaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4152: vijñānaṃ subhūte pratyutpannam abaddham amuktaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4153: pratyutpannābhāvasvabhāvo hi subhūte vijñānaṃ. yāvat sarvākārajñatā pratyutpannābaddhāmuktā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4156: duradhimocyā bhagavan prajñāpāramitānabhiyuktair anavaropitakuśalamūlaiḥ pāpamitrahastagatair māravaśagataiḥ kuśīdair hīnavīryair muṣitasmṛtibhir
K03psp_2-3u:4158: evam etat subhūte duradhimocyā subhūte prajñāpāramitānabhiyuktair anavaropitakuśalamūlaiḥ pāpamitrahastagatair māravaśagataiḥ kuśīdair hīnavīryair muṣitasmṛtibhir asaṃprajānaiḥ.

K03psp_2-3u:4167: eva sā. yā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā. yāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4168: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā. yā ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4169: viśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā. evaṃ yā sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ viśuddhiḥ

K03psp_2-3u:4174: punar aparaṃ subhūte yā rūpaviśuddhiḥ phalaviśuddhir eva sā,

K03psp_2-3u:4179: yā prajñāpāramitāviśuddhiḥ. sarvākārajñatāviśuddhiḥ. sā iti hi sarvākārajñatāviśuddhiś
K03psp_2-3u:4180: ca prajñāpāramitāviśuddhiś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram abhinnam acchinnam. iti viśuddhisāmānyam
K03psp_2-3u:4181: punar aparaṃ subhūte yā ātmaviśuddhiḥ rūpaviśuddhiḥ sā,
K03psp_2-3u:4182: yā rūpaviśuddhir ātmaviśuddhiḥ sā iti hy ātmaviśuddhiś ca rūpaviśuddhiś cādvayam
K03psp_2-3u:4183: etad advaidhikāram abhinnam acchinnam. evaṃ yā sattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakaviśuddhiḥ rūpaviśuddhiḥ sā,

K03psp_2-3u:4185: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram abhinnam acchinnam. evaṃ yāvad yā paśyakaviśuddhiḥ sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ sā,
K03psp_2-3u:4186: yā sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ paśyakaviśuddhiḥ sā iti hi paśyakaviśuddhiś ca sarvajñatāviśuddhiś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram abhinnam acchinnam.

K03psp_2-3u:4192: sarvajñatāpariśuddhiḥ sarvajñatāviśuddhyā paśyakapariśuddhir iti hi paśyakaviśuddhiś

K03psp_2-3u:4196: acchinnam. evaṃ doṣamohapariśuddhyā rūpapariśuddhir yāvat sarvajñatāpariśuddhir iti
