K03psp_2-3u:4508: nimittato 'pi grahīṣyanti nimittataś ca nāmataś ca grahītvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñciṣyanti
K03psp_2-3u:4509: dūrīkariṣyanti. te prajñāpāramitāṃ manyamānā riñciṣyanti dūrīkariṣyanti prajñāpāramitām.
K03psp_2-3u:4512: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svākhyātā ca supariniṣṭhitā cāmī saṅgā amī cāsaṅgāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:4514: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat;
K03psp_2-3u:4515: katama āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ saṅgaḥ katamo 'saṅgaḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4517: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anupāyakuśalo rūpaṃ śūnyam iti saṃjñāsyate saṅgaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:4518: vedanā saṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti saṃjñāsyate saṅgaḥ. evaṃ vyastasamastāni
K03psp_2-3u:4519: skandhadhātvāyatanāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni śūnyānīti saṃjñāsyate saṅgaḥ. dānapāramitā
K03psp_2-3u:4525: prajñāpāramitā śūnyeti saṃjñāsyate saṅgaḥ. evaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni śūnyānīti saṃjñāsyate
K03psp_2-3u:4527: āryasatyāni śūnyānīti saṃjñāsyate saṅgaḥ. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ śūnyā iti
K03psp_2-3u:4529: śūnyānīti saṃjñāsyate saṅgaḥ. evam abhijñāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
K03psp_2-3u:4530: śūnyānīti saṃjñāsyate saṅgaḥ. daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāṃ śūnyānīti saṃjñāsyate
K03psp_2-3u:4531: saṅgaḥ. catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā śūnyā iti saṃjñāsyate saṅgaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:4533: punar aparam āyuṣman śariputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupāyakuśalo 'tītān dharmān
K03psp_2-3u:4534: atītā dharmā iti saṃjñāsyate saṅgaḥ. anāgatān dharmān anāgatā dharmā iti saṃjñāsyate
K03psp_2-3u:4535: saṅgaḥ. pratyutpannān dharmān pratyutpannā dharmā iti saṃjñāsyate saṅgaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:4536: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upalambhayogena prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caratīti saṅgaḥ. śīlapāramitāyāṃ caratīti saṅgaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:4540: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti saṅgaḥ. smṛtyupasthāneṣu caratīti saṅgaḥ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:4541: caratīti saṅgaḥ. evam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattisu caratīti saṅgaḥ. āryasatyeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:4543: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣv abhijñāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu caratīti saṅgaḥ. daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu caratīti saṅagḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:4544: yāvat sarvajñatāyāṃ caratīti saṅgaḥ. iti vipakṣaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4546: katamo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratām asaṅga iti. na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakuśalasyaivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_2-3u:4548: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā na vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ saṃjānīte. nātītā dharmā atītān dharmān
K03psp_2-3u:4549: saṃjānīte. nānāgatā dharmā anāgatān dharmān saṃjānīte. na pratyutpannā dharmāḥ pratyutpannān
K03psp_2-3u:4550: dharmān saṃjānite. na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4576: sarve ta āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratām upāyakuśalānāṃ vikalpā na santi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4579: ime ta āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakuśalasyāsaṅgaḥ. iti pratipakṣaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4580: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ sthaviraṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:4581: katamena bhadanta subhūte paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṅgo bhavati?
K03psp_2-3u:4583: iha kauśika bodhisattvaś cittaṃ saṃjānīte. dānaṃ saṃjānīte. evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāṃ saṃjānīte. adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ saṃjānīte,
K03psp_2-3u:4586: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ saṃjānīte. evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāny
K03psp_2-3u:4589: pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān saṃjānīte. buddhān bhagavataḥ saṃjānīte.
K03psp_2-3u:4590: buddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāni saṃjānīte tāni sarvāṇy abhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā
K03psp_2-3u:4591: anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati. ayaṃ kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṅgaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:4592: yena na śaknoty asaṅgāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritum. tat kasya hetoḥ.?
K03psp_2-3u:4593: na hi kauśika rūpasya prakṛtiḥ śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4594: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ na vijñānasya kauśika prakṛtiḥ śakyā pariṇāmayitum.
K03psp_2-3u:4595: evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pratītyasamutpādasya na ca śakyā prakṛtiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4596: pariṇāmayitum. evaṃ pāramitānāṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām
K03psp_2-3u:4598: abhijñānāṃ samādhīnāṃ dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4599: pratisaṃvidām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ na śakyā prakṛtiḥ pariṇāmayitum. na hi kauśika
K03psp_2-3u:4600: sarvākārajñatāyāḥ prakṛtiḥ. śakyā pariṇāmayitum. iti punarvipakṣaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:4601: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena parān saṃdarśayitukāmena samādāpayitukāmena
K03psp_2-3u:4603: mānasena pare saṃdarśayitavyāḥ samādāpayitavyāḥ samuttejayitavyāḥ saṃpraharṣayitavyāḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:4604: tathā ca punaḥ saṃpraharṣayitavyā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4625: ahaṃ bodhaye carāmīty. evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paraṃ saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati,
K03psp_2-3u:4628: evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye (PSP_2-3:169)
K03psp_2-3u:4629: saṃdarśayitavyaḥ samādāpayitavyaḥ samuttejayitavyaḥ saṃpraharṣayitavyaḥ. evaṃ hi kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā sarvāḥ saṅgakoṭyaḥ parivarjitā bhaviṣyanti. iti punarpratipakṣaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4630: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa:
K03psp_2-3u:4631: sādhu sādhu subhūte yas tvaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām imāḥ saṅgakoṭir uddiśasi.
K03psp_2-3u:4632: aparās te subhūte saṅgakoṭīḥ sūkṣmatarā nirdekṣyāmi tāḥ śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru
K03psp_2-3u:4633: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te. evaṃ bhagavann ity āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt.
K03psp_2-3u:4635: iha subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitas
K03psp_2-3u:4636: tathāgatān nimittato manasikaroti yāvat subhūte nimittaṃ tāvat saṅgaḥ. yad api teṣāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4637: tathāgatānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvac cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4638: yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvat saddharmasthitir etasminn antare
K03psp_2-3u:4639: yat kiṃcit kuśalamūlaṃ tat sarvaṃ nimittato manasikaroti manasikṛtvā anuttarāyai
K03psp_2-3u:4641: yāvat subhūte nimittato manasikaroti tāvat saṅgaḥ. yāny api teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sarvasaṅgāpagatānāṃ sarvasaṅgāpagatāni kuśalamūlāni,
K03psp_2-3u:4642: tato 'nyeṣām api sattvānāṃ yāni kuśalamulāni tāny api nimittato manasikaroti manasikṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_2-3u:4643: yāvat subhūte nimittato manasikaroti tāvat saṅgaḥ. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:4644: na hi te tathāgatā nimittato manasikartavyā,
K03psp_2-3u:4645: na ca teṣām anyeṣāṃ vā kuśalamūlāni nimittato manasikartavyāni. iti sūkṣmasaṅgaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4646: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:4653: tathā hi subhūte akṛtā prajñāpāramitānabhisaṃskṛtā na sā kenacic chakyābhisaṃboddhum. iti dharmagambhīryam
K03psp_2-3u:4657: tathā hi subhūte na dve dharmaprakṛtī ekaiva subhūte (PSP_2-3:170)
K03psp_2-3u:4661: yā prakṛtiḥ sānabhisaṃskṛtaḥ. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ekāṃ prakṛtim
K03psp_2-3u:4662: aprakṛtim anabhisaṃskṛtiṃ jānatā paśyatā sarvāḥ saṅgakoṭyo vivarjitā bhavanti. iti sarvasaṅgavarjanam
K03psp_2-3u:4666: tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā na kenacid dṛṣṭā na śrutā na matā na vijñātā nābhisaṃbuddhā. iti durbodhatā
K03psp_2-3u:4670: tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā na kenacid vijñātā,
K03psp_2-3u:4671: na rūpeṇa na vedanayā na saṃjñayā na saṃskārair na vijñānena jñātā yāvan na vyastasamastaiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4672: skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgair na pāramitābhir na bodhipakṣyair dharmair
K03psp_2-3u:4674: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair nābhijñābhir na sarvaśūnyatābhir na sarvasamādhibhir
K03psp_2-3u:4675: na sarvadhāraṇīmukhair na tathāgatabalair na vaiśāradyair na pratisaṃvidbhir nāveṇikair
K03psp_2-3u:4680: sarvadharmānupalabdhitaḥ kārikā subhūte prajñāpāramitā. ity acintyatvam ity uktau vipakṣapratipakṣau
K03psp_2-3u:4682: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam?
K03psp_2-3u:4684: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran,
K03psp_2-3u:4685: saced rūpe na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4686: saced na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
K03psp_2-3u:4687: evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
K03psp_2-3u:4688: evaṃ sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu
K03psp_2-3u:4689: samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgeṣv āryāṣṭāṅge mārge na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
K03psp_2-3u:4690: āryasatyeṣu na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattisu
K03psp_2-3u:4691: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu
K03psp_2-3u:4692: vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
K03psp_2-3u:4693: sarvajñatāyām api na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
K03psp_2-3u:4695: saced rūpaṃ na nityaṃ nānityam iti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4696: rūpaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkham iti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4697: rūpaṃ nātmā nānātmeti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4698: rūpaṃ na śubhaṃ nāśubham iti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4699: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ na nityaṃ nānityam iti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4700: vijñānaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ iti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vijñānaṃ nātmā
K03psp_2-3u:4701: nānātmeti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vijñānaṃ na śubhaṃ nāśubham iti carati
K03psp_2-3u:4707: sarvajñatā na sukhā na duḥkheti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4708: sarvajñatā nātmā nānātmeti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4709: sarvajñatā na śubhā nāśubheti carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4710: na tad rūpaṃ tathā saṃvidyate yasya nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā,
K03psp_2-3u:4711: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā na tad vijñānaṃ tathā saṃvidyate yasya nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā
K03psp_2-3u:4712: sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā. evaṃ vyastasamastaskandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitābodhipakṣyā
K03psp_2-3u:4715: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā yāvan na sā sarvajñatā tathā saṃvidyate
K03psp_2-3u:4716: yasyā nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4718: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran saced rūpam aparipūrṇaṃ paripūrṇam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4719: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam aparipūrṇaṃ paripūrṇam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām,
K03psp_2-3u:4720: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāṅgāny aparipūrṇāni paripūrṇānīti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ (PSP_2-3:172)
K03psp_2-3u:4721: sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāny aparipūrṇāni paripūrṇānīti na carati
K03psp_2-3u:4723: aparipūrṇāḥ paripūrṇā iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evam āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:4725: paripūrṇā iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri
K03psp_2-3u:4726: vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā aparipūrṇāḥ paripūrṇā
K03psp_2-3u:4727: iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yāvat sarvajñatā aparipūrṇāḥ paripūrṇā iti
K03psp_2-3u:4728: na carati carati prajñāpārainitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4729: rūpasyāparipūrṇatā paripūrṇatā vā yā na tad rūpam evam api na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4730: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāparipūrṇatā paripūrṇatā vā yā na tad vijñānam
K03psp_2-3u:4731: evam api na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ yāvat sarvajñatāyā aparipūrṇatā
K03psp_2-3u:4732: paripūrṇatā vā yā na sā sarvajñatā evam api na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. iti
K03psp_2-3u:4734: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:4735: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad ayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṅgaś cāsaṅgaś cākhyātaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:4737: evam etat subhūte svākhyātaḥ. subhūte tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṅgaś cāsaṅgaś ca.
K03psp_2-3u:4738: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4739: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. cakṣuḥ saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām,
K03psp_2-3u:4740: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ saṅgam asaṅgam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ sarvāyataneṣu dhātuṣu ca dānapāramitā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati,
K03psp_2-3u:4742: evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāpāramitā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati carati
K03psp_2-3u:4743: prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4744: sasaṅgā asaṅgā iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4745: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāny abhijñāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sasaṅgā asaṅgā iti na carati caṛati
K03psp_2-3u:4746: prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
K03psp_2-3u:4749: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ sasaṅgam asaṅgam iti,
K03psp_2-3u:4750: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ sasaṅgam asaṅgam iti saṃjānīte. evaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4753: na sasaṅgā asaṇgā iti saṃjānīte. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvajñatā na sasaṅgāsaṅgeti
K03psp_2-3u:4754: saṃjānīte. na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ na
K03psp_2-3u:4755: pratyekabodhir nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. sasaṅgāsaṅgeti saṃjānīte. iti rūpādiṣv asaṅgaprayogaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4756: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:4757: āścaryam etad bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā deśyamānāpi na hīyate,
K03psp_2-3u:4761: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:4762: evam etat subhūte prajñāpāramitā deśyamānāpi na hīyate,
K03psp_2-3u:4765: adeśyamānāpi na vardhate. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhann ākāśasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeta avarṇaṃ vā,
K03psp_2-3u:4766: na khalu punar ākāśasya varṇe bhāṣyamāṇe vṛddhir avarṇe bhāṣyamāṇe hāniḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:4767: na cākāśaṃ varṇena vardhate avarṇena hīyate.
K03psp_2-3u:4769: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣo varṇe bhāṣyamāṇe na vardhate,
K03psp_2-3u:4772: avarṇe bhāṣyamāṇena pratihanyate. evam eva subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā deśitāpi tāvaty eva,
K03psp_2-3u:4775: duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati,
K03psp_2-3u:4778: na ca pratyudāvartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4781: na dhyānapāramitā na vīryapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na śīlapāramitā na dānapāramitā prajñāyate. nākāśe rūpaṃ prajñāyate,
K03psp_2-3u:4786: yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prajñāyate. nākāśe smṛtyupasthānāni prajñāyante. nākāśe
K03psp_2-3u:4789: prajñāyante. nākāśe śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāḥ prajñāyante. nākāśe samādhidhāraṇīmukhāni
K03psp_2-3u:4790: prajñāyante. nākāśe samādhidhāraṇīmukhāni prajñāyante. nākāśe śamathavipaśyanā prajñāyate.
K03psp_2-3u:4791: nākāśe daśatathāgatabalāni prajñāyante. nākāśe catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4792: prajñāyante. nākāśe 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ prajñāyante. nākāśe srotaāpattiphalaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4793: prajñāyate. nākāśe sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate. nākāśe 'nāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate.
K03psp_2-3u:4794: nākāśe 'rhattvaṃ prajñāyate. nākāśe pratyekabodhiḥ prajñāyate. nākāśe 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prajñāyate.
K03psp_2-3u:4796: namaskaromi bhagavan bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyo yair ayaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:4797: ākāśasya te bhagavan kṛtaśaḥ prayoktukāmā yatitukāmā dhyāyatukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4798: saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante. ākāśaṃ te bhagavan parimocayitukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4799: saṃnahyante. mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ākāśasamānāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4800: dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante. ity uddeśaduṣkaratāprayogaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4801: ākāśaṃ te bhagavann antarīkṣam utkṣeptukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante. iti prayogaduṣkaratāprayogaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4802: mahāvīryapāramitāprāptās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4803: saced bhagavann ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgataiḥ paripūrṇaḥ syāt,
K03psp_2-3u:4804: tadyathāpi nāma naḍasvanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā,
K03psp_2-3u:4805: te tathāgatāḥ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:4806: ekaikaś ca tathāgato 'prameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimānān sattvān parinirvāpayet,
K03psp_2-3u:4807: na ca bhagavan sattvadhātor ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4809: sattvaviviktatām upādāya. evam ekaikasyāṃ diśi yāvad daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātavas tathāgataiḥ paripūrṇā (PSP_2-3:175)
K03psp_2-3u:4810: bhaveyuḥ, tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā,
K03psp_2-3u:4811: te ca tathāgatās tiṣṭhantaḥ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:4812: ekaikaś ca tathāgato 'prameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayet,
K03psp_2-3u:4813: na ca bhagavan sattvadhātor ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:4815: sattvaviviktatām upādāya. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇaivaṃ vadāmi;
K03psp_2-3u:4816: ākāśaṃ te bhagavan parimocayitukāmā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmāḥ. iti kāritraduṣkaratāprayogaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:4817: atha khalv anyatarasya bhikṣor etad abhavat:
K03psp_2-3u:4818: namaskaromi bhagavan bhagavatyai prajñāpāramitāyai yatra na kaścid dharma upalabhyate na nirudhyate,
K03psp_2-3u:4833: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:4834: yo bhadanta subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yogam āpatsyate kva yogam āpatsyate?
K03psp_2-3u:4836: ākāśe sa kauśika yogam āpatsyate yo 'tra gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ maṃsyate.
K03psp_2-3u:4837: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:4838: yo bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
K03psp_2-3u:4839: vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati kāmam ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi.
K03psp_2-3u:4841: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ kauśika taṃ dharmaṃ yasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātum icchasi?
K03psp_2-3u:4842: śakra āha: nāhaṃ bhadanta subhūte taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi.
K03psp_2-3u:4844: sacet kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthāsyanti saivaiṣāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptir bhaviṣyati. atha (PSP_2-3:176)
K03psp_2-3u:4845: virahitā bhaviṣyanti yathopadiṣṭayā prajñāpāramitayā lapsyante teṣāṃ manuṣyāś cāmanuṣyāś cāvatāram. ākāśasya sa kauśika rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4846: yo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:4850: evam eva kauśika yo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta,
K03psp_2-3u:4851: sa yāvad eva vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:4852: kauśika pratibalas tvaṃ tathāgatasya vā tathāgatanirmitasya vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātum.
K03psp_2-3u:4855: evam etat kauśika yo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4856: saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta sa yāvad eva vighatasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_2-3u:4857: kauśika pratibalastvaṃ dharmadhātor bhūtakoṭes tathatāyā acintyadhāto rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātum.
K03psp_2-3u:4860: evam eva kauśika yo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4861: saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta sa yāvad eva vighatasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt. ity aparapratyayaprayogaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4862: śakra āha: kiyatā bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā
K03psp_2-3u:4863: svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā māyopamā marīcyupamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamā gandharvanagaropamā
K03psp_2-3u:4866: yadā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svapnam api na manyante,
K03psp_2-3u:4869: svapne 'pi na manyante. evaṃ yāvad nirmitam api na manyante,
K03psp_2-3u:4873: tadā bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā yāvan nirmitopamāś ca sarvadharmāḥ parijñātā bhavanti. iti saptavidhābhijñānaprayoga ity uktaḥ prayogaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4874: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran (PSP_2-3:177)
K03psp_2-3u:4889: vijñāne 'pi na manyate. evaṃ vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanāni pratityasamutpādaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4904: nirmite 'pi na manyate. ity uktā prayogasamatā
K03psp_2-3u:4905: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
K03psp_2-3u:4906: devās trāyastriṃṣā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapārṣadyā
K03psp_2-3u:4908: yāvac chuddhāvasakāyikā devaputrās te sarve divyāni candanacūrṇāny abhyavakīrya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma,
K03psp_2-3u:4910: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaḥ śakraś ca brahmāṇaś ca yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikāś ca devaputrā buddhānubhāvena buddhasahasraṃ samanvāharanti sma,
K03psp_2-3u:4911: dharmaṃ deśayamānam ebhir evākṣarair ebhir eva nāmadheyaiḥ subhūtināmadheyair bhikṣubhir imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ paripraśnīkṛtāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4912: deśayamānaṃ śakrāś ca devānām indrāḥ paripraśnayantīmām eva prajñāpāramitām. evaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4913: pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho dikṣu sarvatra buddhasahasraṃ samanvāharanti sma,
K03psp_2-3u:4914: dharmaṃ deśayamānam ebhir evākṣarair ebhir eva nāmadheyaiḥ subhūtināmadheyair eva bhikṣubhir imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ paripraśnīkṛtāṃ,
K03psp_2-3u:4915: deśayamānaṃ sarvatra ca śakrāś ca devānām indrāḥ paripraśnayantimām eva prajñāpāramitām.
K03psp_2-3u:4916: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:4917: asminn eva subhūte pṛthivīpradeśe maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_2-3u:4918: abhisaṃbudhya imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate. asminn eva pṛthivīpradeśe ye 'pi
K03psp_2-3u:4919: te bhaviṣyantiha bhadrakalpe tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās (PSP_2-3:178)
K03psp_2-3u:4920: te 'py anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyante. iti ṣoḍaśakṣaṇadarśanamārgasākṣibhāvajñāpanam
K03psp_2-3u:4921: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:4922: katamair bhagavann ākāraiḥ katamair liṅgaiḥ katamair nimittair maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate?
K03psp_2-3u:4924: iha subhūte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya na rūpaṃ nityam anityaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. evaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā nānātmā,
K03psp_2-3u:4925: na rūpaṃ śubham aśubhaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. na rūpaṃ baddhaṃ muktaṃ veti dharmaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4926: deśayiṣyati. evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā na vijñānaṃ nityam anityaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:4927: evaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā nānātmā na vijñānaṃ śubham aśubhaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:4928: na vijñānaṃ baddhaṃ muktaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. na rūpam atītaṃ nānāgataṃ na
K03psp_2-3u:4929: pratyutpannam iti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam
K03psp_2-3u:4930: atītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannam iti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:4932: dharmeṣv āryasatyeṣv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣv aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu
K03psp_2-3u:4933: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣv abhijñāsu daśabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv āveṇikeṣu
K03psp_2-3u:4934: buddhadharmeṣu yāvat sarvajñatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpanneti evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:4936: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_2-3u:4937: kathaṃ punar bhagavan maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti?
K03psp_2-3u:4939: rūpam atyantaviśuddham atyantaviśuddham iti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:4940: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam atyantaviśuddham atyantaviśuddham iti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:4950: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānapariśuddhatvāt subhūte pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā. evaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4953: yāvat sarvajñatāpariśuddhatvāt subhūte pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā. iti duṣkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:4957: kathaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ kathaṃ vijñānasya pariśuddhatvāt pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā?
K03psp_2-3u:4962: rūpasya subhūte notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ rūpapariśuddhir,
K03psp_2-3u:4963: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya subhūte notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo
K03psp_2-3u:4967: tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:4968: notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ buddhadharmapariśuddhiḥ,
K03psp_2-3u:4969: sarvajñatāyā notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ sarvajñatāpariśuddhiḥ. iti duṣkhe 'nvayajñānam
K03psp_2-3u:4970: punar aparaṃ subhūte ākāśapariśuddhyā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_2-3u:4972: kathaṃ punar bhagavann ākāśapariśuddhyā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā?
K03psp_2-3u:4974: ākāśavad rūpasya yāvat sarvajñatāyā anutpādānirodhāsaṃkleśāvyavadānapariśuddhyā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā. iti samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4979: ākāśavad rūpasya yāvat sarvajñatāyā nirupalepatvāt pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā. iti samudaye dharmajñānam
K03psp_2-3u:4980: punar aparaṃ subhūte ākāśāgrāhyatvāt pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_2-3u:4984: ākāśavad rūpasya yāvat sarvajñatāyā agrāhyatvāt pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā. iti samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:4989: tadyathāpi subhūte ākāśe pratiśrutkā dvayasya śabdaḥ evam eva subhūte ākāśavad rūpasya yāvat sarvajñatāyā apravyāhāratayā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā. iti samudaye 'nvayajñānam
K03psp_2-3u:4994: na hi subhūte ākāśasya kaścit pravyāhāraḥ. evam eva subhūte rūpasya yāvat sarvajñatāyā apravyāhāratayā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā. iti nirodhe
K03psp_2-3u:4999: na hi subhūte ākāśasya kaścid upalambhaḥ. evam eva subhūte rūpasya yāyat saryajñatāyā anupalambhatayā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā. iti nirodhe
K03psp_2-3u:5000: sarvadharmāṇām anutpādānirodhatvād asaṃkleśāvyavadānatvāt subhūte pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_2-3u:5002: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām anutpādānirodhatvād asaṃkleśāvyavadānatvāt pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā?
K03psp_2-3u:5004: rūpasya yāvat sarvajñatayā atyantaviśuddhatvāt pariśudhā prajñāpāramitā. iti nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:5006: yo hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:5008: na śrotrarogo na ghrāṇarogo na jihvārogo na kāyarogo bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:5011: na jīrṇakāyo bhaviṣyati. nāpi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ
K03psp_2-3u:5012: kariṣyati. bahūni cāsya devatāsahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāni bhaviṣyanti. dharmaśravaṇikāḥ
K03psp_2-3u:5013: cāturmahārājakāykā devā yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikā devāḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā bhaviṣyanti.
K03psp_2-3u:5014: aṣṭamyāṃ caturdasyāṃ pañcadasyāṃ ca mahān devatāsaṃghaḥ saṃnipatiṣyati. yatra saddharmabhāṇakaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:5015: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyāte. sa khalu punaḥ kulaputro
K03psp_2-3u:5016: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇo bahutarapuṇyaṃ prasavati. aprameyam
K03psp_2-3u:5017: asaṃkheyam aparimāṇam acintyam atulyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
K03psp_2-3u:5020: aprameyam asaṃkhyeaṃ aparimāṇam acintyam atulyaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ
K03psp_2-3u:5021: puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām aṣṭamyāṃ caturdasyāṃ pañcadasyāṃ ca
K03psp_2-3u:5022: bhāṣiṣyate tasya devaparṣadaḥ purato 'nubaddhā bhaviṣyanti. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:5023: mahāratnam idaṃ subhūte yad uta prajñāpāramitā. iti nirodhe 'nvayajñānam
K03psp_2-3u:5024: tatredaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāratnaṃ sevyamānaṃ nirayād mocayiṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:5031: yāvān naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣūpapadayiṣyati. iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā srotaāpattiphalasya dātrī sakṛdāgāmiphalasyānāgāmiphalasyārhattvasya pratyekabodher,
K03psp_2-3u:5032: anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher dātrī. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_2-3u:5033: tathā hi subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ daśakuśalāḥ karmapathā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra pratiṣṭhā yatra kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:5035: gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni prajñāyante. cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇarataḥ paranirmitavasavartino devāḥ prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:5062: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prajñāyate. atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ catvāri dhyānāni prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:5077: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā prajñāyate yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prajñāyate. catvāry āryasatyāni prajñāyante,
K03psp_2-3u:5094: saṃgharatnaṃ prajñāyate. iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ evamādayo dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭās tenocyate ratnapāramiteyaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā. iti mārge
K03psp_2-3u:5095: na ca subhūte ratnapāramitāyāṃ kaścid dharma utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā parigṛhyate vā cchoryate vā. tat kasya
K03psp_2-3u:5096: tathā hi te dharmā na saṃvidyante ye utpadyeran vā nirudhyeran vā saṃkliśyeyur vā
K03psp_2-3u:5097: vyavadāyeyur vā parigṛhyeyur vā cchoryeyur vā. nāpy asmin prajñāpāramitāratne kaścid
K03psp_2-3u:5098: dharma utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā kuśalo vā akuśalo vā sāsravo vā anāsravo vā sāvadyo
K03psp_2-3u:5100: niḥkleśo vā lokiko vā lokottaro vā saṃskṛto vā asaṃskṛto vā. anenāpi subhūte paryāyeṇa ratnapāramiteyaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā. iti mārge dharmajñānam
K03psp_2-3u:5101: nāpīyaṃ subhūte ratnapāramitā kenacid dharmeṇopalipyeta. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:5102: tathā hi te dharmā nopalabhyante yair upalipyeta,
K03psp_2-3u:5103: teneyaṃ subhūte nirupaliptā ratnapāramitā. iti mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:5104: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evam api na jānāti,
K03psp_2-3u:5112: buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum arcayitum apacāyituṃ buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāman sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyati,
K03psp_2-3u:5114: anuprāpsyati sarvajñatām. iti mārge 'nvayajñānam ity ukto darśanamārgaḥ
K03psp_2-3u:5115: seyaṃ punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasyāvāhikā na nirvāhikā na darśikā
K03psp_2-3u:5116: na nidarśikā na dāyikā na cchorikā notpādikā na nirodhikā nocchedikā na śāśvatikā
K03psp_2-3u:5117: naikārthikā na nānārthikā nāgamikā na nirgamikā na saṃkleśikā na viśodhikā na hānikārikā
K03psp_2-3u:5118: na vṛddhikārikā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā. iti prathamasarvajñatādhikārasamāptidīpanam
K03psp_2-3u:5119: seyaṃ punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na kāmadhātusamatikramikā vā sthāpikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5121: nārūpyadhātusamatikramikā vā sthāpikā vā. na dānapāramitāyā dāyikā vā na mārgasya cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5122: na śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñopāyapraṇidhibalajñānapāramitāyā dāyikā vā cchorikā vā. nādhyātmaśūnyatāyā dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5123: na bahirdhāśūnyatāyā nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5124: yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā dāyikā vā cchorikā vā. nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:5125: dāyikā vā cchorikā vā. na caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ nāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ na navanupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ
K03psp_2-3u:5126: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5127: na ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5128: na daśānāṃ bodhisattvabhūmīnāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5129: na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5130: na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā. evaṃ na samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgānāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā, na balānāṃ (PSP_2-3:184)
K03psp_2-3u:5131: na vaiśāradyānāṃ na pratisaṃvidāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5132: nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5133: na samādhīnāṃ na dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5134: na srotaāpattiphalasya dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5135: na sakṛdāgāmiphalasya nānāgāmiphalasya nārhattvasya na pratyekabuddhatvasya na sarvajñatāyā dāyikā vā cchorikā vā. iti dvitiyaṃ mārgajñatādhikārasamāptidīpanam
K03psp_2-3u:5136: sā khalu punar iyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na buddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5137: na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5138: na śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5139: nāpi buddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5140: na saṃskṛtadhātor dāyikā vā cchorikā vā. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:5141: utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā
K03psp_2-3u:5142: dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā. tāṃ tathāgato 'bhisaṃbudhyate 'py abhisamety
K03psp_2-3u:5143: apy abhisaṃbudhyābhisamety ācaṣṭe deśayati vivṛṇoti vibhajaty uttānīkaroti saṃprakāśayati.
K03psp_2-3u:5144: atha khalu saṃbahulāni devaputraśatasahasrāṇy upary antarīkṣe sthitvā kilikilāprakṣveḍitāny
K03psp_2-3u:5145: akārṣur divyāni cotpalakumudapuṇḍarīkapadmamāndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi kṣipanti sma. evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣanta,
K03psp_2-3u:5146: dvitīyaṃ batedaṃ dharmacakrapravartanaṃ jāmbūdvīpe paśyāmaḥ. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nirdiśya mānāyāṃ tatrānekāni devaputrasahasrāṇy anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhante sma.
K03psp_2-3u:5147: atha khalu bhagavān sthaviraṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa:
K03psp_2-3u:5148: nedaṃ subhūte dvitiyaṃ dharmacakrapravartanaṃ nāpy ekaṃ nāpīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kasyacid dharmasya pravartanāya vā nivartanāya vā pratyupasthitā. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_2-3u:5151: katamā bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā yad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasya pravartanāya vā nivartanāya vā pratyupasthitā?
K03psp_2-3u:5153: prajñāpāramitā subhūte prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā. evaṃ dhyānaṃ vīryaṃ kṣāntiṃ śīlaṃ dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā,
K03psp_2-3u:5154: adhyātmaśūnyatā adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā,
K03psp_2-3u:5155: smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatayā śūnyāni. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni mārgā mārgaśūnyatayā (PSP_2-3:185)
K03psp_2-3u:5169: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ sarvajñatā sarvajñatāśūnyatayā śūnyā.
K03psp_2-3u:5171: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā. sarvadharmasvabhāvāś ca sarvadharmasvabhāvaiḥ
K03psp_2-3u:5172: śūnyāḥ. bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_2-3u:5173: abhisaṃbudhyante. na kaṃcid dharmam abhisaṃbudhyante dharmacakraṃ pravartanti,
K03psp_2-3u:5174: na kaṃcid dharmaṃ pravartayanti nivartayanti vā. na ca taiḥ kaścid dharmaḥ saṃdṛśyate,
K03psp_2-3u:5175: na kaścid dharmo dṛśyate. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:5176: tathā hi sarvadharmā nopalabhyante ye dharmāḥ pravartante vā nivartante vā. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_2-3u:5177: tathā hy atyantānabhiniviṣṭāḥ sarvadharmāḥ. na hi śūnyatā pravartikā vā nivartikā vā,
K03psp_2-3u:5179: nāpraṇihitaṃ pravartakaṃ vā nivartakaṃ vā. yā evaṃdeśanā sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prakāśanā kathanā prajñāpanā prasthāpanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā sūcanā uttānīkaraṇaṃ saṃprakāśanā,
K03psp_2-3u:5180: iyaṃ sā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitāyā deśanā. yā ca prajñāpāramitāyā deśanā na kenacid deśitā na kenacit pratīcchitā,
K03psp_2-3u:5181: sā na kenacit sākṣātkṛtā. yā na kenacit sākṣātkṛtā na tatra kaścit parinirvṛto nāpi tayā dharmadeśanayā kaścid dakṣiṇīyaḥ kṛtaḥ.
K03psp_2-3u:5182: iti tṛtiyaṃ sarvākārajñatādhikārasamāptidīpanam ity uktā sarvajñatā
K03psp_2-3u:5183: āryapañcaviṃśatiśāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ sarvajñatādhikāracaryāviśeṣaparivartaḥ tṛtīyaḥ
